360 No Scope.name: 360 No Scope
360 No Scope.description:
Requirements You're wielding a gun.

You fire a trick shot as part of a daredevil maneuver. You @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.WBrg7BsHa8ylkigL]{Parkour}. You can @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.sLikawnrJJzHMYeC]{Aim} and then make a ranged Strike with the gun you're wielding during this movement, including when you're falling.

A Life For a Life.name: A Life For a Life
A Life For a Life.description:
You've learned to manipulate the forces of vitality and void to cheat death. Choose one of the following cantrips: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.RA7VKcen3p56rVyZ]{Forbidding Ward} or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.SnjhtQYexDtNDdEg]{Stabilize}. You can cast this spell as a divine innate spell at will. A cantrip is heightened to a spell rank equal to half your level rounded up.

Special You can select this feat twice. Each time, you must select a different cantrip.

AbadarCorp Rep Dedication.name: AbadarCorp Rep Dedication
AbadarCorp Rep Dedication.description:
You've internalized your corporation's culture and strategies, and you're knowledgeable about general business practices. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.BocFD2KV0qgUC76x]{Additional Lore} general feat for Business or Corporate Lore.

You can use Business or Corporate Lore instead of any other skill when making a Recall Knowledge check about subjects related to your work, such as goods your company buys and sells, individuals or settlements where you do business, or industry laws.

prerequisites.value: trained in Deception, Diplomacy, or Society

Aberrant Shape.name: Aberrant Shape
Aberrant Shape.description: You can take the form of a terrifying aberration. When you Change Shape, you can choose one of the following: gain the effects of a 4th-rank @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Enlarge} spell and 6th-rank @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Y8Y0LS6sh4pkxPsq]{Eldritch Bond} spell; gain the effects of a 2nd-rank enlarge spell and 6th-rank eldritch bond spell granting three abilities; or gain the effects of a 6th-rank eldritch bond spell granting four abilities. This effect lasts for 1 minute or until you shift back, whichever comes first.

Accelerated Step.name: Accelerated Step
Accelerated Step.description: You can absorb the solar and electromagnetic radiation in your surroundings, transforming it into kinetic energy that propels your body faster. Your Speeds increase by 5 feet. In addition, you gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.P95mzZ3VV40cXbx5]{Light Speed} action.

According to My Calculations.name: According to My Calculations
According to My Calculations.description:
You announce business projections to an ally to benefit them. Make a @Check[business-lore|dc:@self.level] or @Check[corporate-lore|dc:@self.level] check against a DC based on your level. Whether or not you're successful, the target becomes temporarily immune to According to My Calculations for 24 hours. The benefit lasts for 1 minute or until activated.

Critical Success The target gains a +2 circumstance bonus on their next skill check or attack roll.

Success The target gains a +1 circumstance bonus on their next skill check or attack roll.

Critical Failure The target takes a –1 penalty to their next skill check or attack roll.

Acquire Asset.name: Acquire Asset
Acquire Asset.description: You assess a foe while in the thick of battle by observing their reactions to your attack. Make a melee or ranged Strike against a creature that isn't your asset. On a hit, your target becomes your asset as if you'd used @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.iHzfiebxLxN3ogpH]{Size Up}. On a critical hit, you can also immediately attempt a check to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge} about the target.

Adaptable Intellect.name: Adaptable Intellect
Adaptable Intellect.description:
Requirements You have access to an infosphere, library, or similar reference collection.

What might take other minds a lifetime to master, you can temporarily absorb through a brief, intense study session. During your daily preparations, you can review literature to gain the trained proficiency rank in one skill of your choice. This proficiency lasts until you prepare again. Since this proficiency is temporary, you can't use it as a prerequisite for a skill increase or a permanent character option (like a feat).

Adaptable Limbs.name: Adaptable Limbs
Adaptable Limbs.description: You grow sturdy lower limbs that allow you to walk on land. Increase your Speed to 20 feet. Additionally, you gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.iIESt0oV0vobl41N]{Adaptive Locomotion} action.

Adapted Augmentations.name: Adapted Augmentations
Adapted Augmentations.description: You embrace ultimate adaptation by integrating cutting-edge augmentations into your body. Choose one common augmentation with an item level of 1 or less. You begin with this augmentation already installed in your body (you don't need to pay the credits to purchase this starting augmentation). This augmentation doesn't count toward your implant limit.

Adapted Cantrip.name: Truco adaptado
Adapted Cantrip.description:
A través del estudio de múltiples tradiciones mágicas, has alterado un conjuro para que encaje en tu estilo de lanzamiento. Elige un truco de una tradición mágica diferente a la tuya. Si preparas conjuros, puedes elegir éste cuando preparas tus trucos, además de tus demás opciones. Si tienes un repertorio de conjuros, reemplaza uno de los trucos que conoces por el elegido. Puedes lanzar este truco como un conjuro de la tradición de tu clase.

Si más adelante cambias este truco o lo reconviertes, puedes elegir su sustituto de la misma tradición alternativa o de una diferente.

prerequisites.value: rasgo de clase lanzamiento de conjuros

Adaptive Adept.name: Adepto adaptativo
Adaptive Adept.description: Has continuado adaptando tu magia para fusionar la tradición de tu clase con tu tradición adaptada. Elige un truco o un conjuro de 1.er rango de la misma tradición mágica que tu truco de Truco adaptado. Obtienes dicho conjuro, añadiéndolo a tus opciones de conjuro igual que el truco de Truco adaptado. Puedes lanzarlo como si fuera de la tradición mágica de tu clase. Si eliges un conjuro de 1.er rango, no obtienes acceso a las versiones potenciadas del mismo, lo que significa que no puedes prepararlas si preparas conjuros y que no puedes aprenderlas o seleccionar el conjuro como uno de signatura si dispones de un repertorio de conjuros.

Adaptive Defense.name: Adaptive Defense
Adaptive Defense.description:
You prepare your vitality network to catch some of your excess magic, allowing it to flow back and bolster your bond's defenses. If the next action you use is to Cast a Spell that deals damage, whether or not it successfully deals damage, you and one bonded ally gain resistance to that spell's type of damage equal to the spell's rank (minimum 1) until the end of your next turn. If the spell deals more than one type of damage, choose one and gain resistance to that type.

@UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feat-effects.Item.qbnXMOmVMMKphIgg]{Effect: Adaptive Defense}

Adaptive Talent.name: Adaptive Talent
Adaptive Talent.description:
You gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.class-features.Item.9nO9EkhE1TiS0Yh6]{Adaptive Talent} class feature, but you do not gain additional skill feats at higher levels.

Special You can select this feat a second time as a 10th level feat and a 16th level feat, increasing the number of skill feats you gain using adaptive talent by 1.

Additional Lore.name: Saber adicional
Additional Lore.description:
Tu conocimiento se ha expandido hasta abarcar un nuevo campo. Elige una subcategoría adicional de Saber. Obtienes el rango entrenado en ella. En los niveles 3.º, 7.º y 15.º, obtienes un incremento de habilidad adicional que tan sólo puedes aplicar a la subcategoría de Saber elegida.

Especial Puedes seleccionar esta dote más de una vez. Cada vez tienes que seleccionar una nueva subcategoría de Saber y obtienes los incrementos de habilidad adicionales para dicha subcategoría a los niveles indicados.

Adopted Ancestry.name: Ascendencia adoptada
Adopted Ancestry.description: Estás completamente inmerso en la cultura y las tradiciones de otra ascendencia, ya sea porque nacieras en ella, la obtuvieras mediante un rito de paso o te vincularas con la misma a través de una amistad profunda o un romance. Elige una ascendencia común u otra ascendencia a la que tienes acceso. Puedes seleccionar dotes de la ascendencia elegida, además de la propia de tu personaje, si no requieren ningún rasgo fisiológico del que careces, a determinar por el DJ.

Adopted Talents.name: Adopted Talents
Adopted Talents.description:
Requirements You have a bonded partner.

Since becoming bonded with your partner, you've learned a lot about them, and you're beginning to pick up their habits, interests, and knowledge. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.ihN8gkHSdPG9Trte]{Adopted Ancestry}, but you must select the ancestry of your bonded partner. You also gain one 1st-level ancestry feat from the ancestry you chose for Adopted Ancestry.

Special You must have a permanent partner bond to select this feat, meaning you can't be a mercurial dragonkin.

Advanced Atmospheric Flight.name: Advanced Atmospheric Flight
Advanced Atmospheric Flight.description: You've become more adept at using your energy wings within an atmosphere. @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.wZyBTTRM2BjC93gg]{Atmospheric Flight} no longer has a frequency and can be used as often as desired. When you use Atmospheric Flight, your wings remain manifested until you spend a single action to purposefully dismiss them.

Advanced Distortion.name: Advanced Distortion
Advanced Distortion.description:
You gain one witchwarper feat. For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your witchwarper level is half your character level.

Special You can select this feat more than once. Each time you do, you gain another witchwarper feat.

Advanced Epiphany.name: Advanced Epiphany
Advanced Epiphany.description: You gain a deeper understanding of your connection. You gain the advanced epiphany spell for your chosen connection.

Advanced First Aid.name: Primeros auxilios avanzados
Advanced First Aid.description: You use your medical training to ameliorate sickness or assuage fears. When you use Medicine to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.MHLuKy4nQO2Z4Am1]{Administer First Aid}, instead of Stabilizing a character or Stopping Bleeding, you can reduce an ally's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened} condition by 2, or remove either of those conditions entirely on a critical success. You can remove only one condition at a time. The DC for the Medicine check is usually the DC of the effect that caused the condition.

Advanced Gunner.name: Advanced Gunner
Advanced Gunner.description:
You gain one operative feat. For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your operative level is half your character level.

Special You can select this feat more than once. Each time you do, you gain another operative feat.

Advanced Leadership.name: Advanced Leadership
Advanced Leadership.description:
You gain one envoy feat. For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your envoy level is equal to half your character level.

Special You can select this feat more than once. Each time you select it, you gain another envoy feat.

Advanced Mysticism.name: Advanced Mysticism
Advanced Mysticism.description:
You gain one mystic feat. For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your mystic level is half your character level.

Special You can select this feat more than once. Each time you do, you gain another mystic feat.

Advanced Soldier Training.name: Advanced Soldier Training
Advanced Soldier Training.description:
You gain one soldier feat. For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your soldier level is half your character level.

Special You can select this feat more than once. Each time you do, you gain another soldier feat.

Advanced Stellar Attunement.name: Advanced Stellar Attunement
Advanced Stellar Attunement.description:
You gain one solarian feat. For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your solarian level is half your character level.

Special You can select this feat more than once. Each time you do, you gain another solarian feat.

Advanced Warp.name: Advanced Warp
Advanced Warp.description: Your paradox begins to cement itself across your life. You gain the advanced warp spell for your paradox.

Advantageous Assault.name: Asalto ventajoso
Advantageous Assault.description:
Tras comprometer el movimiento de tu enemigo, le asestas un golpe más mortal. Da un Golpe contra una criatura que está @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Apresada}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Tumbada} o @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Neutralizada}. Obtienes un bonificador por circunstancia al daño en este Golpe igual al número de dados de daño por arma o dicha cifra +2 si empuñas el arma a dos manos. El Golpe obtiene el siguiente efecto de fallo.

Fallo Infliges al objetivo tanto daño como el número de dados de daño por arma o dicha cifra +2 si empuñas el arma a dos manos. Este daño es del mismo tipo que el del arma.

Aerial Dash.name: Aerial Dash
Aerial Dash.description: Whether by catching a current or pushing yourself beyond your limits, you fly forward incredibly fast. Fly up to three times. If you are a stormrider dragonkin, instead you Fly up to four times.

Aerial Master.name: Aerial Master
Aerial Master.description: Your ability to fly through the skies under your own power is unparalleled. Your fly Speed increases by 10 feet.

Akashic Sync.name: Akashic Sync
Akashic Sync.description:
Frequency once per 10 minutes

You can briefly connect to the Akashic Records. You @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge} using [[/act recall-knowledge skill=occultism]]{Occultism} instead of any other skill as though Occultism were applicable to perform Recall Knowledge for that topic.

Critical Success You recall accurately and gain three pieces of information or context.

Success You recall accurately and gain two pieces of information or context and a piece of erroneous information, but you don't have any way to differentiate which is which.

Failure You gain a piece of information or context and two pieces of erroneous information.

Critical Failure You gain three pieces of erroneous information.

Akashic Transcendence.name: Akashic Transcendence
Akashic Transcendence.description: Your eye opens to greater truths. You can use @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.xQQgbsRjFWp7dZhU]{Akashic Sync} once per round instead of once every 10 minutes.

All Hands on Deck.name: All Hands on Deck
All Hands on Deck.description:
Kasatha

Frequency once per day

You focus on your coordination for a brief moment. Until the beginning of your next turn, you count one additional pair of hands as your active hands. At the beginning of your next turn, choose which set of active hands remains your active hands.

Shobhad

Frequency once per day

You're able to focus your coordination for a brief moment. Until the beginning of your next turn, you count one additional pair of hands as your active hands. At the beginning of your next turn, choose which set of active hands remains your active hands.

Skittermander

Frequency once per day

Until the beginning of your next turn, you count two additional pairs of hands as your active hands. At the beginning of your next turn, choose which set of active hands remains your active hands.

Allsix.name: Allsix
Allsix.description:
Frequency once per day

Requirements You aren't holding any items except in your active hands.

You put forth your best effort and focus everything you've got on the task at hand, putting allsix of your hands (three of your sets of arms) into it! The next time you roll an attack roll or skill check, roll it three times and use the highest result.

Alluring Pheromones.name: Alluring Pheromones
Alluring Pheromones.description: You influence others with pheromones, even when you lack other means of communication. You can use Diplomacy to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Make an Impression} on creatures with whom you don't share a language and to make simple Requests of them. This could include getting directions or getting the target to pick a specific individual out from a crowd. When you do, Make an Impression and Request lose the linguistic trait and gain the olfactory trait.

Always on Alert.name: Always on Alert
Always on Alert.description: After countless unexpected encounters you've developed a second sense for danger. You can perform the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.kV3XM0YJeS2KCSOb]{Scout} exploration activity at the same time as the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.IE2nThCmoyhQA0Jn]{Avoid Notice}, @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.EwgTZBWsc8qKaViP]{Investigate}, or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.TiNDYUGlMmxzxBYU]{Search} exploration activity. The bonus to initiative you grant when you Scout is +2 instead of +1.

Ambidextrous Shifter.name: Ambidextrous Shifter
Ambidextrous Shifter.description: You have enough practice with your natural form that you can utilize more of your limbs than usual. You have six arms, which allows you to wield and hold up to six hands' worth of weapons and equipment. If you use more than four of these arms, your land Speed becomes 5 feet. At any time, one pair of hands is designated your active hands. You can change this designation from one pair of hands to another by taking the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.oW81CfM9ebxXnrw3]{Switch Hands} action, which is a single action. You can only perform actions with your active hands. This feat allows you to use up to six arms when you use Change Shape to take a form with multiple arms, such as a kasatha or skittermander.

Ammo Hoarder.name: Ammo Hoarder
Ammo Hoarder.description:
Requirements You're wielding an automatic weapon.

By using direct and methodical burst fire, you conserve your ammunition without compromising your destructive potential. Your @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.6ctkxUnVwqooSvgg]{Auto-Fire} has an expend equal to the number of targets in the area, rather than the number of targets in the area × 2.

Amplify Radiance.name: Amplify Radiance
Amplify Radiance.description: You're an abundant source of electromagnetic radiation, which naturally amplifies the radiance of lights around you. Light sources in your possession (including those carried, cast on you, worn, or otherwise a part of you) are more luminous—double the area illuminated by these light sources. If a light source you possess would deal damage or cause a harmful effect based on its area, the area of those additional effects are not increased by Amplify Radiance. Additionally, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to counteract checks made to counteract darkness.

Ancestral Knowledge.name: Ancestral Knowledge
Ancestral Knowledge.description:
Choose an ancestry or heritage. You learn a new language available to that ancestry or heritage. You become trained in Society. If you're already trained in Society, you instead become trained in another skill of your choice. You also become trained in the Lore skill related to that specific ancestry or heritage, such as Android Lore or Ysoki Lore.

Special You can select this feat multiple times, choosing a different ancestry or heritage each time.

Ancestral Paragon.name: Parangón ancestral
Ancestral Paragon.description: Ya sea a través del instinto, del estudio o de la magia, notas una conexión más profunda con tu linaje. Obtienes una dote de ascendencia de 1.er nivel.

Ancestral Physiology.name: Ancestral Physiology
Ancestral Physiology.description:
Your time spent in another skin has allowed you to shape your own body into a weapon. You gain a feat associated with a chosen ancestry or heritage that grants an unarmed attack. You can select ancestry feats that include that feat as a prerequisite as if you were a member of that ancestry or heritage. You can use the unarmed attack only when you're transformed into a member of that ancestry.

Special You can select this feat multiple times, choosing a different ancestry or feat each time.

Ancestral Weapon Familiarity.name: Ancestral Weapon Familiarity
Ancestral Weapon Familiarity.description:
You've learned how to use the traditional weapons of another ancestry. You gain the weapon familiarity feat associated with a chosen ancestry or heritage, even if you are not a member of that ancestry or heritage. You can select ancestry feats that include that feat as a prerequisite as if you were a member of that ancestry or heritage. You must meet all feats' prerequisites when chosen other than the ancestry or heritage.

Special You can select this feat multiple times, choosing a different ancestry or feat each time.

Anchoring Impacts.name: Anchoring Impacts
Anchoring Impacts.description:
Your suppressing attacks pin foes in place, preventing them from moving at more than a crawling pace. When you @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.enA7BxAjBb7ns1iF]{Suppress} a target with one of your attacks, increase the speed penalty to a –20-foot status penalty for the duration of the suppressed condition. If the effect that imparted the suppressed condition was a critical hit, or the target critically fails its save and becomes suppressed, then the target also becomes @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

@UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feat-effects.Item.5da0ZOocaoySCSJ2]{Effect: Anchoring Impacts}

Anchoring Strike.name: Anchoring Strike
Anchoring Strike.description:
Requirements Your quantum field is active.

Battle can be disorienting, but for you, the intense mental effort of striking your targets lends you additional clarity and focus. Make a Strike. The Strike gains the following success and critical success effects.

Critical Success The Strike gains the anchoring trait. You can reroll the damage dice rolled for this strike, but you must use the second result, even if it's worse.

Success The Strike gains the anchoring trait.

Animal Skins.name: Animal Skins
Animal Skins.description: Once per day, when you Change Shape, you can instead gain the effects of @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.wp09USMB3GIW1qbp]{Animal Form}, heightened to half your level rounded up, for 1 minute or until you shift back, whichever comes first.

Arcane Adept.name: Arcane Adept
Arcane Adept.description: Your intense magical studies have taught you how to watch out for signs of magic even when looking for other things. When you're @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.TiNDYUGlMmxzxBYU]{Searching}, you also gain the benefits of the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Yb0C1uLzeHrVLl7a]{Detect Magic} exploration activity unless you choose not to.

Arcane Recall.name: Arcane Recall
Arcane Recall.description:
Frequency once per day

Your training has enhanced your memory for magic, and spells linger in your mind. You can cast one spell you've already cast today without expending a spell slot.

Arcane Sense.name: Sentido arcano
Arcane Sense.description: Tu estudio de la magia te permite notar su presencia de forma instintiva. Puedes lanzar detectar magia a 1.er rango a voluntad como un conjuro innato arcano. Si tienes el rango maestro en Arcanos, el conjuro se potencia a 3.er rango; si tienes el rango legendario, se potencia a 4.º rango.

Arctic Bite.name: Arctic Bite
Arctic Bite.description: The freezing power of your bite becomes irresistible. The cold damage dealt by your jaws Strike increases to @Damage[2d6[untyped]] damage and ignores an amount of the target's cold resistance equal to your level. A creature's immunities are unaffected.

Armor Ace.name: Armor Ace
Armor Ace.description: You've learned through trial and painful error how to make the most out of your armor, deflecting damage from explosions and similar effects. When donning armor, you can grant it the bulwark trait until you remove it. When you're wearing armor that already has the bulwark trait, increase the modifier to Reflex saves to avoid damaging effects granted by that armor to +4, rather than +3.

Armor Proficiency.name: Competencia con armadura
Armor Proficiency.description:
Obtienes el rango entrenado en armadura ligera. Si ya lo estabas, obtienes el rango entrenado en armadura intermedia. Si lo estabas en ambas, obtienes el rango entrenado en armadura pesada. Si eres por lo menos de 13.er nivel, obtienes el rango experto en este tipo de armadura.

Especial Puedes seleccionar esta dote más de una vez. Cada vez obtienes el rango entrenado en el siguiente tipo de armadura de los arriba indicados

Ascended Stability.name: Ascended Stability
Ascended Stability.description:
Trigger You would cycle or become unattuned.

You briefly enter a meditative state in which you re-center yourself and remember the ever-shifting balance between the violent extremes of the cycle. You don't become unattuned or cycle, and you remain in your current attunement state.

Ascending Necrovite.name: Ascending Necrovite
Ascending Necrovite.description: You've reached the pinnacle of necrovite training available to living creatures. You've crafted an electroencephalon, a type of high-tech soul cage designed to preserve your existence, and you've begun your mystical preparations for your final transition into undeath. You gain void healing and immunity to death effects, disease, and poison. You gain resistance 5 to cold and physical damage. When you die, your soul immediately transfers to your electroencephalon.

Aspiring Necrovite.name: Aspiring Necrovite
Aspiring Necrovite.description: You don't plan to die—instead, you're going to exist forever as a necrovite. You live by the Song of Silence and have spent time investigating undead organizations and studying the processes required to make the final transition into undeath. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus on checks to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge} about undead creatures, the Corpse Fleet, and Eox. You also learn the Necril language.

Assistive Shove.name: Assistive Shove
Assistive Shove.description:
Trigger An adjacent ally who is at least one size smaller than you would be hit by a Strike.

You use your size and leverage to quickly move an ally out of harm's way. Attempt an Athletics check to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} the ally targeted by the triggering Strike. If your ally is willing, treat the result as one degree of success higher. On a success, in addition to its normal effects, the Shoved ally also gains a +2 circumstance bonus to their AC against the triggering Strike.

@UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feat-effects.Item.Gt6n0nYxHlPSmWVH]{Effect: Assistive Shove}

Assurance.name: Seguro
Assurance.description:
Incluso en las peores circunstancias, puedes llevar a cabo tareas básicas. Elige una habilidad en la que estás entrenado. En lugar de hacer una prueba de habilidad para la misma, puedes aplicar el resultado de 10 + tu modificador por competencia (no apliques ningún otro bonificador, penalizador ni modificador).

Especial Puedes seleccionar esta dote en múltiples ocasiones. Cada vez, elige una habilidad diferente para obtener los beneficios aplicables a la misma.

prerequisites.value: rango entrenado en por lo menos una habilidad

Atmospheric Flight.name: Atmospheric Flight
Atmospheric Flight.description: You can manifest your energy wings while within an atmosphere for a short time. Your energy wings manifest, granting you a fly Speed equal to your land Speed plus 10 feet for 10 minutes. You can end this duration early as a single action.

Attuned Blow.name: Attuned Blow
Attuned Blow.description: You can use your manifestations immediately upon attuning yourself. When you Attune as a single action, you can make a Strike with your solar flare or solar weapon as a free action.

Attuned Wards.name: Attuned Wards
Attuned Wards.description:
You extend your control of stellar forces to punish your foes. Creatures that hit you with an attack suffer consequences based on your attunement.

Graviton-Attuned The creature is @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} and @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} for 1 round. This increases to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} if this is the second time it hit you this turn.

Photon-Attuned The creature takes persistent fire damage equal to half your level.

Augmented Adaptation.name: Augmented Adaptation
Augmented Adaptation.description: You've adapted your own body to suit your needs. The total number of augmentations you can install is increased by two.

Augmented Body.name: Augmented Body
Augmented Body.description:
You implant one augmentation with an item level equal to your character level or lower. This augmentation doesn't count against your total implant limit. The first time you take this feat, the augmentation you receive is free as long as its item level is 1 or lower. You can upgrade this augmentation by swapping it out with another augmentation when you gain a level or by spending downtime replacing the augmentation as though changing out a feat. When you swap out the augmentation, you must pay the difference between the original and new augmentation each time you upgrade.

Special You can select this feat multiple times, choosing a different augmentation each time. Retraining this feat requires paying the cost of the original augmentation.

Automatic Knowledge.name: Conocimiento automático
Automatic Knowledge.description:
Conoces hechos básicos sin pararte mucho a pensar. Elige una habilidad en la que tienes el rango experto, que dispone de la acción Recordar conocimiento y para la que dispones de la dote Seguro. Puedes usar la acción Recordar conocimiento con dicha habilidad como acción gratuita una vez por asalto. Si lo haces, debes utilizar Seguro en la prueba de habilidad.

Especial Puedes seleccionar esta dote en múltiples ocasiones, eligiendo una habilidad diferente cada vez. Puedes utilizar Conocimiento automático en cualquier habilidad de que dispones, pero sólo una vez por asalto.

prerequisites.value: experto en una habilidad que dispone de la acción Recordar conocimiento

Avid Traveler.name: Avid Traveler
Avid Traveler.description:
You spend more time gallivanting across the galaxy than you do at home. You become trained in Society. If you would automatically become trained in Society (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice.

You also gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.P9HCz0uR6xPHuw72]{Multilingual} skill feat.

Baleful Gaze.name: Baleful Gaze
Baleful Gaze.description:
Frequency once per minute

You have an ominous presence that unnerves the living. You have learned to harness this sinister aura to your own advantage and can scare your foes with a focused glance. Focus your ill intent at one living creature within 30 feet. The target must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)] save against the higher of your class DC or spell DC, or become @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1} (@UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2} on a critical failure) and @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} as long as it's frightened. Once you've used Baleful Gaze against a creature, it's temporarily immune for 24 hours.

Baleful Presence.name: Baleful Presence
Baleful Presence.description: You've learned to unleash the anger and malice you've built up over the course of your life and restless undeath against multiple foes at once, creating a potent effect around yourself. You can choose to use Baleful Gaze as a 2-action activity, rather than 1. When you do, Baleful Gaze gains the divine trait, loses the visual trait, and affects each living creature in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30], rather than a single living creature.

Barathu Lore.name: Barathu Lore
Barathu Lore.description:
From your upbringing, you've learned the ways of your people while also seeking to expand your own mind in the fields of creation. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Crafting and Medicine. If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice.

You also gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.BocFD2KV0qgUC76x]{Additional Lore} general feat for Barathu Lore.

Bargain Hunter.name: Buscador de gangas
Bargain Hunter.description: Puedes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.QyzlsLrqM0EEwd7j]{Obtener ingresos} utilizando Diplomacia, invirtiendo días en buscar gangas y revendiéndolas a un precio mayor. También puedes pasar algún tiempo husmeando específicamente una oferta muy especial por un objeto; esto funciona como si estuvieras utilizando Diplomacia para Obtener ingresos, excepto que en lugar de ganar dinero, compras el objeto con un descuento igual al dinero que habrías ganado, consiguiéndolo gratis si los ingresos obtenidos son iguales o mayores que el coste. Finalmente, si seleccionas Buscador de gangas durante la creación de personaje a 1.er nivel, inicias el juego con 2 po adicionales.

Barricade.name: Barricade
Barricade.description: You hastily create a barricade using nearby items, junk, or debris. The barricade provides lesser cover for you and one other ally, though you can @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.ust1jJSCZQUhBZIz]{Take Cover} to increase this benefit to standard cover. The barricade is flimsy and falls apart at the end of your next turn.

Basic Distortion.name: Basic Distortion
Basic Distortion.description: Your disruptive powers grow. You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level witchwarper feat.

Basic Epiphany.name: Basic Epiphany
Basic Epiphany.description: You gain your connection's initial epiphany spell. If you don't already have one, you also gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point, which you can Refocus by reflecting on your connection.

Basic Insectile Flight.name: Basic Insectile Flight
Basic Insectile Flight.description:
Some shirrens are born with wings, but others grow them later. You evolve a pair of insectile wings that grant you a fly Speed of 20 feet. In addition, when you fall, you take no falling damage.

Special If you're a winged shirren, you either grow a second set of wings or your existing wings morph into a stronger set of wings, increasing your fly Speed to 25 feet.

Basic Leadership.name: Basic Leadership
Basic Leadership.description: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level envoy feat of your choice.

Basic Mystic Spellcasting.name: Basic Mystic Spellcasting
Basic Mystic Spellcasting.description: You gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.journals.JournalEntry.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.DOc3Pf8wmVxanTIv#basic-spellcasting-feat]{Basic Spellcasting} benefits. Each time you gain a spell slot of a new rank from the mystic archetype, add a spell of the appropriate spell rank to your repertoire: a common spell of your connection's tradition, or one of your connection's granted spells.

Basic Quantum Field.name: Basic Quantum Field
Basic Quantum Field.description: Your quantum field gains the effect of your chosen paradox.

Basic Warp Spell.name: Basic Warp Spell
Basic Warp Spell.description: You gain your paradox's initial warp spell. If you don't already have one, you also gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point, which you can Refocus by contemplating infinite worlds. (For more on warp spells, see page 165.)

Basic Witchwarper Spellcasting.name: Basic Witchwarper Spellcasting
Basic Witchwarper Spellcasting.description: You gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.journals.JournalEntry.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.DOc3Pf8wmVxanTIv#basic-spellcasting-feat]{Basic Spellcasting} benefits. Each time you gain a spell slot of a new rank from the witchwarper archetype, add a spell of the appropriate spell rank to your repertoire: a common spell of your paradox's tradition, or one of your paradox's granted spells.

Battle Cry.name: Grito de guerra
Battle Cry.description: Cuando tiras iniciativa, puedes lanzar un poderoso grito de guerra y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Desmoralizar} a un enemigo observado como acción gratuita. Si dispones del rango legendario en Intimidación, puedes usar una reacción para Desmoralizar a tu enemigo cuando obtienes un éxito crítico en una tirada de ataque.

Battle Medicine.name: Medicina de guerra
Battle Medicine.description:
Requisitos Tienes o sostienes material de curas.

Puedes apañar heridas, incluso en combate. Haz una prueba de Medicina con la misma CD que para @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1kGNdIIhuglAjIp9]{Tratar heridas}, con lo que restableces la correspondiente cantidad de PG; esto no elimina el estado herido. Igual que con Tratar heridas, puedes hacer pruebas contra CD mayores si tienes el rango de competencia mínimo. A continuación, el objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.2XEYQNZTCGpdkyR6]{inmune} a tu Medicina de guerra durante 1 día. Esto no le deja inmune a Tratar heridas ni cuenta como ello.

Battle Saint.name: Battle Saint
Battle Saint.description: You have ascended to the rank of living battle saint and are on a path to become a true divine servant of Damoritosh when you meet him in the afterlife. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.BHWG0rQPTgBF5Ye1]{Rocket Dash} and @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.o6YCGx4lycsYpww4]{Haste} as 7th-rank divine innate spells once per day each.

Battleblessed.name: Battleblessed
Battleblessed.description: You're an accomplished battledancer and warrior, blessed by seers, honed by ancestral tradition, and capable of feats beyond the natural abilities of your peers. You gain @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.KcLVELhCUcKXxiKE]{Tailwind} as a 1st-rank primal innate spell that you can cast once per day.

Big Bang.name: Big Bang
Big Bang.description:
Frequency once per hour

Requirements You're photon-attuned.

You manifest a fragment of the cosmic forces from the Universe's first moments, unleashing a blast of scouring cosmic fire that reverts all things to their basic components and overcomes even magical defenses. This deals @Damage[(max((@actor.level - 4),10))d6[fire]|options:area-damage] damage to all creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30]. You and any number of adjacent allies are unaffected by this Big Bang. Affected creatures can attempt a @Check[reflex|against:solarian|options:area-effect] save against your class DC.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage and @Damage[2d6[persistent,fire]|options:photon-attuned] damage.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and @Damage[4d6[persistent,fire]|options:photon-attuned] damage, and you can attempt to counteract a spell on the creature, using half your level, rounded up, as the counteract rank.

Level (+1) Increase the damage by 1d6.

Big Mouth.name: Boca grande
Big Mouth.description: Las bolsas de tus mejillas son especialmente elásticas. En lugar de almacenar hasta cuatro artículos de Light Bulk en las bolsas de tus mejillas, puedes almacenar hasta 1 Bulk de artículos. El tamaño máximo de un artículo determinado no cambia.

Binaric Assault.name: Binaric Assault
Binaric Assault.description: You coordinate your attacks with both your solar flare and solar weapon. Make two Strikes at the same target, one with your solar weapon and one with your solar flare, each using your current multiple attack penalty. You can make these Strikes in whichever order you desire. After the first time a Strike hits, resolve the damage and effects, then swap your current attunement. If both attacks fail to hit, you become unattuned. Binaric Assault counts as two attacks when calculating your multiple attack penalty.

Bioluminescence.name: Bioluminescence
Bioluminescence.description:
Your eyes glow like bioluminescent lamps, and you have learned how to focus them into a directional beam. Your eyes shed light in a 30 foot line in any direction you're looking.

You can suppress or restore this light as a free action. In addition, while this light is active you can take the Point Out action to indicate a creature within the area of your bioluminescence without making any noise, in which case it loses the auditory and manipulate traits. Finally, after you use an action to Hide or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak}, you can send predetermined signals with your lights to alert all allies you can see to your location as a free action.

Biting Corpsefolk.name: Biting Corpsefolk
Biting Corpsefolk.description:
A transformation after death twisted your body, elongating your teeth into fangs or sharpening your appendages into claws. When you select this feat, you gain one of the following unarmed attacks of your choice: claw or jaws. Both of these attacks are in the brawling weapon group and have the listed damage die and traits.

Claw 1d6 slashing (agile, finesse, unarmed)

Jaws 1d6 piercing (grapple, unarmed)

At 5th level, whenever you get a critical hit with one of these attacks, you get its critical specialization effect.

Special You can select this feat two times. Each time you do, select a different attack from the options listed above.

Bizarre Magic.name: Magia extraña
Bizarre Magic.description: Te puedes basar en extrañas variaciones en tu lanzamiento de conjuros, tanto si puedes lanzar conjuros ocultistas como si no. La CD para Reconocer los conjuros que lanzas e Identificar la magia que utilizas se incrementa en 5.

Black Hole.name: Black Hole
Black Hole.description:
Frequency once per 10 minutes

Requirements You're graviton-attuned.

You concentrate on the gravitational forces around you, pulling matter toward you in emulation of a black hole. Select any number of creatures within 30 feet. Each affected creature takes @Damage[(floor(@actor.level / 2)d8)[bludgeoning]|options:area-damage,forced-movement] damage and must attempt a @Check[fortitude|against:solarian] save against your class DC.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage and is pulled 5 feet toward you.

Failure The creature takes full damage, is pulled 15 feet toward you, and is @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} against the next melee attack that you attempt against it before the end of your current turn.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage, is pulled 30 feet toward you, and is knocked @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Level (+2) Increase the damage by 1d8.

Blazing Corona.name: Blazing Corona
Blazing Corona.description: Your ability to manipulate solar radiation has improved. You can manifest your wings to use Coronal Flare without any hands at any time, even if you are not in a vacuum. In addition, your Coronal Flare gains the Thrown 40 feet trait.

Blend In.name: Blend In
Blend In.description: You know how to blend in and become a forgettable face in the crowd. While in a crowd of at least 10 other creatures, you can roll a Society check in place of a Stealth check when using the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.IE2nThCmoyhQA0Jn]{Avoid Notice} exploration activity to see if enemies notice you. While in a settlement, you can use [[/act impersonate skill=society]]{Society} in place of Deception when Impersonating a non-specific individual.

Blood Feast.name: Blood Feast
Blood Feast.description:
Frequency once per day

Requirements Your last action was a successful Strike with an unarmed attack or commercial knife you created using your lineage.

By tapping into the latent necromantic energies that surround you, you leech vitality from nearby living creatures, healing your own body in the process. You cast @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.fd31tAHSSGXyOxW6]{Vampiric Exsanguination} as a 7th-rank divine innate spell, but the spell affects only the target of your last Strike.

Blood Sense.name: Blood Sense
Blood Sense.description: You have a keen sense of smell and are capable of detecting bloody wounds at a distance. You gain blood sense as an imprecise sense with a range of 30 feet. This means you can use your sense of smell to determine the exact location of a living creature who isn't at its full Hit Points. Creatures that don't have blood, such as oozes and most constructs, can't be detected with your blood sense.

Bloody Wounds.name: Bloody Wounds
Bloody Wounds.description: You know how to target your mark's vital spots, leaving bloody wounds. When you critically hit your mark, you deal persistent bleed damage to your mark equal to your number of @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.sLikawnrJJzHMYeC]{Aim} damage dice.

Bloomguard.name: Bloomguard
Bloomguard.description: After years of meritorious military service, you were chosen for the elite Bloomguard, where you underwent rigorous training that honed your defenses against the tricks of First World creatures. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Will saving throws and Will DCs against mental effects and effects created by fey, and once per day, you can roll twice and take the better on a save against a mental effect or an effect created by a fey.

Body Art.name: Body Art
Body Art.description: Your body is your canvas, and you've taken body modification to a whole new level. You gain an augmentation at no cost. The augmentation must be your level or lower. This augmentation doesn't count against the maximum number of augmentations you can implant, and each time you gain a new ancestry feat, you can upgrade this augmentation to a new augmentation of your level or lower at no cost, representing your continued exploration in body modification.

Bolstered By Battle.name: Bolstered By Battle
Bolstered By Battle.description:
Frequency once per hour

Trigger You deal the killing blow to an enemy.

You don't just fight because you have to; the threat of battle and the thrill of victory invigorate you. You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your level. These temporary Hit Points last for 1 minute or until the encounter ends, whichever comes first.

Bond Boost.name: Bond Boost
Bond Boost.description:
Trigger A bonded ally within 20 feet is about to roll a saving throw.

You channel a surge of energy through your bond, shielding your ally's body and mind. Your ally gains a +1 status bonus to the triggering saving throw. If they roll a success on the saving throw against a vitality or void effect, they get a critical success instead.

@UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feat-effects.Item.9Sq4P1Pxr1owEv6R]{Effect: Bond Boost}

Bond Spell.name: Bond Spell
Bond Spell.description:
Trigger An ally within 30 feet Casts a Spell.

You pulse energy through your bond as your ally casts a spell, empowering their spell in one of the following ways.

  • If their spell deals damage or heals Hit Points and doesn't have a duration, you grant that spell a status bonus to damage or healing equal to its rank.

    @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feat-effects.Item.WNCJ8ZgkqU7LhJNk]{Effect: Bond Spell}

  • If their spell doesn't have a spellshape effect applied to it, apply the effects of any one spellshape feat you know to the spell. The spellshape feat must be one that can be applied to the triggering spell, and you must be able to use it (for instance, if the spellshape feat is usable only a limited number of times per day).

Bondbearer.name: Bondbearer
Bondbearer.description: You and your bonded partner have learned the ancient art of dragonriding. Your bonded partner can ride you if they are one size category smaller than you (Medium size, for most dragonkin), rather than needing to be two size categories smaller. When your bonded partner rides you as a mount, your synchronicity enables them to gain three actions at the start of their turn, rather than the two they normally would for riding another PC. You still gain only two actions at the start of your turn, rather than three.

Bonded Transposition.name: Bonded Transposition
Bonded Transposition.description:
Frequency once every 10 minutes.

Trigger Your bonded partner is within 40 feet and would be damaged by an enemy.

Instinctively sensing your bonded partner is in danger, you swoop in to save them from harm. You and your bonded partner immediately swap places with one another, teleporting into one another's locations. The damage that would be dealt to your bonded partner is dealt to you instead.

Bone Shards.name: Bone Shards
Bone Shards.description:
Frequency once per 10 minutes

You break off a piece of your anatomy and fling sharp bone shards at your enemies. You gain a bone shards unarmed attack that deals 1d8 piercing damage. Your bone shards are in the projectile group and have the area (cone) trait with a range of 15 feet. This effect lasts 1 minute.

Borai Lore.name: Borai Lore
Borai Lore.description:
Since your resurrection, you've learned a lot about yourself, your place in the cycle of souls, and other undead. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Intimidation and Religion. If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice.

You also gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.BocFD2KV0qgUC76x]{Additional Lore} general feat for Borai Lore.

Born to Fly.name: Born to Fly
Born to Fly.description: You find flying exhilarating and live to perform impressive aerial maneuvers. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Acrobatics checks to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Qf1ylAbdVi1rkc8M]{Maneuver in Flight} and on Piloting checks to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.uS3qDAgOkZ7b8ERL]{Drive} a vehicle or starship. When you roll a critical failure on an Acrobatics check to Maneuver in Flight, you get a failure instead.

Borrow Spell.name: Borrow Spell
Borrow Spell.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger You use an action that Sustains your quantum field, and the quantum field is still active.

By reaching across both time and space, you can borrow the use of a spell from a version of yourself inhabiting another reality. During this turn, you can cast one spell without spending a spell slot to do so. The spell must be in your repertoire.

Bottomless Pockets.name: Bottomless Pockets
Bottomless Pockets.description: Your travels have taught you to pack smart for any situation. You've got really big pockets, and you've crammed a whole lot of useful stuff into them. You can use Just the Thing… once per hour, rather than once per day.

Boundless Brachiator.name: Boundless Brachiator
Boundless Brachiator.description: You can take a leap of faith and usually land on your feet. You can @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap} up to 30 feet in any direction without touching the ground and without requiring an Athletics check; when doing so, you must land on a surface you can Climb or adjacent to an Edge you can Grab within 30 feet of you, or else you fall after using your next action. You can exceed your normal Speed while Leaping.

Boundless Energy.name: Boundless Energy
Boundless Energy.description: Your wells of energy are unending, and your exuberance can't be contained. You can use @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.o7xxuslqMeEvsqha]{Zoomies} once every hour, rather than once per day.

Brainsplain.name: Brainsplain
Brainsplain.description:
Trigger You succeed at a check to Recall Knowledge to identify a foe within range of your limited telepathy.

Upon carefully analyzing a creature, you helpfully send it a telepathic lecture regarding its physiological and psychological inadequacies. For inexplicable reasons, doing so tends to aggravate the creature rather than educate it. The creature must attempt a @Check[will|against:class] save against your class DC. If you critically succeeded at the triggering check to Recall Knowledge, the target takes a –1 status penalty to its Will save. The creature is then temporarily immune for 24 hours.

Critical Success You accidentally overshare, exposing your own foibles. The creature gains a +1 circumstance bonus to its next attack roll against you, as long as that attack is made within 1 minute.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} for [[/gmr 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Critical Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} for 1 round, after which it is stupefied 1 for [[/gmr 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Breach.name: Breach
Breach.description:
You propel yourself up like a whale breaching the surface of the ocean, then crash back down with thunderous force. @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap}. When you land, all opponents within 10 feet of you must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|against:class-spell] save against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher, or be knocked @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Special If you have the Quick Jump feat, you can @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{High Jump} or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Long Jump} when using Breach.

Break Curse.name: Romper maldición
Break Curse.description: Inviertes 8 horas rezando o llevando a cabo rituales ocultista sobre el objetivo, debilitando el poder que sobre él tiene una maldición. Contrarrestas la maldición, utilizando Ocultismo o Religión para tu prueba de contrarrestar y la mitad de tu nivel redondeado hacia arriba para el rango de contrarrestar. Romper maldición tan sólo requiere 10 minutos de oración y rituales si tienes el rango legendario en Ocultismo o Religión.

prerequisites.value: rango maestro en Ocultismo o Religión

Breath Control.name: Control de la respiración
Breath Control.description: Puedes respirar incluso cuando el aire es peligroso o escaso. Puedes contener el aliento 25 veces más de lo normal antes de ahogarte. Obtienes un bonificador +1 por circunstancia a las tiradas de salvación contra las amenazas inhaladas, del tipo venenos que se transmiten por vía aérea y, si consigues un éxito en dicha tirada de salvación, en su lugar obtienes un éxito crítico.

Bring it On!.name: Bring it On!
Bring it On!.description:
Requirements You're wielding a two-handed weapon.

Your sheer bravado bolsters your defenses despite your recklessness. Until the start of your next turn, you take a –2 circumstance penalty to AC and gain resistance to all damage equal to half your level. If you have the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.class-features.Item.T78VQC8oaD1Odz1k]{Armor Storm} fighting style, this resistance is doubled against attacks made by suppressed creatures.

Broadside Charge.name: Broadside Charge
Broadside Charge.description:
Requirements You are wielding a gun and a melee weapon with the agile trait or a phase cutlass, each in a different hand.

Advancing with blade and pistol in hand, you make a ranged Strike, move up to your Speed, and make a melee Strike, each using your current multiple attack penalty and both at the same target. This counts as two attacks when calculating your multiple attack penalty.

Brood-Minder.name: Brood-Minder
Brood-Minder.description: You've served as, or are training to become, a brood-minder responsible for rearing and educating dozens of hatchlings. It's a multi-year job requiring extreme endurance. You become trained in Society. If you would automatically become trained in this skill (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. In addition, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus on saves to resist becoming @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued}.

Broodless.name: Broodless
Broodless.description: You grew up without a brood. Whether you were a lone survivor, became lost, or were raised offworld, you've learned to survive alone. You become trained in one of the following skills of your choice: Deception or Thievery. If you would automatically become trained in both of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. If you selected Deception, you gain the Charming Liar skill feat. If you selected Thievery, you gain the Subtle Theft skill feat.

Brutal Anatomy.name: Brutal Anatomy
Brutal Anatomy.description:
You're a natural predator trained to use part of your body as a weapon. When you select this feat, you gain one of the following unarmed attacks of your choice: claw, jaws, or tail. Each of these attacks is in the brawling weapon group.

A claw unarmed attack deals 1d6 slashing damage and has the agile, finesse, unarmed, and vesk traits.

A jaws unarmed attack deals 1d6 piercing damage and has the grapple, unarmed, and vesk traits.

A tail unarmed attack deals 1d6 bludgeoning damage and has the sweep, trip, unarmed, and vesk traits.

At 5th level, whenever you get a critical hit with one of these attacks, you get its critical specialization effect.

Special You can take this feat three times. Each time you do, select a different attack from the options listed above.

Brutal Barrage.name: Brutal Barrage
Brutal Barrage.description:
Requirements You're wielding an area or automatic weapon.

You prepare the perfect shot, able to tear through those closest to the impact point. If your next action is to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.oc0ZKnk5zD0GXqZi]{Area Fire}, @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.6ctkxUnVwqooSvgg]{Auto-Fire}, or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.xND8wnEdnGSq84kn]{Whirling Swipe}, add two additional weapon damage dice to targets who are adjacent to the center point of impact or within the first 10 feet of a cone or line.

Brutal Blows.name: Brutal Blows
Brutal Blows.description:
Requirements You have at least one active hand free and are holding nothing in your other pair of hands.

You pummel an opponent mercilessly. Make a fist Strike against an adjacent creature. If the Strike hits, you automatically @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} the target in your inactive hands and make a second fist Strike with the following success conditions; the second Strike applies your multiple attack penalty as normal.

Critical Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}, and @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} for 1 round.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} for 1 round.

Bullet Dance.name: Bullet Dance
Bullet Dance.description:
Requirements You're wielding a gun.

You dance across the battlefield while dispatching enemies with precision and grace. Stride up to twice. You can make up to three ranged Strikes during this movement. Each ranged Strike you make must target a different creature within your first range increment (calculated from the point at which you took your attack at that target). Each attack counts toward your multiple attack penalty but doesn't increase your penalty until you've made all your attacks.

Bullet Fever.name: Bullet Fever
Bullet Fever.description:
Frequency once per hour

Trigger You take damage that would reduce you to 0 Hit Points.

You fly into a frenzy instead of accepting defeat. Instead of being knocked out, you're reduced to 1 Hit Point, gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your half you level for 1 minute, increase your wounded value by 1, and enter a frenzy that lasts for 1 minute. You can't voluntarily end your frenzy. While in a frenzy caused by Bullet Fever, you're affected as follows.

  • You automatically apply precision damage to all targets as though you were Aiming.
  • You take a –1 circumstance penalty to AC.
  • You take a –1 circumstance penalty to Will saves.

  • You can't take actions that don't have the attack or move traits except to Reload your weapons.

When Bullet Fever ends, you lose any remaining temporary Hit Points from Bullet Fever.

Bullet Hell.name: Bullet Hell
Bullet Hell.description:
Requirements You're wielding an automatic or area (cone) weapon.

You fire your weapon in sustained bursts to unleash a consistent deluge of firepower that tears apart the terrain to become treacherous. Make an @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.oc0ZKnk5zD0GXqZi]{Area Fire} or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.6ctkxUnVwqooSvgg]{Auto-Fire} attack with your weapon. Until the start of your next turn, any creature that moves through the area you attacked takes 1d4 damage of the same type as the weapon fired per square traversed, with a @Check[reflex|against:soldier|basic|options:area-effect] save at the end of each move action it takes through the area. On a failure, a creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.enA7BxAjBb7ns1iF]{Suppressed} until the start of your next turn.

Bullet Typhoon.name: Bullet Typhoon
Bullet Typhoon.description: Your destructive power has become second nature as enemies stand in awe of your overwhelming firepower. You can use the Area Fire or Auto-Fire attacks as a single action. However, you can never make more than two such attacks in the same round.

Buoy.name: Buoy
Buoy.description:
Trigger An ally within 60 feet fails a Will saving throw.

You shout or sign encouragement to an ally in their time of need, buoying their spirits and hardening their resolve. Your ally rerolls the triggering check but must use the new result, even if it's worse. If you shout, Buoy gains the auditory trait. If you sign, Buoy gains the visual trait.

Burst Fire.name: Burst Fire
Burst Fire.description: You squeeze the trigger and release a calculated burst of fire. If you make your second Strike from @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.l5v7SnMbgsVGCsMA]{Double Tap} with the same gun, Double Tap counts as one attack when calculating your multiple attack penalty, and you apply your precision damage bonus from @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.sLikawnrJJzHMYeC]{Aim} to both Strikes.

Burst of Strength.name: Burst of Strength
Burst of Strength.description:
Frequency once per hour

Trigger You fail an Athletics check to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm}, @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple}, @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.lOE4yjUnETTdaf2T]{Reposition}, @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove}, or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip}.

You draw on your inner reserves and rally yourself to try again. Reroll the triggering check, but you must use the new result, even if it's worse.

Byzantine Linguistics.name: Byzantine Linguistics
Byzantine Linguistics.description:
You've spent hours poring over dusty tombs and ancient inscriptions, giving you practiced insight into linguistic problems. You gain access to uncommon languages that are restricted due to belonging to ancient civilizations or long-lost cultures. This does not give you access to languages that are restricted for additional reasons, such as not being decoded yet or being a secret language.

You can use Society or Delve Lore to Decipher Writing and you gain a +1 circumstance bonus on checks made to decipher text in a language that you don't know.

Calm Before the Storm.name: Calm Before the Storm
Calm Before the Storm.description: You maintain a calm demeanor even when facing mortal peril. When frightened, at the end of your turn, reduce your frightened condition by 2 instead of 1.

Camouvisage.name: Camouvisage
Camouvisage.description: You shift the color and texture of your skin to match your surroundings. You Change Shape, but instead of taking on the form of another creature, you blend in with your environment. As long as an observer is at least 20 feet away from you, you don't need cover from that observer to Hide or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak}. This lasts as long as you stay in your new form or until you move to an area with substantially different terrain.

Canny Acumen.name: Perspicacia astuta
Canny Acumen.description: Tu capacidad de evitar ser observado esta más allá de la capacidad de la mayoría de personas de tu profesión. Elige entre salvaciones de Fortaleza, de Reflejos, de Voluntad o pruebas de Percepción. Obtienes el rango experto en lo elegido. A 17.º nivel, obtienes el rango maestro.

Canny Survivor.name: Canny Survivor
Canny Survivor.description: Your survival instincts are honed by a life of danger and scarcity, and you've learned to never let your guard down. You are not @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} against @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} creatures. In addition, you can use @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.WXyalVd471MVyoN6]{Survivor's Instincts} anytime you would attempt a Reflex save.

Cantrip Expansion.name: Expansión de truco
Cantrip Expansion.description:
Bardo, Oráculo, Hechicero El estudio amplía tu gama de conjuros sencillos.

Clérigo Estudias una gama más amplia de conjuros sencillos.

Mago, Magus El estudio dedicado te permite preparar una gama más amplia de conjuros simples para cada situación.

Psíquico Expandes lo que tu mente puede lograr.

Brujo Tu patrón reconoce tu necesidad de ser flexible y versátil y te concede el poder de preparar una gama más amplia de conjuros sencillos.

Preparado Puedes preparar dos trucos adicionales cada día.

Espontáneo Añade dos trucos adicionales de tu lista de conjuros a tu repertorio.

Careful Strike.name: Careful Strike
Careful Strike.description:
You focus on your solar weapon's trajectory so you can adjust it up to the last possible moment and turn a missed attack into a glancing blow. Make a Strike with your solar flare or solar weapon. It gains the following failure effect.

Failure Your attack deals damage equal to your Strength modifier. It doesn't count as a hit and doesn't trigger any other special abilities.

Carrion Feeder.name: Carrion Feeder
Carrion Feeder.description: Once per day as an Interact action, you can siphon nutrients from a dead creature. You consume part of a creature that hasn't been dead for more than 24 hours, and you heal 3d8 Hit Points, plus 1d8 for every 2 of your levels beyond 5th (@Damage[(ceil(@actor.level/2)d8)[healing]]).

Cat Fall.name: Caída de gato
Cat Fall.description: Tu agilidad aérea gatuna te permite amortiguar tus caídas. Tratas tus caídas como 10 pies (3 m) más cortas. Si tienes el rango experto en Acrobacias, trátalas como 25 pies (7,5 m) más cortas y 50 pies (15 m) si tienes el rango maestro. Si tienes el rango legendario en Acrobacias, siempre aterrizas de pie y no sufres daño, sea cual sea la distancia de la caída.

Cautious Trespasser.name: Cautious Trespasser
Cautious Trespasser.description: You grew up in a dangerous environment that taught you to be wary. You can perform the Investigate exploration activity at the same time as the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.TiNDYUGlMmxzxBYU]{Search} exploration activity.

Cellular Acceleration.name: Cellular Acceleration
Cellular Acceleration.description:
Frequency once per day

You speed up your body's metabolism and respiration by changing yourself at a cellular level. You become @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} for 1 minute and can use the extra action each round only for Strike and Stride actions.

Cellular Adaptation.name: Cellular Adaptation
Cellular Adaptation.description: The malleable nature of your body dulls the impact of physical ailments. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against diseases, poisons, and radiation. If you roll a success on a saving throw against one of these effects, you get a critical success instead.

Cellular Regeneration.name: Cellular Regeneration
Cellular Regeneration.description:
Frequency once per day

Your body can repair damaged cells and even regrow missing limbs. You gain regeneration equal to half your level for 1 minute. During this time, you can't die from damage and your dying condition can't increase to a value that would kill you, though if your @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded} value becomes 4 or higher, you stay @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} until your wounds are treated. Each time you regain Hit Points from regeneration, you also regrow one damaged or ruined organ (if any), and you can reattach severed body parts by spending an Interact action to hold the body part to the area it was severed from.

Center Thoughts.name: Center Thoughts
Center Thoughts.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger You fail a Will saving throw against a mental effect.

You center your thoughts and focus your mind, shaking off emotional turmoil and harmful mental intrusions. Reroll the triggering saving throw and use the better result.

Centered Mind.name: Centered Mind
Centered Mind.description: You know your own mind and instinctively resist attempts to unbalance your thoughts or control your emotions. You can use @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.sobAVW9cH4VGaRkn]{Center Thoughts} once per hour, rather than once per day.

Cerebral Circumvention.name: Cerebral Circumvention
Cerebral Circumvention.description:
Trigger A Telepredicted creature uses an effect that requires a Reflex save or attempts to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm} or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} you.

Requirements You have a bonus against the target using Telepredict.

By reading cues and analyzing probability outcomes, you smoothly predicting your opponent's next move. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your Reflex save or Reflex DC against the triggering action. Increase this bonus to +2 if you've dealt mental damage to the target since the last time you used Telepredict.

Change of Plans.name: Change of Plans
Change of Plans.description:
Trigger The target of your @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.cmCtfURzpbzkxWsy]{Get 'Em!} is reduced to 0 Hit Points.

Requirements You used Get 'Em! against a creature on your last turn.

When the target you directed your allies to take down falls @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} or is destroyed, you quickly direct them at another target. You use Get 'Em! against a new target following all the normal targeting restrictions for Get 'Em! You don't count as leading by example against this new target.

Charming Liar.name: Mentiroso encantador
Charming Liar.description: Tu encanto te permite ganarte a aquellos a los que mientes. Cuando obtienes un éxito crítico utilizando la acción @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ewwCglB7XOPLUz72]{Mentir}, la actitud del objeto hacia ti mejora un paso, como si hubieras tenido éxito utilizando Diplomacia para @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Causar impresión}. Esto sólo funciona una vez por conversación y, si obtienes un éxito crítico contra múltiples objetivos utilizando el mismo resultado, eliges la criatura a la que mejorar la actitud. Tienes que estar mintiendo para impartir una información aparentemente importante, exagerar tu estatus o caer en gracia, es decir: cosas que no se pueden conseguir con mentiras triviales o irrelevantes.

Chattermander.name: Chattermander
Chattermander.description: You never let the inability to communicate stop you from chatting with nufriends! You gain @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.BBvV7qoXGdw09q1C]{Speak with Animals} as a 2nd-rank primal innate spell, and @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.qvwIwJ9QBihy8R0t]{Speak with Plants} and translate as 3rd-rank primal innate spells. You can cast each of these primal innate spells once per day.

Check it Out!.name: Check it Out!
Check it Out!.description: You've poured all your creativity into making your weapon truly eye-catching. Choose one weapon you own to decorate in your own style. While wielding your chosen weapon, add the weapon's tracking value as an item bonus to Deception checks to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint} and Intimidation checks to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize}. You can only have one such weapon active at a time. You can spend 24 hours customizing a new weapon, at which point your connection with your previous weapon is lost.

Cheek Pouches.name: Bolsas para las mejillas
Cheek Pouches.description:
Tus mejillas son elásticas y puedes guardar hasta cuatro artículos de Light Bulk o menos en estas bolsas para las mejillas. Ninguno de estos artículos puede tener una dimensión mayor a 1 pie.

Mientras tengas al menos un objeto en las bolsas de tus mejillas, tu discurso será notablemente difícil de entender.

Colocar un objeto en la bolsa de tu mejilla o recuperar uno es una acción de Interactuar. Podrás vaciar tu boca con una sola acción, provocando que todo lo que teníasalmacenado en las bolsas de tus mejillas para caer al suelo en tu cuadrado.

Cheer Up.name: Cheer Up
Cheer Up.description: You encourage an adjacent ally to overcome their minor ailments by patting them on the back, providing them useful advice, or offering some form of comfort or inspiration. The target reduces the value of one of the following conditions of their choice by 2: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy}, @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled}, @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened}, @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened}, @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied}. The target then becomes temporarily immune to Cheer Up for 1 day.

Child of the Red Planet.name: Child of the Red Planet
Child of the Red Planet.description: Calling upon your birthright as a shobhad, you channel the spirit of your ancestral home world of Akiton to encase you in a forbidding aura that causes your enemies to shy away from you in fear. Clad in the glory of the red planet, none can stand before you! You can cast @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.yrZA4k2VAqEP8xx7]{Repulsion} once per day as a primal innate spell. Creatures from Akiton take a –2 penalty to their Will saves against this effect.

Cleanse Spirit.name: Cleanse Spirit
Cleanse Spirit.description: Through your knowledge of traditional kasathan healing rituals and meditative practices, you've learned to cleanse the body and mind of the ill or troubled. You gain @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.SUKaxVZW2TlM8lu0]{Cleanse Affliction} and @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Et8RSCLx8w7uOLvo]{Sound Body} as 4th-rank occult innate spells. You can cast each of these occult innate spells once per day.

Clever Improviser.name: Improvisador astuto
Clever Improviser.description: Has aprendido a manejar las situaciones cuando te encuentras fuera de lugar. Obtienes la dote general @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.9jGaBxLUtevZYcZO]{Improvisación no entrenada}. Además, puedes llevar a cabo acciones de habilidad que normalmente requieren estar entrenado, incluso si no lo estás.

Climbing Claws.name: Garras trepadoras
Climbing Claws.description: Puedes extender tus garras para ayudarte a escalar. Obtienes una velocidad de ascenso de 10 pies.

Clinging Bite.name: Clinging Bite
Clinging Bite.description: You have excellent control over your stomach-mouth. Your jaws unarmed attack gains the grapple trait. When you critically hit with your jaws attack, you can use your next action to attempt to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} that creature with your jaws or automatically extend the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} condition on a creature you're restraining with your jaws. This attempt neither applies nor counts toward your multiple attack penalty.

Clinging Flare.name: Clinging Flare
Clinging Flare.description: Your flare wraps around your foes on impact, entangling them. Make a solar flare Strike. On a hit, the target is @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} until the end of its next turn or until it Escapes (against your class DC), whichever comes first. On a critical hit, the target is additionally @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} for as long as it's immobilized.

Cloaking Field.name: Cloaking Field
Cloaking Field.description:
Frequency once per hour

You bend light and background vibrations around yourself, either through expertise or a bit of technological ingenuity, allowing you to avoid detection. You become @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} for 10 minutes. This makes you @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} to all creatures, though creatures can attempt to find you, making you @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} instead. If you use a hostile action, the effect ends after that hostile action is completed. While your Cloaking Field is active, security cameras, sentries, and other surveillance don't detect you unless they possess special senses that normally see through invisibility.

Cloud Storage.name: Cloud Storage
Cloud Storage.description: You can use your vitality network as an extradimensional storage space, sliding items into and out of thin air as if it were a @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.equipment.Item.EAMHdtJLqWUO0ZU0]{Null Space Chamber}. You can Interact with an item that weighs 1 Bulk or less to stow it into your Cloud Storage. A creature in your bond and on the same plane can remove an item from your Cloud Storage as an Interact action, but doing so takes 2 actions instead of 1 action. Your Cloud Storage has a capacity of 12 Bulk. This increases to 25 Bulk at 8th level, 50 Bulk at 12th level, and 75 Bulk at 16th level.

Clustered Shots.name: Clustered Shots
Clustered Shots.description:
Requirements You're wielding a gun with at least 3 expend worth of ammunition.

You shoot a spray of bullets at a target. You @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.sLikawnrJJzHMYeC]{Aim}, make a ranged Strike against your mark, and subtract three times your weapon's expend from its magazine. Roll the attack twice, and use the better result. The attack ignores circumstance penalties to the attack roll and any flat check required due to the target being @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden}.

Coagulation.name: Coagulation
Coagulation.description: Your blood coagulates into sludge, making your body more resilient against attacks that rip and shred. You gain resistance to bleed and precision damage equal to your level. The DC of your flat checks to recover from persistent bleed damage is 13 rather than 15. This reduces to 8 rather than 10 when receiving appropriate assistance.

Collateral Witness.name: Collateral Witness
Collateral Witness.description:
Trigger You reduce your primary target to 0 Hit Points using @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.6ctkxUnVwqooSvgg]{Auto-Fire}.

With a subtle gesture of your weapon and a stare, you remind a survivor of your onslaught that there's more where that came from. @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize} a single creature that was in the area of your Auto-Fire; you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to this check.
