You gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.kF6CV5Jo4gfz4gVs]{Soul Shield} reaction.

Exceptional Reach.name: Exceptional Reach
Exceptional Reach.description: You can leverage your size and strength alongside lengthy and heavy weapons to strike foes who would normally be safe from you. While in this stance, when you wield a melee weapon that requires two hands and doesn't have reach, you can change between a typical two-handed grip and an extended two-handed grip using an Interact action. Weapons wielded in your extended two-handed grip have a reach of 10 feet.

Expanded Connection.name: Expanded Connection
Expanded Connection.description: Increase the number of spells in your repertoire and number of spell slots you gain from mystic archetype feats by 1 for each spell rank other than your two highest mystic spell slots.

Expanded Senses.name: Sentidos ampliados
Expanded Senses.description:
Tu eidolon desarrolla sentidos más agudos.

Tu eidolon gana visión en la penumbra y en la oscuridad, así como el olfato como un sentido impreciso con un alcance de 30 pies.

Expanded Solar Reserves.name: Expanded Solar Reserves
Expanded Solar Reserves.description: Your starburst markings can store much greater reserves of solar energy, enabling you to heal yourself more frequently. The frequency of Siphon Solar Vitality increases to once per hour, rather than once per day.

Expansive Verse.name: Expansive Verse
Expansive Verse.description: Your songs become more complex and tinged with greater magic. Each day during your daily preparations, you can choose one common 2nd-rank spell from the occult spell list. You can cast this spell as an occult innate spell once before your next daily preparations.

Expeditious Search.name: Búsqueda expeditiva
Expeditious Search.description: Dispones de un sistema que te permite buscar a gran velocidad, encontrando detalles y secretos el doble de rápido que los demás. Cuando Buscas, te cuesta la mitad de lo normal @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.TiNDYUGlMmxzxBYU]{Buscar} en una área determinada. Esto significa que cuando exploras, doblas la Velocidad que puedes mover a la vez que te aseguras de que has Buscado en un área antes de ir a la siguiente (hasta la mitad de tu Velocidad). Si tienes el rango legendario en Percepción, en su lugar Buscas en una área 4 veces más rápido.

Experienced Professional.name: Profesional Experto
Experienced Professional.description: Salvaguardas con cuidado tus empeños profesionales para evitar el desastre. Cuando utilizas Saber para @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.QyzlsLrqM0EEwd7j]{Obtener ingresos}, si sufres un fallo crítico, en su lugar sufres un fallo. Si tienes el rango experto en Saber, obtienes el doble de ingresos de una prueba fallida de Obtener ingresos, a menos que fuera originalmente un fallo crítico.

Experienced Smuggler.name: Contrabandista experto
Experienced Smuggler.description:
A menudo pasas cosas de contrabando ante las autoridades. Cuando el DJ realiza tu prueba de Sigilo para ver si un observador pasivo nota un objeto pequeño que tienes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Oculto}, el DJ usa el número obtenido o 10, el que sea mayor, como resultado de tu tirada del dado, agregándolo a tu modificador de Sigilo. para determinar el resultado de tu prueba de Sigilo. Si eres un maestro en Sigilo, el DJ usa el número obtenido o 15, y si eres legendario en Sigilo, automáticamente logras ocultar una pequeñaObjeto oculto a observadores pasivos. Esto no proporciona ningún beneficio cuando una criatura intenta una prueba de Percepción mientras te busca activamente @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Escondido} elementos.

Nota PFS Esta dote te permite obtener ingresos con Saber (bajos fondos) en tareas de tu nivel -1 (en lugar del nivel normal -2).

Experienced Tracker.name: Rastreador experto
Experienced Tracker.description: Rastrear es para ti instintivo y, cuando es necesario, puedes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{seguir un rastro} sin detenerte. Puedes Rastrear moviéndote a tu Velocidad completa, aceptando un penalizador -5 a tu prueba de Supervivencia. Si tienes el rango maestro en Supervivencia, el penalizador -5 no se te aplica. Si tienes el rango legendario en Supervivencia, no te hace falta tirar una nueva prueba de Supervivencia cada hora cuando rastreas, aunque sigues teniendo que tirar si hay cambios significativos en el rastro.

prerequisites.value: master in Arcana or Occultism, depending on paradox

Explosive Deflection.name: Explosive Deflection
Explosive Deflection.description:
Trigger You're in the area of a grenade explosion.

Requirements You're aware of the attack, wielding a gun, and not @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard}.

You attempt to detonate the grenade with a well-timed shot from your gun. Expend an amount of ammunition from your gun equal to its usage, as if you'd fired the gun. You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to your Reflex save against the triggering grenade. Determine if you succeed on your save before rolling for anyone else in the area. If you succeed on your Reflex save, you cause the grenade to explode prematurely. Select a space of your choice directly between you and the attacker. The deflected grenade explodes in the selected space, and you don't need to save again if you're in the new explosion area.

Explosive Surprise.name: Explosive Surprise
Explosive Surprise.description: You've mastered the infamous ysoki martial art of spitting a live grenade from your mouth. It takes 10 minutes to safely prepare a grenade and store it in your cheek pouch. As a single action, you can draw and throw this specially prepared grenade using your mouth. You don't need a free hand to do so.

Express Driver.name: Conductor expreso
Express Driver.description: Puedes optimizar el rendimiento de tu vehículo, obteniendo velocidad adicional y eligiendo caminos para evitar desaceleraciones. Al calcular su velocidad de viaje para el día mientras conduce un vehículo, puede intentar una prueba de Conocimiento de conducción para aumentar la velocidad de viaje de su vehículo. La CD la determina el GM, pero normalmente se basa en la CD de pilotaje del vehículo o en una dificultad basada en el entorno, lo que sea más difícil. Si tiene éxito, aumente la velocidad de desplazamiento de su vehículo a la mitad. Esto no tiene ningún efecto en suel movimiento del vehículo en los encuentros.

Extend Directive.name: Extend Directive
Extend Directive.description:
Trigger Your turn begins, and you issued a 2-action directive on your last turn.

With exceptional flair, you can repeat your orders with a single word or gesture. You immediately issue the 1-action version of the directive that you issued on your previous turn.

Extended Vitality.name: Extended Vitality
Extended Vitality.description: You can feel and reach out to your bonded allies regardless of range. You can @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.UeMHbnnaXDa3sGfG]{Transfer Vitality} to any bonded ally as long as they're on the same planet as you.

Extreme Accuracy.name: Extreme Accuracy
Extreme Accuracy.description: When you @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.sLikawnrJJzHMYeC]{Aim}, the benefits apply if your mark is within range up to your weapon's fourth range increment. Additionally, you ignore the penalty for attacking your mark at up to four range increments away.

Face in the Crowd.name: Face in the Crowd
Face in the Crowd.description:
You know how to get lost in a crowd. You can use cover from crowds to Hide and @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak}, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to your Stealth checks when in a crowd of at least 10 creatures and a +4 circumstance bonus to your Stealth checks when in a crowd of at least 100 creatures. Hidden creatures don't count as members of a crowd. If you're a master in Deception you only need 5 creatures to get these bonuses.

@UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feat-effects.Item.IaICLG7zwOV4OKgM]{Effect: Face in the Crowd}

Fan the Hammer.name: Fan the Hammer
Fan the Hammer.description:
Frequency once per round

Requirements Your last action this turn was an Area Fire or Auto-Fire.

You hold down the trigger and continue blasting. You Area Fire or Auto-Fire, ignoring your weapon's unwieldy trait. You don't designate a primary target with this attack, and creatures you damage with this attack don't gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.enA7BxAjBb7ns1iF]{Suppressed} condition.

Fantastic Ferocity.name: Fantastic Ferocity
Fantastic Ferocity.description:
Trigger You use Shobhad Ferocity.

You continue to battle even as you acquire mortal injuries. Make a single Strike. If this Strike brings a foe to 0 Hit Points, this activation of Shobhad Ferocity doesn't count against its frequency.

Far-Reaching Mind.name: Far-Reaching Mind
Far-Reaching Mind.description: Through rigorous mental exercises or natural talent, your psychic senses extend farther than average. Increase the ranges of your limited telepathy and thoughtsense by 10 feet each.

Fascinating Performance.name: Interpretación fascinante
Fascinating Performance.description:
Cuando @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.EEDElIyin4z60PXx]{Interpretas}, compara tu resultado con la CD de Voluntad de un observador. Si tienes éxito, el objetivo queda @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Fascinado} por ti durante 1 asalto. Si el observador está en una situación que exige atención inmediata, como por ejemplo un combate, debes obtener un éxito crítico para fascinarlo y la acción de Interpretar obtiene el rasgo incapacitación. Tienes que elegir a qué criatura quieres fascinar antes de hacer la tirada, y el objetivo queda a continuación inmune temporalmente durante 1 hora.

Si tienes el rango experto en Interpretación, puedes fascinar hasta a 4 observadores; si tienes el rango maestro, hasta a 10; y si tienes el rango legendario, puedes fascinar a cualquier número de observadores al mismo tiempo.

Fast Recovery.name: Recuperación rápida
Fast Recovery.description: Tu cuerpo se recupera rápidamente de las aflicciones. Recuperas el doble de Puntos de Golpe debido al descanso. Cada vez que tienes éxito en una prueba de Fortaleza contra una enfermedad o veneno continuados, reduces en 2 su estado o en 1 contra una enfermedad o veneno virulento. Cada éxito contra una enfermedad o veneno reduce en 3 su estado o en 2 contra una enfermedad o veneno virulento. Además, reduces en 2 la gravedad de tu estado drenado cuando descansas una noche, en lugar de 1.

Fast Synergy.name: Fast Synergy
Fast Synergy.description: People follow your lead because you help push them to their ultimate potential. Each of your allies gain a second reaction if they start their turn within 100 feet of you and can perceive you. This second reaction can only be used for directives you issue.

Favored Disguise.name: Favored Disguise
Favored Disguise.description: You create a favored disguise that you can call upon at a moment's notice. When you Impersonate, you can decide that the disguise becomes your favored disguise. If you have a holoskin or can Change Shape, you can always adopt your favored disguise when Impersonating. You still roll Deception for the Impersonate check but count any critical failure results as failures instead. You can have one favored disguise and gain an additional favored disguise you can employ at expert, master, and legendary proficiency in Deception.

Fearless.name: Fearless
Fearless.description: Whether it comes from a sense of duty or a desire to succeed, you rarely flinch when confronted by fearsome foes. If you roll a success on a saving throw against a fear effect, you get a critical success instead.

Fearsome.name: Fearsome
Fearsome.description:
You're as fearsome as a dragon. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Intimidation. If you would automatically become trained in Intimidation (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice.

You also gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.xQMz6eDgX75WX2ce]{Intimidating Glare} skill feat.

Feather Step.name: Paso de pluma
Feather Step.description: Das pasos rápidos y cuidadosos. Puedes dar Pasos en terreno difícil.

Feign Death.name: Feign Death
Feign Death.description:
Trigger You take damage.

You lie @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} and Impersonate a corpse. As long as you don't take any actions requiring anything other than your mind, you appear dead. To see through your ruse, a creature must succeed at a check against your Deception DC, either by Seeking or Recalling Knowledge. You can Ready an Action without ending this effect if you're a master in Deception.

Ferocious Recovery.name: Ferocious Recovery
Ferocious Recovery.description: When you bounce back from the brink of death, you experience a spike of adrenaline that allows you to ignore grievous injury. Whenever you use @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.gD7l0iYrsdKMCmyV]{Shobhad Ferocity}, you gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level that last for 1 minute.

Filtering Tentacles.name: Filtering Tentacles
Filtering Tentacles.description:
The sensory tentacles covering the lower part of your face are sensitive enough to detect toxins. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against ingested or inhaled poisons.

Special You can take this feat only at 1st level, and you can't retrain out of or into this feat.

Fish in a Barrel.name: Fish in a Barrel
Fish in a Barrel.description: As the old saying goes: hitting easy targets is like shooting fish in a barrel. You @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.sLikawnrJJzHMYeC]{Aim} and then make a ranged Strike against a @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} creature not benefiting from cover. Treat a success as a critical success. If you roll a critical success, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} and @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.enA7BxAjBb7ns1iF]{Suppressed} until the beginning of your next turn.

Fissile Budding.name: Fissile Budding
Fissile Budding.description:
Frequency once per day

You can use Change Shape to split two of your identities into two different bodies, each using a unique form and identity. Each copy Strides to an unoccupied square. Both you and your copy act on your turn and use the same pool of actions, the same multiple attack penalty, and the same pool of Hit Points, but if both forms take damage from the same effect, such as from an attack or spell with area damage, you apply the damage only once. In the case of an effect with a save that affects both forms, you take the worse result and apply it to both forms. When this effect ends, you choose one of the two forms as your actual form and the other version of you Strides once toward you before becoming an arm that melds with your body as soon as it occupies the same square as you. If you can't retrieve your arm, you lose the ability to Change Shape into that copy's form and lose the use of that limb until it regrows in 1 week. This effect automatically ends if you are reduced to 0 Hit Points, if you occupy the same square as your copy, or after 1 minute.

Fixation.name: Fixation
Fixation.description: You're fascinated with a particular topic, such as the religion of a small sect of worshippers, the process of spaghettification, or the songs sung by asterays. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.BocFD2KV0qgUC76x]{Additional Lore} feat and the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.W6Gl9ePmItfDHji0]{Assurance} feat for the chosen Lore.

Flashing Fit.name: Flashing Fit
Flashing Fit.description: Years of careful attention to your look have given you a deep understanding of the interplay between color, texture, and light, and you know how to make your outfit catch anyone's eye. You gain @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.RQjSQVZRG497cJhX]{Vibrant Pattern} as a 6th-rank primal innate spell that you can cast once per day. At 17th level, increase the area of your vibrant pattern innate spell to a @Template[type:burst|distance:20].

Flatten Body.name: Flatten Body
Flatten Body.description: You can flatten your body completely to avoid getting hurt. Change Shape and Drop Prone to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.ust1jJSCZQUhBZIz]{Take Cover} by hunkering down. You can Hide and @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak} due to the greater cover and don't lose the benefits of Take Cover when you Sneak.

Fleet.name: Pies ligeros
Fleet.description: Te mueves más rápidamente a pie. Tu Velocidad se incrementa en 5 pies (1,5 m).

Flicker Strike.name: Flicker Strike
Flicker Strike.description:
You attack a target with your solar weapon, harnessing the collision's energy to attack another foe at the speed of light. Make a Strike with your solar weapon. On a hit, you teleport up to your Speed into an unoccupied square within reach of a different creature and then immediately make a solar weapon Strike against them. If your initial Strike fails, you don't teleport, and the action ends.

Graviton-Attuned Increase the range to double your Speed.

Photon-Attuned If a Strike made as part of this action is a critical success, the struck target is @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} until the end of its next turn.

Flip the Script.name: Flip the Script
Flip the Script.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger You roll initiative.

All the world is a stage and you know the script—you anticipate the direction of the scene and then change it up on your opponents. You can choose to roll twice and take the better result, substituting Performance for the statistic you would normally use for initiative.

Floating Balance.name: Floating Balance
Floating Balance.description: You are accustomed to floating free in the wide ocean and don't lose your cool when you have nothing within reach. You don't gain the clumsy or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} conditions when untethered.

Floating Flight.name: Floating Flight
Floating Flight.description: The membranous webbing between your limbs and torso grows strong enough to function as true wings when you're floating. When you're in low or zero gravity, you gain a Fly speed equal to your Swim speed.

Fluid Anatomy.name: Fluid Anatomy
Fluid Anatomy.description:
Frequency once per hour

Trigger An enemy scores a critical hit against you with a Strike.

Your anatomy adjusts to distribute damage from vital areas. The triggering attack deals only the damage it would deal on a hit (typically normal damage instead of double damage). Any other effects of the attack caused by a critical hit still occur, such as critical specializations effects. Until the beginning of your next turn, you're @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} against the triggering enemy.

Fly Anything.name: Fly Anything
Fly Anything.description: You can intuit how even the most interesting vehicles function. You can pilot a ship even if it would be physiologically impossible for you, including those that require telepathy or other supernatural abilities. You can use Piloting instead of Crafting to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.bT3skovyLUtP22ME]{Repair} a part of a vehicle, starship, or mech with a –2 circumstance penalty as long as you have the appropriate parts available to you. You can use Piloting instead of Computers to Hack a vehicle, starship, or mech with a –2 circumstance penalty.

Focus Pheromones.name: Focus Pheromones
Focus Pheromones.description:
Frequency once per hour

You can purposefully deploy your pheromones to manipulate the reactions of those around you. If your next action is to attempt a Deception check to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.GkmbTGfg8KcgynOA]{Create a Diversion}, a Diplomacy check to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.DCb62iCBrJXy0Ik6]{Request}, or an Intimidation check to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize}, roll that skill check twice and use the better result.

Fog of War.name: Fog of War
Fog of War.description:
Requirements You're wielding an area or automatic weapon.

The flash and smoke from your frenzied gunfire conceals you from any enemies who might be left standing in the aftermath. You @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.oc0ZKnk5zD0GXqZi]{Area Fire} or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.6ctkxUnVwqooSvgg]{Auto-Fire}. You leave behind a cloud of smoke and dust within the area that lasts until the end of your next turn or until dissipated by a strong wind (whichever happens first). Creatures in the area have the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} condition, and all other creatures are concealed to them.

Foil Senses.name: Frustrar los sentidos
Foil Senses.description: Tienes una gran habilidad para frustrar los sentidos especiales de las criaturas y eres lo suficientemente cauteloso como para precaverte contra ellos en todo momento. Siempre que utilizas las acciones @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.IE2nThCmoyhQA0Jn]{Evitar ser visto}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Esconderte} o @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Movimiento furtivo} se considera que tomas precauciones contra los sentidos especiales.

Folded Paradoxes.name: Folded Paradoxes
Folded Paradoxes.description: Your paradoxical nature has become multifaceted. During daily preparations, you can replace one of your paradox spells with a spell of another paradox that grants training in the prerequisite paradox skill.

Follow Their Lead.name: Follow Their Lead
Follow Their Lead.description:
Trigger An adjacent ally Strides.

You synchronize your movement to that of your allies, moving alongside them to keep close in the fray. Stride after the triggering ally, remaining adjacent to your ally for the duration of their movement until they stop or you've moved a distance equal to your Speed, whichever occurs first.

Follow-Up Fire.name: Follow-Up Fire
Follow-Up Fire.description:
Frequency once per round

Requirements You're wielding two guns, and your last action was a ranged Strike that missed.

When at first you don't succeed, shoot again. Make a second ranged Strike using the weapon you're wielding that you didn't fire with. This Strike doesn't count the multiple attack penalty from the prior attack but does count toward future multiple attack penalties.

Fool the Camera.name: Fool the Camera
Fool the Camera.description: You know how to fool security cameras and tech items that confer special senses, such as scopes. Whenever you use the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.IE2nThCmoyhQA0Jn]{Avoid Notice}, @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide}, or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak} actions, you're always considered to be taking precautions against special senses from tech items. In addition, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your Stealth DC to Avoid Notice by cameras and technological hazards.

Four-Armed Climber.name: Four-Armed Climber
Four-Armed Climber.description:
Your additional limbs make you exceptionally adept at vertical movement. You gain a climb Speed of 10 feet. If you @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.FF5KgZHj345s2moq]{Push Off} in zero gravity while your inactive hands are not holding anything, you float up to your Speed instead of half your Speed.

Special If you have the glacierborn shobhad heritage, the climb Speed granted by this feat is instead equal to half your Speed. If you have the offworld shobhad heritage, you gain a +5-foot status bonus to your Speed when you Push Off in zero gravity.

Frequent Drifter.name: Frequent Drifter
Frequent Drifter.description: Your connection to the Drift grows even stronger, allowing you to travel through it more often. The frequency of Drift Hop changes to once per hour.

Friendly Face.name: Friendly Face
Friendly Face.description: You can use Change Shape to transform into a specific individual. As long as you have studied the individual for at least 10 minutes, creatures you do not interact with will not suspect your disguise unless your behavior is markedly different, or the creature has an intimate familiarity with the individual.

Frightening Display.name: Frightening Display
Frightening Display.description: You disgorge your stomach out of your mouth in a disturbing display of your aberrant heritage. Attempt a single Intimidation check to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize} each enemy within 30 feet. Regardless of the results of your check, each creature is then temporarily immune to Frightening Display for 1 minute.

From Hope.name: From Hope
From Hope.description: You believe that even in the face of the impossible, from hope spring miracles. Much like Lajok's rekindled light, you always carry this spark of hope in your heart and can focus upon it to make magic. You regain 1 Focus Point, up to your usual maximum.

Fundamental Understanding.name: Fundamental Understanding
Fundamental Understanding.description:
Trigger A creature, trap, or similar object within your quantum field casts a spell that you don't have in your spell repertoire, and you're aware of the casting.

If the triggering spell is common and you're trained in the associated skill for the spell's tradition, you automatically identify the spell being cast (you still roll to attempt to get a critical success but can't get a worse result than a success). You or a visible ally within 60 feet targeted by this spell gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your saving throw or your AC against it (or a +2 circumstance bonus if you rolled a critical success).

Furious Flap.name: Furious Flap
Furious Flap.description: The muscles that control your membranous wings are particularly well developed, and you know how to use them to catch enemies off guard with their power. Once per day while in an area of atmosphere, you can flap your wings to cast @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.g8QqHpv2CWDwmIm1]{Gust of Wind} as a primal innate spell. If you're submerged in liquid, you can instead cast @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.jfVCuOpzC6mUrf6f]{Hydraulic Push}. After you've cast the spell, you can move up to half your Speed (or half your swim Speed if submerged) as a free action.

Galactic Bond.name: Galactic Bond
Galactic Bond.description:
You can bond with a number of additional home worlds equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum 1), which count against your bond limit. Planetary Bond's edicts, anathemas, and effects now extend to all bonded planets.

At 14th level, add teleport to your primal spell list. You learn the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.7DN13ILADW2N9Z1t]{Commune} ritual, but can only use Nature to cast this ritual.

At 18th level, treat all bonded planets as within the same solar system as you when casting a spell with the teleport trait. Regardless of your current location, you can cast wrathful storm as a primal innate spell once per day using your spell DC.

Galaxy Brain.name: Galaxy Brain
Galaxy Brain.description:
Frequency once per day

In an instant, your mind becomes a psychic supercomputer. You become @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} for 1 minute. You can use your extra action only to Recall Knowledge, make psychic shock Strikes, activate your psychic shock's boost trait, @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek}, @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.1xRFPTFtWtGJ9ELw]{Sense Motive}, or activate abilities with the contemplative trait.

Gelid Bite.name: Gelid Bite
Gelid Bite.description: Your linnorm heritage has begun to manifest more as you've become more powerful. Your jaws Strike deals an additional @Damage[1d6[cold]] damage. On a critical hit, the target is also @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.enA7BxAjBb7ns1iF]{Suppressed} until the end of your next turn, unless it succeeds at a @Check[fortitude|against:class-spell] save against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.

General Training.name: Entrenamiento general
General Training.description:
Tu adaptabilidad se manifiesta en tu dominio de un amplio abanico de aptitudes útiles. Obtienes una dote general de 1.er nivel. Debes cumplir los prerrequisitos de la dote pero, si la seleccionas durante la creación de personaje, puedes seleccionarla más tarde en el proceso a fin de determinar qué prerrequisitos cumples.

Especial Puedes seleccionar esta dote en múltiples ocasiones, eligiendo una dote diferente cada vez.

Get Them!.name: Get Them!
Get Them!.description: When you use @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.cmCtfURzpbzkxWsy]{Get 'Em!}, you can choose any number of enemies within range instead of a single target (you still only Strike one target if you spent 2 actions).

Get in There!.name: Get in There!
Get in There!.description:
You urge your allies to hustle into the fight or to get out of the way. Until the beginning of your next turn, you and your allies within 100 feet who can sense you gain a +5-foot status bonus to Speed. As your envoy level increases, increase the bonus by an additional 5 feet at 7th level, 12th level, and 17th level.

@UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feat-effects.Item.dAcHJiPDtqxxrR4Z]{Effect: Get in There!}

Lead by Example If you used two actions, Step or Stride. Each of your allies within 100 feet who can sense you can immediately Step or Stride up to half their Speed (rounded down to the nearest 5 feet) as a reaction.

Gifted Mentor.name: Gifted Mentor
Gifted Mentor.description: You have a knack for mentoring others. Whenever you successfully Aid an ally, you increase the circumstance bonus that you would grant them by +1, or by +2 on a critical success. Whenever an ally @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.tfa4Sh7wcxCEqL29]{Follows the Expert}, and the expert they choose to follow is you, the circumstance bonus they gain to their skill check based on your proficiency is increased by +1.

Glad-Hand.name: Estrechar manos
Glad-Hand.description: Las primeras impresiones son tu punto fuerte. Cuando te encuentras con alguien en una situación casual o social, puedes hacer de inmediato una prueba de Diplomacia para @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Causar impresión} a dicha criatura en lugar de tener que conversar con ella durante 1 minuto. Si fallas, puedes entablar una conversación de 1 minuto y hacer una nueva prueba al final de dicho tiempo en lugar de tener que aceptar un fallo o un fallo crítico.

Gliding Wings.name: Gliding Wings
Gliding Wings.description:
The winglike membranes that stretch between your arms and torso let you maneuver while floating without a solid point to push off from. While in low gravity or zero gravity, you can take the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.FF5KgZHj345s2moq]{Push Off} action without having a solid surface within reach.

In addition, when falling in such an environment, you can move 5 feet horizontally in the direction of your choice for every 20 vertical feet you fall. Subtract this distance moved horizontally from the distance you fell when calculating fall damage.

Glimpse of the Bloom.name: Glimpse of the Bloom
Glimpse of the Bloom.description: Through years of practice, you've honed your ability to see through tricks and illusions of the First World. Once per day, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.uqlxMQQeSGWEVjki]{Truesight} as a primal innate spell; use the higher of your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher, minus 10 for any associated counteract checks.

Glimpse the Pattern.name: Glimpse the Pattern
Glimpse the Pattern.description:
You see now; you understand. Your powers come with a price, and your fate is not your own. You're a part of something greater—a pawn in motion within a vast and complex pattern, executing commands long planned and twice foreseen. You're beholden to a higher power, and it has plans for you.

If your innate spells are divine, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.sX2o0HH4RjJDAZ8C]{Divine Decree} once per day as a 7th-rank divine innate spell.

If your innate spells are occult, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.8kJbiBEjMWG4VUjs]{Warp Mind} once per day as a 7th-rank occult innate spell.

Go to Ground!.name: Go to Ground!
Go to Ground!.description:
You succinctly direct your allies to find cover by any means necessary. You and all allies within 60 feet count any form of lesser cover as standard cover until the start of your next turn.

Lead by Example If you used two actions, @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.ust1jJSCZQUhBZIz]{Take Cover}. Any allies within 60 feet can Take Cover as a reaction.

Gorge.name: Gorge
Gorge.description:
You force yourself to metabolize more flesh, gristle, and bone than you can normally stomach, gorging on as much of your grisly meal as possible to bolster your body's necromantic healing processes. When you @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.8ftl9i9rmorxoBow]{Consume Flesh}, you gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to 10 plus half your level, rounded down. These temporary Hit Points last for 10 minutes.

@UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feat-effects.Item.b3bGLDuzs0lKS1Oq]{Effect: Gorge}

Got 'Em.name: Got 'Em
Got 'Em.description:
Frequency once per round

Trigger An ally's Strike hits the target of your Get 'Em!

You provide a quick follow-up to your ongoing directive, encouraging your ally when they successfully hit your designated target. Your ally gains a status bonus to damage equal to your Charisma modifier.

@UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feat-effects.Item.73I9yj9XlxcBLXfa]{Effect: Got 'Em}

Grandmother's Favorite.name: Grandmother's Favorite
Grandmother's Favorite.description: Your steadfast faith in Grandmother Rat yields more rewards. You gain divine decree as a 7th-rank divine innate spell once per day. Additionally, once per month, whenever you would die, your body instead transforms into a swarm of dispersing rats. After [[/gmr 1d6 #days]]{1d6 days}, these rats gather in a safe space of the GM's choosing (a site dedicated to Lao Shu Po, if possible) and reform your body. You're returned to life at your maximum Hit Points.

Grandmother's Lore.name: Grandmother's Lore
Grandmother's Lore.description:
You follow Lao Shu Po's teachings and aren't afraid to lie, cheat, or steal to get what you desire. Thanks to your extra devotion, you gain the trained proficiency rank in Deception and Thievery. If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice.

You gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.BocFD2KV0qgUC76x]{Additional Lore} general feat for Lao Shu Po Lore.

Grasping Tendrils.name: Grasping Tendrils
Grasping Tendrils.description:
You've adapted more of your tendrils and limbs with complex musculature and cellular structures, improving articulation and fine motor skills. Increase your number of arms by two. At any time, one pair of your hands is designated as your active hands. You can change this designation from one pair of hands to another by taking the Switch Hands action, which is a single action. You can only wield items with your active hands.

Special You can take this feat multiple times.

Grazing Shot.name: Grazing Shot
Grazing Shot.description:
Requirements You have a mark.

You take your time to line up a shot that's sure to hit. Make a ranged Strike with your gun against your mark. It gains the following failure effect.

Failure Your attack deals minimum damage to the target. (Calculate this damage as if every die you would roll has a result of 1.)

Greater Epiphany.name: Greater Epiphany
Greater Epiphany.description: You see into the truth of the cosmos through your connection. You gain the greater epiphany spell for your chosen connection.

Greater Warp.name: Greater Warp
Greater Warp.description: You breach the veil of paradoxical understanding. You gain the greater warp spell for your paradox.

Group Coercion.name: Intimidación de grupo
Group Coercion.description: Puedes ponerte duro con la gente de forma efectiva, incluso si no la tienes aislada. Cuando @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.tHCqgwjtQtzNqVvd]{Intimidas}, puedes comparar el resultado de tu prueba de Intimidación con la CD de Voluntad de hasta 5 objetivos en lugar de uno. Es posible obtener grados de éxito diferentes para cada objetivo. Aumenta a 10 el número de criaturas adicionales a las que Intimidas con una sola acción si tienes el rango experto, a 25 si tienes el rango maestro y a 50 si tienes el rango legendario.

Group Impression.name: Impresión de grupo
Group Impression.description: Cuando @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Causas impresión}, puedes comparar el resultado de tu prueba de Diplomacia con la CD de Voluntad de 10 objetivos con los que has conversado, sin penalizador. Aumenta a 20 el número de objetivos si tienes el rango experto, a 50 si tienes el rango maestro y a 100 si tienes el rango legendario.

Guarded Thoughts.name: Pensamientos cautelosos
Guarded Thoughts.description: Tu mente, como la de un naga oscuro, frustra los intentos de leer tus pensamientos. Cualquier efecto que intente específicamente leer tu mente para obtener información debe tener éxito en una prueba de contraataque contra la CD más alta de tu clase o la CD de tu hechizo para hacerlo con éxito; de lo contrario, no obtiene ninguna información. El rango de contraataque es igual a la mitad de tu nivel redondeado hacia arriba.

Guilt Trip.name: Guilt Trip
Guilt Trip.description:
Trigger A creature you can see damages you with a melee Strike.

You give your attacker a look of utter disappointment so heartbreaking that it causes them to feel shame for their actions. The attacker must succeed at a @Check[will|against:class-spell] saving throw against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher, or become @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} from the guilt. On a critical failure, they fail to follow through on the attack, reducing the triggering damage dealt to you by their Strength modifier.

Gun Expert.name: Gun Expert
Gun Expert.description: Your proficiency ranks for simple and martial guns increase to expert.

prerequisites.value: expert in any kind of weapon or unarmed attack

Hair Trigger.name: Gatillo de pelo
Hair Trigger.description:
No one can react faster than you can pull your trigger. When using your initial deed, instead of Interacting to draw a weapon, you can Strike with a firearm or crossbow you're already wielding. If this Strike hits, the target is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} until the end of your first turn of the encounter.

Special If your initial deed allows you to Interact to draw a weapon more than once, this feat allows you to replace one of these Interact actions and use the other one to draw a weapon. You can't replace both Interact actions with Strikes, but you can draw a loaded firearm or crossbow with one of the actions and immediately shoot it with the other.

Hammer the Nail.name: Hammer the Nail
Hammer the Nail.description: You adjust the angle of your barrage to maximize the ammunition's impact on creatures' bodies. Increase the distance creatures are pushed by your @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.fSqUeSAFhvBfq4sE]{Shoving Shot} to 5 feet on a success, 10 feet on a failure, and 20 feet on a critical failure. In addition, on a critical failure, the target is also knocked @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Hampering Flare.name: Hampering Flare
Hampering Flare.description: You focus on your flare, setting up a blast of energy to disorient your foes. Make a ranged Strike with your solar flare. If this attack hits, the target is @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} until the start of your next turn or until it Takes Cover, whichever comes first.

Hampering Shot.name: Hampering Shot
Hampering Shot.description:
Requirements You're wielding a gun.

You skillfully line up your shot to hinder your foe. You @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.sLikawnrJJzHMYeC]{Aim} and then make a ranged Strike against your mark. If the Strike hits, the creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} until the end of your next turn.

Hang in There.name: Hang in There
Hang in There.description:
You encourage yourself or an ally, psyching them up for a coming challenge and granting them temporary Hit Points. Choose yourself or an ally within 30 feet, then attempt a @Check[diplomacy|dc:20|showDC:all] check. If you have master proficiency in Diplomacy, you can instead attempt a @Check[diplomacy|dc:30|showDC:all] check to increase the temporary Hit Points gained on a successful check by 5. If you have legendary proficiency, you can instead attempt a @Check[diplomacy|dc:40|showDC:all] check to increase the temporary Hit Points gained on a successful check by 10. These temporary Hit Points last for 1 minute. The target is then temporarily immune to your Hang in There for 1 day.

Critical Success The target gains temporary Hit Points equal to double their level plus your Charisma modifier.

Success The target gains temporary Hit Points equal to their level plus your Charisma modifier.

Failure The target is unaffected, and you can't use Hang in There again for 1 minute.

Critical Failure The target is unaffected, and you can't use Hang in There again for 1 hour.

Hardy Transplant.name: Hardy Transplant
Hardy Transplant.description: You're an unstoppable transplant who has adapted to thrive in brutal environments vastly different from the lush forests of Castrovel. You always count as adapted to a planet's environment, and you always take half damage from environmental effects such as from cold, heat, or corrosive atmospheres.

Harmonic Convergence.name: Harmonic Convergence
Harmonic Convergence.description:
Dissonance grants you some clarity and a brief second wind in stressful situations. When you use an action with the disharmony trait, you gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level until the start of your next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feat-effects.Item.WUHSeAxZXX3Fin3S]{Effect: Harmonic Convergence}

Harmonic Sensitivity.name: Harmonic Sensitivity
Harmonic Sensitivity.description: You've developed keen organs that have a sensitivity to sound—and you know how to put them to use. You become trained in Performance or gain the Assurance skill feat with Performance if you're are already trained in that skill. In addition, you can accurately recall a melody or lyrics you've heard within the last week, granting you a +2 circumstance bonus to all Deception and Performance checks that involve mimicking speech or a specific sound.

Harmonic Shielding.name: Harmonic Shielding
Harmonic Shielding.description: You've learned to compensate for your hypersensitivity to sound. You gain sonic resistance equal to half your level. If you roll a success on a saving throw against a sonic effect, you get a critical success instead.

Harness Cosmic Forces.name: Harness Cosmic Forces
Harness Cosmic Forces.description: You're among the most powerful of sarcesians and can harness the cosmic forces of the universe to create incredible stellar phenomena. Select one of the following spells, which you can cast once per day as a 7th-rank arcane innate spell: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.0jadeyQIItIuRgeH]{Eclipse Burst} or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.a3aQxCpoj1q1NQxC]{Sunburst}.

Headstrong.name: Headstrong
Headstrong.description: You became a borai through your own stubborn willfulness. When you died, you refused to accept your death and clung to your corpse, forcing your soul back into your body and regaining life along with it. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Will saving throws against fear and effects that would make you @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{Controlled} and to your Will DC against attempts to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize} you.

Heart of Planets Lost.name: Heart of Planets Lost
Heart of Planets Lost.description: You grew up hearing stories about Damiar and Iovo, the long-destroyed sarcesian home worlds remembered today only in legends, shattered rock, and the hearts of your people. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.BocFD2KV0qgUC76x]{Additional Lore} general feat for Damiar Lore, Iovo Lore, and Diaspora Lore.

Hefty Hauler.name: Porteador recio
Hefty Hauler.description: Puedes llevar más peso de lo que aparentas. Incrementa en 2 tus límites máximo e impedido de Impedimenta.

Heightened Paranoia.name: Heightened Paranoia
Heightened Paranoia.description:
You witnessed the ritual that supposedly rekindled Sota's flame up close, and while it was certainly impressive, you don't believe it should've worked. You can't seem to shake the feeling that something else is at work behind the scenes—something dangerous and unknown. Whatever it is, you intend to face this threat head on. When you succeed on a Will saving throw against an effect that could impose the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused}, @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{Controlled}, or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} condition, you get a critical success instead.

Special You can't select this feat if you have the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.fXQxrEuO2ER8fUgW]{Determined Optimist} feat.

prerequisites.value: trained in Arcana, Occultism, or Religion

Heightened Thoughtsense.name: Heightened Thoughtsense
Heightened Thoughtsense.description:
Your psychic awareness expands, granting you sharper perception at close range and a wider sensory field overall. Increase the range of your vague thoughtsense by 10 feet. In addition, you gain thoughtsense as an imprecise sense with a range of 5 feet.

At 9th level, your vague thoughtsense becomes an imprecise sense.

Hellknight Dedication.name: Dedicación De Caballero Infernal
Hellknight Dedication.description:
Has forjado tu cuerpo para cumplir con las órdenes de tu mente, órdenes impregnadas de la Medida y la Cadena. Obtienes competencia experta en Intimidación (o en otra habilidad de tu elección en la que estés capacitado, si ya eras un experto en Intimidación). Obtienes los efectos de especialización de armadura de Hellknight plate, y tu resistencia de esa especialización de armadura es 1 mayor de lo normal. Además, obtienes un bonificador +1 de circunstancia a las pruebas de Intimidación mientras llevas puestotu placa Hellknight.

Especial No puedes seleccionar otra dote de dedicación hasta que hayas obtenido otras dos dotes de los arquetipos @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.yWtwNUkGyj79Q04W]{Hellknight} o @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.ARYrFIOsT3JxpjDY]{Hellknight Armiger}.

prerequisites.value: Dedicación del Armiger del Caballero Infernal

Helping Hand.name: Helping Hand
Helping Hand.description:
Frequency once every 10 minutes

In the blink of an eye, you ready yourself to help your ally with a task. This counts as preparing to help an ally for the purposes of using the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.HCl3pzVefiv9ZKQW]{Aid} reaction. You must still explain to the GM exactly how you're helping.

Hero's Edge.name: Hero's Edge
Hero's Edge.description: You fight hardest when the odds are at their most dire, and the specter of death looms over you. As long as you have temporary Hit Points from @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.a9ER2amvCuQEJODm]{Heroic Last Stand}, your Strikes and spells deal additional damage. You gain a status bonus to damage with your Strikes equal to the number of weapon damage dice. Spells you cast from spell slots gain a status bonus to damage equal to the level of the spell; this bonus applies only to spells that deal damage and don't have a duration.

Hero's Perseverance.name: Hero's Perseverance
Hero's Perseverance.description: Like the heroes who inspire you, you rally yourself to persevere against death itself. When you use Heroic Last Stand, you gain temporary Hit Points equal to twice your level for 1 minute, rather than equal to your level for 1 minute.

Heroic Last Stand.name: Heroic Last Stand
Heroic Last Stand.description:
Frequency once per day

Requirements You have less than one-quarter of your Hit Points remaining.

You fight fearlessly for your friends. You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level for 1 minute. As long as you have these temporary Hit Points, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Will saves against fear effects and a +2 circumstance bonus to your Will DC against attempts to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize} you.

Historian.name: Historian
Historian.description: You become trained in a Lore skill of your choice. You can spend 10 minutes checking your notes or research materials to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Recall Knowledge]{Recall Knowledge} about a piece of history with any Lore skill in which you aren't trained, using your highest Lore skill modifier instead of your modifier with that skill.

History Buff.name: History Buff
History Buff.description: You've cataloged countless customs, histories, and traditions. You can cast hypercognition once per day as a 3rd-rank occult innate spell. You can use your modifier for the Lore skill you chose for Historian in place of any other skill modifier when attempting a @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Recall Knowledge]{Recall Knowledge} check while casting @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.ZYoC630tNGutgbE0]{Hypercognition}.

Hobnobber.name: Confraternizador
Hobnobber.description: Eres hábil en averiguar información conversando. La actividad de exploración @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.plBGdZhqq5JBl1D8]{Reunir información} te cuesta sólo la mitad de lo normal (y habitualmente reduce el tiempo a 1 hora). Si tienes el rango maestro en Diplomacia y sufres un fallo crítico en Reunir información, en su lugar sufres un fallo. Sigues sin tener garantía alguna de que un rumor averiguado con Reunir información es verídico.

Hologram Skeptic.name: Hologram Skeptic
Hologram Skeptic.description: You easily spot the tiny glitches and imperfections in holograms. Even if you aren't Searching, you always attempt a check to disbelieve holograms and effects with the illusion and tech traits that normally require you to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.TiNDYUGlMmxzxBYU]{Search} or Interact with them.

Homeguard.name: Homeguard
Homeguard.description: Your Homeguard training has prepared you for anything. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to initiative rolls, and when you tie an adversary's initiative roll, you always go first.

Homing Mote.name: Homing Mote
Homing Mote.description: You've come to rely on ranged motes as much as you do your solar weapon. Triple the range increment of your solar flare. When you make a solar flare Strike against a target within your first range increment, you ignore the target's concealment and cover.

Hug Master.name: Hug Master
Hug Master.description: A good, solid hug makes everything better, and you're bringing hugs to the battlefield. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.KxaYlC50zzHysJj8]{Titan Wrestler} skill feat. Additionally, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} and to your Fortitude DC to avoid being Grappled.

Hulking Corpsefolk.name: Hulking Corpsefolk
Hulking Corpsefolk.description: You're a mountain of flesh, having managed to increase your girth in irreversible ways. Perhaps you absorbed enough physical material to do so, or maybe you've completed mysterious, inexplicable necromantic rituals. Increase your size category to Large, and increase your reach by 5 feet.

Hurl Ally.name: Hurl Ally
Hurl Ally.description:
Requirements You are adjacent to an ally or your ally is riding you and you have one or more hands free.

You use your innate strength to hurl an ally across the battlefield. Pick up an adjacent ally of your size or smaller and throw them to an unoccupied space you can see within 20 feet, or within 40 feet if you throw your bonded partner. Their movement doesn't trigger reactions. Your ally ends this movement on their feet and treats the fall as 20 feet lower, or 40 feet lower if you throw your bonded partner.

Hurry.name: Hurry
Hurry.description: You urge an ally to pick up the pace and contribute more to the events happening around them. One ally within 30 feet who can sense you becomes @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} for 1 round. They can use the extra action to Interact, Step, or Stride. The target is then temporarily immune to Hurry for the next 10 minutes.

Hush.name: Hush
Hush.description:
Frequency once per day

You fall utterly silent and focus strenuously on a problem at hand. You attempt to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Recall Knowledge]{Recall Knowledge} with a +2 circumstance bonus to the skill check. If you would get a critical failure, you get a failure instead, and if you would get a success, you get a critical success instead.

Hybrid Technique.name: Hybrid Technique
Hybrid Technique.description:
Requirements You're wielding an area or automatic weapon.

You can combine methods into a deadly new hybrid technique. Choose two soldier feats that take 2 actions to use, require you to wield an area or automatic weapon, and cause you to make an Area Fire or Auto-Fire attack as part of its effects. You Area Fire or Auto-Fire once and then apply the additional effects and benefits of both selected feats to the attack.

Hyper.name: Hyper
Hyper.description: You're full of energy, and you often bound into action faster than your friends can keep up. Your Speed increases by 5 feet.

I'll Be Back.name: I'll Be Back
I'll Be Back.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger You regain consciousness after being @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}.

Even when you're downed, you get right back into the thick of things once recovered. You Stand and Interact to draw a weapon or grab an unattended weapon.

I'm the Real One!.name: I'm the Real One!
I'm the Real One!.description:
Trigger You become @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} by another creature or you grab or restrain another creature.

Requirements You can use Change Shape to assume the appearance of that creature.

You Change Shape to assume the appearance of the other creature. All other creatures must use the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} action to attempt a Perception check against your Deception DC to determine which creature is real and which is an imitation. A creature who doesn't know which creature you are must succeed at a @Check[flat|dc:11] when targeting either of you with an attack, spell, or other effect. If the check fails, the attack, spell, or effect targets the other creature instead.

Abilities such as telepathy or the mystic's group chat feature may automatically allow a creature to determine which creature is which, but an aware creature must still use the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.sn2hIy1iIJX9Vpgj]{Point Out} action to indicate to others which creature is which. An imitated creature might have a signal or phrase that indicates to their allies which creature is which, but doing so in the din of battle is an action with the auditory or visual trait.

Icy Spelunker.name: Icy Spelunker
Icy Spelunker.description: You spent time exploring the icy caves of Kalo-Mahoi's crust, and climbing comes nearly as easily to you as walking. You gain a Climb speed of 25 feet, and you treat difficult terrain from ice and snow as normal terrain.

Ikeshti Lore.name: Ikeshti Lore
Ikeshti Lore.description: Life on Akiton is hard, but thanks to your brood-minder, you learned the skills necessary to thrive. You become trained in Crafting and Survival. If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.BocFD2KV0qgUC76x]{Additional Lore} general feat for Ikeshti Lore.

Impeccable Crafting.name: Artesanía impecable
Impeccable Crafting.description: Consigues creaciones perfectas con gran eficacia. Siempre que obtienes un éxito en una prueba de Artesanía para elaborar un objeto del tipo elegido con @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.QLeMH5mQgh28sa5o]{Especialidad artesana}, en su lugar obtienes un éxito crítico.

0.text: Cada vez que obtienes un éxito en una prueba de Elaboración para fabricar un objeto del tipo que elegiste con Elaboración especial, obtienes un éxito crítico.

Impeding Shot.name: Impeding Shot
Impeding Shot.description:
Requirements You're wielding a gun.

You hinder your target with a shot. You @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.sLikawnrJJzHMYeC]{Aim} and then make a ranged Strike against your mark. If the Strike hits, the target is @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} until the end of its next turn. If the target is flying, it also falls 10 feet.

Implacable Grappler.name: Implacable Grappler
Implacable Grappler.description: You combine your impressive stature and additional limbs to become a fierce wrestler. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.KxaYlC50zzHysJj8]{Titan Wrestler} skill feat and a +1 circumstance bonus to your Fortitude DC against @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.Tkd8sH4pwFIPzqTr]{Grab} attempts.

Impressive Lungs.name: Impressive Lungs
Impressive Lungs.description: You have excellent lung capacity. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.aJUXbe9HJVvv0Mxa]{Breath Control} general feat. You do not need to breathe for up to 10 minutes after leaving a vacuum.

Impressive Performance.name: Interpretación impresionante
Impressive Performance.description: Tus interpretaciones inspiran admiración y te granjean seguidores. Puedes Causar impresión utilizando Interpretación en lugar de Diplomacia. Si inviertes por lo menos 10 minutos interpretando frente a una audiencia, puedes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Causar impresión} designando como objetivos hasta a 10 miembros de la misma que permanecen allí durante toda la interpretación, sin sufrir el penalizador normal. El número de objetivos se incrementa a 20 para una interpretación de 1 hora y a 50 para una interpretación de 2 horas.

Improv Workshop.name: Improv Workshop
Improv Workshop.description: Your stage experience has taught you how to improvise in just about any situation, and you know how to share your insight with others. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.9jGaBxLUtevZYcZO]{Untrained Improvisation} general feat. In addition, you gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.QQSO7DzeNKCWf9XW]{Once More with Feeling} action.

Improved Conductivity.name: Improved Conductivity
Improved Conductivity.description: By imitating your ancestors' diet, taking synthetic supplements, or unlocking your genetic potential with magic, you've enhanced your bioelectrical network. All your Strikes or spells with the attack trait that deal electricity damage gain the arc trait. If you're wielding an active forcefield, it regenerates twice its normal HP for 1 round after you hit an enemy with an arc attack.

Improved Elebrian Magic.name: Improved Elebrian Magic
Improved Elebrian Magic.description:
Choose one 3rd-rank or lower arcane spell. You can cast that spell as a 3rd-rank arcane innate spell once per day. If this is your 13th-level ancestry feat, instead choose a 5th-rank or lower arcane spell, and you can cast it as a 5th-rank arcane innate spell once per day. If this is your 17th-level ancestry feat, instead choose a 7th-rank or lower arcane spell, and you can cast it as a 7th-rank arcane innate spell once per day.

Special You can select this feat more than once. If you do, you must select a different spell.

Improved Undead Senses.name: Improved Undead Senses
Improved Undead Senses.description: Your ability to sense living and undead energies improves, and you learn how to differentiate between entities you can sense in an area. Your lifesense becomes a precise sense with a range of 60 feet.

Improvised Legend.name: Improvised Legend
Improvised Legend.description: You can use @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.WFFYDg0sgjaXCeq6]{Improvised Mastery} once per hour, rather than twice per day.

In Another Life.name: In Another Life
In Another Life.description: Whenever you rest, you behold different versions of yourself in other realities. During your daily preparations, select one ancestry feat for your ancestry that you meet the prerequisites for and don't already have. You gain that feat until your next daily preparations.

Incredible Ferocity.name: Ferocidad sensacional
Incredible Ferocity.description: Si tienes tiempo para recomponerte tras un escarceo con la muerte, puedes reconstruir tu ferocidad y resistir golpes finales adicionales. Puedes utilizar Ferocidad de orco con una frecuencia de una vez por hora, en lugar de una vez al día.

Incredible Improvisation.name: Improvisación sensacional
Incredible Improvisation.description:
Frecuencia una vez al día

Desencadenante Haces una prueba utilizando una habilidad en la que no estás entrenado.

Un destello de brillantez te concede una ventaja importante en una habilidad a pesar de tu inexperiencia. Obtienes un bonificador +4 por circunstancia a la prueba de habilidad desencadenante.

Incredible Initiative.name: Iniciativa sensacional
Incredible Initiative.description: Reaccionas más rápidamente que otros. Obtienes un bonificador +2 por circunstancia a las tiradas de iniciativa.

Infernal Armaments.name: Infernal Armaments
Infernal Armaments.description:
Frequency once per 10 minutes

You infuse your weapons with the might of Hell. For the next minute, on your first weapon Strike each round, you gain a status bonus to damage equal to twice the number of weapon damage dice; this extra damage is determined by your chosen Hellknight order.

Infernal Bulwark.name: Infernal Bulwark
Infernal Bulwark.description: Armor you wear gains the bulwark trait. You become trained in heavy armor, or become an expert in heavy armor if you were already trained. Your Hellknight regalia grants you resistance equal to half your level when you wear it, determined by your chosen Hellknight order.

Infinite Aim.name: Infinite Aim
Infinite Aim.description: You're a sharpshooter who doesn't need a scope or stance to shoot your best shot. You can @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.sLikawnrJJzHMYeC]{Aim} as a free action.

Infinite Magic.name: Infinite Magic
Infinite Magic.description: You borrow spells from other realities. Twice per day, you can cast a 9th-rank or lower spell after you've run out of spell slots of the appropriate spell rank; the two spells you cast with this feat must be of different spell ranks.

Influence.name: Influence
Influence.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger You're about to roll a Deception, Diplomacy, or Intimidation check, but you haven't rolled yet.

With masterful timing and a careful choice of words, you can manipulate the emotions and thoughts of others. You roll the triggering Deception, Diplomacy, or Intimidation check twice, and use the higher result.

Infodump.name: Infodump
Infodump.description:
You muster myriad minutiae that you subsequently use to overwhelm a creature's mind with pointless trivia. Attempt a check to Recall Knowledge against the Will DC of a creature you're aware of within 60 feet; you can use any skill for which you can Recall Knowledge, not just a skill associated with the target's traits. Rather than remembering useful information, you recite facts at the target. Regardless of your result, the creatures within 60 feet become temporarily immune to your attempts to Infodump with that skill for 24 hours.

Critical Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} for [[/gmr 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} for [[/gmr 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Failure The target is unaffected.

Critical Failure You trip over your own thoughts, becoming stupefied 1 until the beginning of your next turn.

Special You can Infodump using speech or limited telepathy. If you Infodump through speech, this ability gains the auditory trait.

Infused Spell.name: Infused Spell
Infused Spell.description: You infuse your magic with vital energy that empowers the target of your spell. Pick a spell and reduce your vitality network's total by a number equal to twice the spell's rank. If your next action is to cast that spell, one bonded ally you target with that spell becomes @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} until the end of your next turn and can use the extra action for only Strike and Stride actions.

Inner Peace.name: Inner Peace
Inner Peace.description: You never lose your cool. When you become @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied}, you immediately reduce the value of the condition by 1. When you would gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{Controlled} condition, you can attempt a @Check[flat|dc:16]. On a success, you don't get the confused or controlled condition.

Inner Wellspring.name: Inner Wellspring
Inner Wellspring.description:
Frequency once per day

When you must endure times of extreme stress and pain, you dig deep and draw on the memories or stories of your lost ancestral home world of Golarion, tapping into inner reserves of power to pull off just one more miracle. You regain 1 Focus Point.

Instinctive Aim.name: Instinctive Aim
Instinctive Aim.description: You draw your gun and take careful aim with the same motion. You Interact to draw a ranged weapon or Switch Hands and then @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.sLikawnrJJzHMYeC]{Aim} with that ranged weapon.

Intensified Psychic Shock.name: Intensified Psychic Shock
Intensified Psychic Shock.description:
You focus your telepathic attacks further, broadcasting your psychic power with greater range and area. Your psychic shock unarmed attack gains the boost (1d6) trait, requiring no battery to boost your attack. By spending 10 minutes in intense concentration, you can reconfigure your mind to apply one of the following benefits to your psychic shock. This benefit lasts until you reconfigure to another benefit.

  • Extended Shock: Increase the range increment of your psychic shock by 15 feet.
  • Mind Crusher: Your psychic shock gains the fatal d8 trait.
  • Peer Pressure: Your psychic shock gains the arc trait, but it deals mental damage rather than electricity damage.
  • Psychic Wave: Your psychic shock gains the splash trait.

Internal Chemistry.name: Internal Chemistry
Internal Chemistry.description: You tweak your anatomy and bodily systems to metabolize pharmaceuticals more efficiently. Regain additional Hit Points equal to half your level when you restore Hit Points to yourself using a consumable item with the healing trait.

Internal Compartment.name: Compartimento interno
Internal Compartment.description:
Puedes esconder un objeto pequeño de hasta un volumen ligero dentro de una cavidad hueca en uno de tus antebrazos. Se necesitan tres @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} acciones para almacenar un objeto de esta manera.

Obtienes un bono de circunstancia +4 a las CD de las pruebas de otros para @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} o @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.RDXXE7wMrSPCLv5k]{Steal} objetos almacenados dentro de tu brazo.

Si guardas un arma en tu brazo, puedes usar una sola acción para interactuar y sacar el arma haciala mano correspondiente a tu cavidad interna, luego golpea con el arma.

Intimidating Glare.name: Mirada intimidante
Intimidating Glare.description: Puedes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Desmoralizar} con una simple mirada. Cuando lo haces, Desmoralizar pierde el rasgo auditivo y obtiene el visual, y no sufres penalizador alguno si la criatura no entiende tu idioma.

Intimidating Prowess.name: Poderío intimidante
Intimidating Prowess.description: En las situaciones en las que puedes amenazar físicamente al objetivo cuando @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.tHCqgwjtQtzNqVvd]{Intimidas} o @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Desmoralizas}, obtienes un bonificador +1 por circunstancia a tu prueba de Intimidación e ignoras el penalizador por no compartir un idioma. Si tu modificador por Fuerza es +5 o más y tienes el rango maestro en Intimidación, este bonificador se incrementa a +2.

Intimidating Shot.name: Intimidating Shot
Intimidating Shot.description: You attempt to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize} a foe with your ranged weapon by firing it into the air, using ammo equal to the weapon's expend and the weapon's maximum range rather than the usual range of 30 feet. This check doesn't take a –4 circumstance penalty if the target doesn't share a language with you.

Intimidating Taunt.name: Intimidating Taunt
Intimidating Taunt.description:
You taunt your enemy mercilessly, forcing them to acknowledge you as an immediate threat. Attempt an @Check[intimidation|against:will] check and compare it to the Will DC of one enemy creature within 60 feet. This action has the auditory trait or visual trait, depending on how you taunt your enemy.

Critical Success Your taunts sting hard. Until the start of your next turn, any hostile actions that the creature takes must include you as a target or include you in the area; otherwise, the creature takes a –2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls and to its save DC for those hostile actions.

Success As critical success, but only the first hostile action that the creature takes is affected.

Failure The creature is unaffected.

@UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feat-effects.Item.B0ZDwyk4qOr7hp4e]{Effect: Intimidating Taunt}

Intuitive Talent.name: Intuitive Talent
Intuitive Talent.description:
Frequency once per hour

You enjoy embracing new experiences and have a knack for picking up new skills and talents, sometimes over the course of countless lifetimes, as your semi-dead nature grants you a wider perspective. Choose a skill that you're untrained in. Until the beginning of your next turn, you become trained in the chosen skill.

Inventor.name: Inventor
Inventor.description:
Eres un genio de la Artesanía, fácilmente capaz de determinar cómo se hacen las cosas y de crear nuevas invenciones. Puedes invertir tiempo libre en inventar una fórmula común que aún no conoces. Esto funciona igual que la actividad Elaborar: gastas de antemano la mitad del Precio de la fórmula, haces una prueba de Artesanía y, con un éxito, o bien acabas la fórmula pagando la diferencia, o bien trabajas más tiempo para reducir el Precio. La diferencia es que inviertes el tiempo adicional en investigación, diseño y desarrollo, en lugar de elaborando el objeto. Una vez está completa, añades la nueva fórmula que has inventado a tu libro de fórmulas.

El DJ podría permitirte inventar fórmulas poco comunes o raras, típicamente con una CD mayor. Necesitas la dote Artesanía alquímica para inventar fórmulas alquímicas y la dote Artesanía mágica para inventar fórmulas mágicas.

Iomedae's Barrage.name: Iomedae's Barrage
Iomedae's Barrage.description:
Frequency once per day

You channel your spirit into a mighty barrage from a celestial plasma cannon. Iomedae's barrage Auto-Fires in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15] or a @Template[type:line|distance:30], dealing @Damage[(floor(@actor.level/2 - 1))d6[fire], (floor(@actor.level/2 - 1))d6[spirit]|traits:holy] damage with the holy trait (@Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)]). At 12th level and every 2 levels thereafter, the fire and spirit damage each increase by 1d6. A creature that gets a critical failure on this Reflex save is also @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round.

Iomedae's Helm.name: Iomedae's Helm
Iomedae's Helm.description: You touch an adjacent ally who is affected by a spell or other magical effect with the mental trait due to failing a Will save and has a duration of no longer than 1 minute. That ally can immediately attempt a Will save against the effect's DC, ending the condition on a success. This can't end the effect for any creatures other than your target ally. Regardless of the result of the save, your ally is temporarily immune to Iomedae's Helm for 10 minutes.

Iomedae's Shield.name: Iomedae's Shield
Iomedae's Shield.description:
You manifest your faith as a shield. Your armor and the armor of up to five allies you can see within 30 feet gains the benefits of an activated @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.equipment.Item.6ZW9IcSwd4WCFuf6]{Tactical Force Field} upgrade with 14 Hit Points that replenishes 2 Hit Points on your turn but does not protect from critical hits like a normal force field. The force field lasts for one minute. After receiving the benefits of Iomedae's Shield, you and your allies are immune to the effect for one hour.

At level 10, this becomes a @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.equipment.Item.2637b5l0hxitACkR]{Superior Force Field} with 26 HP and replenishes 5 Hit Points on your turn, and at level 16, this becomes an @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.equipment.Item.6hunzJ4gwfNT58vl]{Ultimate Force Field} with 37 HP and replenishes 7 Hit Points on your turn.

Iomedae's Sword.name: Iomedae's Sword
Iomedae's Sword.description: You've trained to fight the ancient enemies of lost Golarion. When you deal damage to a demon, devil, dragon, or undead with a weapon, you deal persistent spirit damage with the holy trait equal to the number of weapon damage dice. When you deal damage to one of these creatures with a spell cast from a spell slot that does not have a duration, you deal persistent spirit damage with the holy trait equal to the spell's rank.

It's Who You Know.name: It's Who You Know
It's Who You Know.description: You call on your extensive network for help with skulduggery. When you @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.plBGdZhqq5JBl1D8]{Gather Information} or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.ftG89SjTSa9DYDOD]{Create a Forgery}, you do it in half the normal time.

Just Kidding.name: Just Kidding
Just Kidding.description:
Trigger An ally critically fails to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.tHCqgwjtQtzNqVvd]{Coerce}, @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Make an Impression}, or Request.

You attempt to play off a social misstep as a joke. Attempt a Performance check against the same DC as your ally's check. If you succeed, your ally treats their critical failure as a failure.

Just Like Rehearsal.name: Just Like Rehearsal
Just Like Rehearsal.description: Life often imitates art, and you've learned to deploy your dramatic training in dangerous situations, whether it's using your talent for pratfalls to cushion a real drop or faking out an enemy with your improv antics. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.Q6vXNDmTwDom59GV]{Feign Death} feat, ignoring the prerequisites. In addition, you can use Performance instead of Deception to [[/act create-a-diversion skill=performance]].

Just the Thing....name: Just the Thing...
Just the Thing....description:
Cost the Price of the chosen item

You've traveled far and wide, bringing supplies and equipment from place to place and picking up interesting objects in your travels. In fact, you've got an interesting item right… here! You Interact to pull an item you hadn't previously declared that you purchased out of your pocket—this item must be any common item of half your level or less with a Bulk of 1 or less. It must be a piece of adventuring gear (from the table in Starfinder Player Core or other sources of adventuring gear) and can't be a weapon, armor, ammunition, magic item, pharmaceutical item, or other treasure.

Kalo Lore.name: Kalo Lore
Kalo Lore.description:
Growing up among the blooms and glowing spires of Kalo-Mahoi has instilled in you a deep appreciation of the beauty around you, both natural and constructed. You're trained in Crafting and Nature. If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice.

You also gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.BocFD2KV0qgUC76x]{Additional Lore} general feat for Kalo Lore.

Kasatha Lore.name: Kasatha Lore
Kasatha Lore.description:
You've studied the kasathan traditions of balance and harmony. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Diplomacy and Society. If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice.

You also gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.BocFD2KV0qgUC76x]{Additional Lore} general feat for Kasatha Lore.

Kasatha Weapon Elegance.name: Kasatha Weapon Elegance
Kasatha Weapon Elegance.description:
You've learned how to adapt your martial expertise to wield other weapons. When wielding a weapon you aren't proficient with, treat your level as your proficiency bonus.

At 11th level, you become trained in all weapons.

Kasathan Weapon Familiarity.name: Kasathan Weapon Familiarity
Kasathan Weapon Familiarity.description:
You have a respect for melee combat, and you've trained to wield a few more elegant examples in battle. You gain access to all uncommon weapons with the kasatha trait. You have familiarity with weapons with the kasatha trait plus the dueling sword, plasma sword, shock truncheon, and singing spear—for the purposes of proficiency, you treat any of these that are martial weapons as simple weapons and any that are advanced weapons as martial weapons.

At 5th level, whenever you get a critical hit with one of these weapons, you get its critical specialization effect.

Keep Them in Your Sights.name: Keep Them in Your Sights
Keep Them in Your Sights.description: You always keep a target marked and in your sights, even if they move. When you @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.sLikawnrJJzHMYeC]{Aim}, the benefits apply if your mark is within your weapon's first or second range increment, rather than only within the first.

Khizar Lore.name: Khizar Lore
Khizar Lore.description:
Whether in isolation or in communion with others of your kind, you've contemplated the nature of your ancestry for many years. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Nature and Survival. If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice.

You also gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.BocFD2KV0qgUC76x]{Additional Lore} feat for Khizar Lore.

Kick it Into Overdrive.name: Kick it Into Overdrive
Kick it Into Overdrive.description:
Frequency once per hour

Trigger Your turn begins.

With a steadying breath and a moment of intense focus, you push yourself beyond your limits, gaining incredible speed for a short period of time.
