You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Stealth checks when you're in a natural area that contains flora, and you can use Deception to Impersonate plant life, including stationary plants like shrubs or plant creatures like ksariks. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to these checks.

Plasma Ejection.name: Plasma Ejection
Plasma Ejection.description:
You unleash an ejection of plasma, hitting every creature in your choice of a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] or in a @Template[type:line|distance:30]. Each creature in the area takes @Damage[((1 + floor(@actor.level / 2))d6)[fire]|options:area-damage,plasma-ejection-base-damage] damage with a @Check[reflex|against:solarian|basic|options:area-effect] save against your class DC. A creature that critically fails its save additionally takes @Damage[1d8[persistent,electricity]] damage.

Graviton-Attuned A creature that fails its save is knocked @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Photon-Attuned Increase the fire damage to d8s.

Level (+2) The damage increases by 1d6 (or 1d8 if you're photon-attuned).

Plated Deflection.name: Plated Deflection
Plated Deflection.description: You've mastered using your own plate scales or worn armor to absorb devastating strikes. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Z8GMkB50OfXBX67a]{Plate Deflection} reaction.

prerequisites.value: plated vesk heritage or Armor Ace

Power Slide.name: Botón de potencia
Power Slide.description:
Requirements You are piloting a vehicle.

You throw the vehicle into a barely controlled skid, turning sharply to evade pursuit or bring your weapons to bear. You Drive with a –2 penalty to your piloting check, gaining the effects of the Drive action for the same number of actions you spent to Power Slide. At the end of the movement, if you succeed, you can turn the vehicle up to 90 degrees. If you critically succeed at your piloting check, you can instead turn the vehicle up to 180 degrees.

Powerful Exhalation.name: Powerful Exhalation
Powerful Exhalation.description: Your ability to breathe energy is unparalleled. The area of your Dragonkin Breath increases to a @Template[type:cone|distance:30] and the damage dice are d6s instead of d4s. If you have the critical specialization effect of any weapon, a creature that gets a critical failure on their Reflex save against your dragonkin breath are affected by its corresponding critical weapon specialization effect.

Powerful Leap.name: Salto poderoso
Powerful Leap.description: Puedes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Saltar} 5 pies (1,5 m) verticalmente sin llevar a cabo un @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{Salto de altura}. También incrementas en 5 pies (1,5 m) la distancia horizontal cuando Saltas, incluyendo si es como parte de un Salto de altura o de un @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Salto de longitud}.

Practiced Escape.name: Practiced Escape
Practiced Escape.description:
Trigger A creature @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grabs}, @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilizes}, or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrains} you.

You've trained in close quarters combat and practiced how to escape a hold, or similar situations. You attempt to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape}. If you succeed or critically succeed, you can also Stand or Step.

Predator's Eye.name: Predator's Eye
Predator's Eye.description: Your eye magnifies distant targets as well as a scope. You can adjust your sight in that eye as a single action to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} a specific creature with a +2 circumstance bonus to your Perception check, or Seek to search a 10-foot square up to 100 feet away for any undetected or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} creatures or objects. You don't take penalties for an object or creature being too far away unless you're more than 2 miles away.

Predatory.name: Predatory
Predatory.description:
Battle is a dance, and you've honed your body into an instrument as exquisite as it is deadly. When you select this feat, you gain your choice of a claw unarmed attack or a jaws unarmed attack. Both of these attacks are in the brawling weapon group.

A claw unarmed attack deals 1d6 slashing damage and has the agile, finesse, pahtra, and unarmed traits.

A jaws unarmed attack deals 1d6 piercing damage and has the finesse, grapple, pahtra, and unarmed traits.

At 5th level, whenever you get a critical hit with one of these attacks, you get its critical specialization effect.

Special You can take this feat a second time. If you do, select the other attack from the options above.

Predict Outcome.name: Predict Outcome
Predict Outcome.description:
Frequency once per hour

You spend 10 minutes opening yourself to the mysteries of the multiverse by peering across different timelines or analyzing probability simulations. You gain the effects of @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.41TZEjhO6D1nWw2X]{Augury}, except you learn only about the dangers ahead; any results of "good" are instead "nothing," and results of "mixed" are instead "bad."

If you're legendary in Arcana or Occultism, you take only 1 minute to Predict Outcome.

Predictive Positioning.name: Predictive Positioning
Predictive Positioning.description:
Trigger An enemy damages you.

Requirements Your quantum field is active.

You reposition to a space you'd occupy in a different reality, free from incoming danger. You instantly teleport up to your Speed to an area within your quantum field. This movement doesn't trigger reactions based on movement and ignores hazards and terrain, but can't pass through walls or other such obstructions.

Prehensile Tail.name: Prehensile Tail
Prehensile Tail.description: Your tail functions like an extra limb. You can hold one extra hand's worth of equipment with your tail, and you can use your tail to perform Interact actions. You tail is considered one pair of hands for the purposes of designating your active hands with the Switch Hands action.

Prescient Consumable.name: Consumible presciente
Prescient Consumable.description: Puedes predecir con antelación los consumibles que podrías necesitar. Cuando utilizas @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.bh2jHyyYrkLMsIdX]{Planificador presciente}, puedes sacar un objeto consumible de tu mochila, en lugar de una pieza de equipo de aventurero. El consumible debe ser común, de un nivel no superior a la mitad del tuyo y su Impedimenta debe ser lo suficientemente baja como para que acarrearlo no te deje impedido.

Prescient Planner.name: Planificador Presciente
Prescient Planner.description:
Costo Precio del artículo elegido

Requisitos No has usado esta habilidad desde la última vez que pudiste comprar bienes.

Regularmente creas planes complicados y contingencias, y utilizas tus recursos para implementarlos. Te tomas 1 minuto para quitarte la mochila, luego retiras con cuidado un artículo que no habías declarado previamente que compraste; intuiste queNecesitaría el artículo y lo compraría en la última oportunidad. El objeto debe ser una pieza de equipo de aventura y no puede ser un arma, armadura, objeto alquímico, objeto mágico u otro tesoro. Debe ser común con un nivel no superior a la mitad de tu nivel, y su volumen debe ser lo suficientemente bajo como para que transportarlo no te haya sobrecargado.

Press-Gang the Soul.name: Press-Gang the Soul
Press-Gang the Soul.description:
Trigger You reduce an enemy to 0 Hit Points with a phase cutlass.

Your phase cutlass steals some of the enemy's vitality, press-ganging it into eternal servitude. As long as you are wielding a @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.equipment.Item.eBWGwv3rryQkHfh4]{Phase Cutlass} with stolen vitality, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Sqo1uzSmebVWpqoT]{Wisp Ally} as a divine innate spell at will, heightened to a spell rank equal to half your level. Using wisp ally this way requires and permanently releases one soul press-ganged with your phase cutlass. The first time each round you Strike with your phase cutlass, you immediately gain the effects of the Sustain a Spell action, which you can use only to extend the duration of and control a wisp ally spell cast using that phase cutlass.

Primafloral Adaptation.name: Primafloral Adaptation
Primafloral Adaptation.description: You can draw on a wellspring of primal power to cast @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.m2xFMNyQiUKQDRaj]{Energy Aegis} as a 7th-rank primal innate spell once per day.

Primary Target.name: Primary Target
Primary Target.description: You gain the primary target class feature.

Prismatic Display.name: Prismatic Display
Prismatic Display.description: You rapidly shift the colors of your skin to throw off the senses of those around you. Attempt a @Check[deception|against:perception] check against the Perception DCs of all creatures within melee reach. On a success, the creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} until the end of your turn (@UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} on a critical success). Regardless of the result of your check, each creature is then temporarily immune to Prismatic Display for 10 minutes.

Prismeni Lore.name: Prismeni Lore
Prismeni Lore.description:
You've learned to leverage your intrinsic link to the Drift, making you an excellent pilot. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Piloting and Stealth. If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice.

You also gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.BocFD2KV0qgUC76x]{Additional Lore} general feat for Prismeni Lore.

Proleptic Parry.name: Proleptic Parry
Proleptic Parry.description:
Trigger A Telepredicted creature targets you with a mental effect.

Requirements You have a bonus against the target using Telepredict.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Will saving throws against the triggering effect. Increase this bonus to +2 if you've dealt mental damage to the target since the last time you used Telepredict. If you roll a critical success on the saving throw, the target takes @Damage[5d4[mental]] damage and becomes @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} until the end of your next turn.

Prop Closet.name: Prop Closet
Prop Closet.description:
You've practiced enough with prop replica weapons that you can draw on these experiences in a real fight. Select a common advanced or martial weapon. You have familiarity with this weapon for the purposes of proficiency, and you treat this advanced weapon as a martial weapon, or martial weapon as a simple weapon.

At 5th level, whenever you get a critical hit with this weapon, you get its critical specialization effect.

Prophet.name: Prophet
Prophet.description:
You can divine the future. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.pkcOby5prOausy1k]{Read Omens} and @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Jmxru8zMdYMRuO5n]{Vision of Death} each once per day as 4th-rank spells. The tradition of this spell matches the tradition of the cantrip you gained from @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.Kgtj8NRoBnWCK9qw]{Sigiled Scales}.

At 17th level, the rank of vision of death increases to 6th.

Prophet's Premonition.name: Prophet's Premonition
Prophet's Premonition.description: Your magical scale markings give you insight into the future. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.41TZEjhO6D1nWw2X]{Augury} twice per day as a 2nd-rank spell. The tradition of this spell matches the tradition of the cantrip you gained from @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.Kgtj8NRoBnWCK9qw]{Sigiled Scales}.

Propulsive Shield.name: Propulsive Shield
Propulsive Shield.description:
You fire blasts of solar energy through your raised shield, harnessing its gravitational force to propel your attacks. When you make a solar flare Strike while you have your solar shield raised, increase the range increment of your solar flare by 10 feet and increase the damage your solar flare deals by 1 per weapon damage die.

Graviton-Attuned The additional damage is bludgeoning damage. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} attempt on a critical success.

Photon-Attuned The additional damage is fire damage. Increase the persistent fire damage on a critical success to 1d8.

Protect the Pack.name: Protect the Pack
Protect the Pack.description:
Requirements You're adjacent to an ally.

You're determined to protect your allies from harm—even if it hurts! Select one adjacent ally. Until the beginning of your next turn, you shield them with your body; any lesser cover you grant them is instead standard cover, though they can't use standard cover granted by you to Hide.

Prototype Electroencephalon.name: Prototype Electroencephalon
Prototype Electroencephalon.description:
Frequency once every 10 minutes

Trigger You're critically hit by an attack.

When Eox's atmosphere burned, necrovites crafted devices called electroencephalons in order to house their souls and transition themselves into undead beings who could survive the eons since that cataclysmic event. You've learned the basics of this technology and have crafted a similar device. Attempt a @Check[flat|dc:10]. On a success, the triggering hit becomes a normal hit.

Psychic Bully.name: Psychic Bully
Psychic Bully.description: You can leverage your telepathic abilities to influence the minds of others, imparting orders or inflaming fears. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.aIHY2DArKFweIrpf]{Command} and @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.4koZzrnMXhhosn0D]{Fear} as 1st-rank occult innate spells. You can cast each of these occult innate spells once per day.

prerequisites.value: korasha lashunta or unbound lashunta heritage

Psychic Constellation.name: Psychic Constellation
Psychic Constellation.description: You effortlessly juggle an assortment of gear with your telepathy, giving you the appearance of a solar cerebellum orbited by planetoid items. You gain a second set of telekinetic hands, per Mind Over Matter, granting a typical contemplative six hands total. While at least one of your telekinetic hands is empty, you can deflect incoming attacks, granting your fist attack the parry trait. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.fQJ8xyZH3Dch5xtN]{Eccentric Orbit} free action.

0.label: You have an empty Telekinetic Hand

Psychic Investigator.name: Psychic Investigator
Psychic Investigator.description: You can use your telepathic abilities to quickly assess your circumstances or subtly glean information from the minds of others. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.ZYoC630tNGutgbE0]{Hypercognition} and @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.KHnhPHL4x1AQHfbC]{Mind Reading} as 3rd-rank occult innate spells. You can cast each of these occult innate spells once per day.

prerequisites.value: Psychic Bully, Psychic Scholar, or Psychic Talent

Psychic Master.name: Psychic Master
Psychic Master.description: Your psychic abilities have grown stronger. Choose one common 2nd-rank spell from the occult spell list. You can cast that spell as an occult innate spell once per day.

Psychic Mastery.name: Psychic Mastery
Psychic Mastery.description: Your psychic abilities have grown stronger, allowing you to tap into entirely new dimensions of psychic power. Choose one common 2nd-rank spell from the occult spell list. You can cast that spell as an occult innate spell once per day.

Psychic Paragon.name: Psychic Paragon
Psychic Paragon.description: Your psychic abilities have grown stronger. Choose one common 6th-rank spell from the occult spell list. You can cast that spell as an occult innate spell once per day.

Psychic Scholar.name: Psychic Scholar
Psychic Scholar.description: You can transfer vast amounts of information to the minds of others in mere moments. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.D442XMADp01qJ7Cs]{Mindlink} as a 1st-rank occult innate spell twice per day.

prerequisites.value: damaya lashunta or unbound lashunta heritage

Psychic Talent.name: Psychic Talent
Psychic Talent.description: Your psychic abilities have developed beyond simple communication. Choose one cantrip from the occult spell list. You can cast this cantrip as an occult innate spell at will. A cantrip is heightened to a spell rank equal to half your level rounded up.

Pungent Astrazoan.name: Pungent Astrazoan
Pungent Astrazoan.description: You emit the reeking smell of rotting meat when you disgorge your stomach. While you can thoroughly mask the scent by shapeshifting to eat like other species, disgorging your stomach to intentionally emit this vile odor can come in handy when you are trying to dissuade predators, whether they are hungry beasts or murderous mobsters. You become trained in Deception and gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.HEBXaS656MZTiWFu]{Lengthy Diversion} skill feat as a bonus feat, even if you don't meet its prerequisites.

Punishing Salvo.name: Punishing Salvo
Punishing Salvo.description:
Requirements Your last action this turn was an @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.oc0ZKnk5zD0GXqZi]{Area Fire} attack.

You know unleashing a barrage of gunfire can bring most enemies low. You make a follow-up Strike against your primary target using the same weapon. Ignore the unwieldy trait on your weapon when using this action. This doesn't make a new area attack and is treated as a Strike made using primary target.

Punitive Strike.name: Punitive Strike
Punitive Strike.description:
Trigger A creature within your reach uses a manipulate action, makes a ranged Strike, uses a move action, or leaves a square during a move action it's using.

Your foe's momentary lapse in defense gives you an opening Make a melee Strike against the triggering creature, ignoring the unwieldy trait on any weapons you're wielding for this Strike. This Strike doesn't count toward your multiple attack penalty, and your multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this Strike.

Quantum Aura.name: Quantum Aura
Quantum Aura.description: You can become the nexus of the warped reality you create. Each time you use @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.ZoMpqQgDdlT13Jp0]{Warp Reality} to activate your quantum field, you can choose for your quantum field to be an aura around you that moves with you. If you do, your Warp Reality action gains the aura trait, and the quantum field you create is a 10-foot-radius emanation.

Quantum Breadth.name: Quantum Breadth
Quantum Breadth.description: Your repertoire expands, and you can cast more spells of your paradox's tradition each day. Increase the number of spells in your repertoire and number of spell slots you gain from witchwarper archetype feats by 1 for each spell rank other than your two highest witchwarper spell slots.

Quantum Entanglement.name: Quantum Entanglement
Quantum Entanglement.description: You prevent creatures from leaving your quantum field and returning to reality. Until the start of your next turn, any creature who begins its turn inside your quantum field must succeed at a @Check[will|against:witchwarper] saving throw against your witchwarper class DC to move outside your quantum field. On a failure, the action is disrupted. A creature that succeeds at this save is immune to your Quantum Entanglement for 24 hours.

Quantum Negation.name: Quantum Negation
Quantum Negation.description: You expose a target to a reality in which they don't exist. You learn the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.d1weVZHIiCXhTlqg]{Quantum Negation} warp spell.

Quantum Recycle.name: Quantum Recycle
Quantum Recycle.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger You cast a 2nd-rank or higher spell, and the spell targets a creature or area within your quantum field.

You expertly manipulate the effects of your quantum field to ensure that some of the energy from your spell is preserved and can be harnessed again. You regain an expended spell slot one spell rank lower than the triggering spell.

Quantum Research.name: Quantum Research
Quantum Research.description: You become a true embodiment of your paradox and surpass what mortals can achieve in your reality. You gain an additional 10th-rank spell slot.

Quick Break.name: Quick Break
Quick Break.description: You learn to prepare your natural weapons much more quickly than before. Breaking off knives from your body loses the manipulate trait and becomes a free action instead of a 1-action activity, and your unarmed attacks are now treated as though they had the advanced weapon improvement.

Quick Climb.name: Escalada Rápida
Quick Climb.description: Cuando Trepas, te mueves 5 pies (1,5 m) más con un éxito y 10 pies (3 m) más con un éxito crítico, hasta un máximo de tu Velocidad. Si tienes el rango legendario en Atletismo, obtienes una Velocidad de trepar igual a tu Velocidad terrestre.

Quick Coercion.name: Intimidación rápida
Quick Coercion.description: Puedes amedrentar a otros con tan solo unas pocas implicaciones bien elegidas. Puedes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.tHCqgwjtQtzNqVvd]{Intimidar} a una criatura después de 1 asalto de conversación en lugar de 1 minuto. Sigues sin poder Intimidar a una criatura en mitad del combate o sin haber entablado conversación.

Quick Disguise.name: Disfraz rápido
Quick Disguise.description: Puedes preparar un disfraz en la decima parte del tiempo habitual (por lo general 1 minuto). Si tienes el rango maestro en Engaño, puedes crear un disfraz completo e @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.AJstokjdG6iDjVjE]{Imitar} como una actividad de 3 acciones. Si tienes el rango legendario, te basta con 1 acción.

Quick Identification.name: Identificación rápida
Quick Identification.description: Puedes Identificar magia rápidamente. Sólo tardas 1 minuto cuando utilizas Identificar magia para determinar las propiedades del objeto, efecto continuado o ubicación, en lugar de 10 minutos. Si tienes el rango maestro, sólo necesitas una actividad de 3 acciones y, si tienes el rango legendario, te basta con 1 acción.

prerequisites.value: rango entrenado en Arcanos, Naturaleza, Ocultismo o Religión

Quick Install.name: Quick Install
Quick Install.description: You take only 1 minute to Install an Upgrade. If you're legendary in Crafting, you can Install an Upgrade as a 3-action activity.

Quick Jump.name: Salto rápido
Quick Jump.description: Puedes utilizar @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{Salto de altura} y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Salto de longitud} como una sola acción en lugar de 2 acciones. Si lo haces, no te hace falta la Zancada inicial (ni fallas si no das una Zancada de 10 pies [3 m]).

Quick Recognition.name: Reconocimiento Rápido
Quick Recognition.description: Reconoces conjuros rápidamente. Una vez por asalto, puedes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.MjQyTcV8Jiv1Jtln]{Reconocer un conjuro} utilizando una habilidad en la que tienes el rango maestro como acción gratuita.

prerequisites.value: rango maestro en Arcanos, Naturaleza, Ocultismo o Religión

Quick Repair.name: Reparación rápida
Quick Repair.description: Para ti, la actividad de @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.bT3skovyLUtP22ME]{Reparar} pierde el rasgo exploración y requiere 1 minuto en lugar de 10. Si tienes el rango maestro en Artesanía, requiere 3 acciones. Si tienes el rango legendario, te basta con 1 acción.

Quick Squeeze.name: Escurrirse rápidamente
Quick Squeeze.description: Te Escurres 5 pies (1,5 m) por asalto (10 pies [3 m] con un éxito crítico). Si tienes el rango legendario en Acrobacias, te Escurres a Velocidad completa.

Quick Stow.name: Quick Stow
Quick Stow.description:
Frequency once per round

You're trained in the trick of quickly moving items into your cheek pouches. You Interact to store one held item in your cheek pouches (provided it fits).

Quick Swap.name: Quick Swap
Quick Swap.description:
Trigger You're wielding a two-handed weapon, and an enemy creature moves adjacent to you.

You can switch weapons in stressful situations so that you quickly set yourself up to punish incoming foes. You stow your current weapon and draw another two-handed weapon. If you have multiple sets of arms, you can instead Switch Hands.

Quick Swim.name: Natación rápida
Quick Swim.description: Nadas 5 pies (1,5 m) más con un éxito y 10 pies (3 m) más con un éxito crítico, hasta un máximo de tu Velocidad. Si tienes el rango legendario en Atletismo, obtienes una Velocidad de nado igual a tu Velocidad terrestre.

Quick Unlock.name: Forzado rápido
Quick Unlock.description: Puedes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2EE4aF4SZpYf0R6H]{Forzar una cerradura} utilizando 1 acción en lugar de 2.

Quickened Casting.name: Lanzamiento apresurado
Quickened Casting.description:
Frecuencia una vez al día

Bardo Si tu siguiente acción es lanzar un truco de bardo o un conjuro de bardo por lo menos 2 niveles inferior al del conjuro de bardo de mayor nivel de que dispones, reduce en 1 el número de acciones necesarias para lanzarlo (mínimo 1 acción).

Brujo Aceleras tu lanzamiento de conjuros. Si tu siguiente acción es lanzar un truco de truco o un conjuro de brujo al menos 2 rangos inferior al conjuro de brujo de mayor rango que puedes lanzar, reduce en 1 el número de acciones necesarias para lanzarlo (mínimo 1 acción).

Mago Esforzando tu mente, colapsas la máxima cantidad que puedes de las fórmulas de tu conjuro, lo que resulta en un encantamiento más corto, pero mucho más complejo. Si tu siguiente acción es lanzar un truco o un conjuro de mago por lo menos 2 rangos menor que el mayor espacio de conjuro de mago de que dispones, reduce en 1 el número de acciones necesario para lanzarlo (mínimo 1 acción).

Otros Si tu próxima acción es lanzar un truco de clase o un conjuro de clase que es al menos 2 niveles inferior al espacio de conjuro de clase de mayor nivel que tienes, reduce el número de acciones para lanzarlo en 1 (mínimo 1 acción ).

Quickened Processor.name: Quickened Processor
Quickened Processor.description: You can quickly identify your surroundings, and you can use that information to your advantage while in the midst of danger or while in the process of piloting vehicles in hazardous situations. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Perception checks for initiative rolls and a +2 circumstance bonus to Piloting checks for initiative rolls.

Quiet Allies.name: Aliados silenciosos
Quiet Allies.description: Eres muy hábil en moverte con un grupo. Cuando @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.IE2nThCmoyhQA0Jn]{Evitas ser detectado} y tus aliados @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.tfa4Sh7wcxCEqL29]{Siguen al experto}, tus aliados y tú podéis hacer una sola prueba de Sigilo utilizando el menor de los modificadores, en lugar de tirar por separado. Esto no se aplica a las tiradas de iniciativa.

Quip.name: Quip
Quip.description:
Trigger A creature within 30 feet is damaged by an ally's Strike.

You follow up on your ally's success by hurling a cunning, well-timed taunt at a foe they wounded. Attempt to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize} the triggering creature.

Radiant Bond.name: Radiant Bond
Radiant Bond.description: When you @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.UeMHbnnaXDa3sGfG]{Transfer Vitality}, you can select any number of bonded allies to transfer to, though the total maximum number of Hit Points you can transfer doesn't increase.

Radiant Zone.name: Radiant Zone
Radiant Zone.description:
The reality you conjure is much brighter than your own. The area of your quantum field becomes bright light. Creatures who begin their turn in your quantum field must attempt a @Check[fortitude|against:witchwarper|options:area-effect,inflicts:dazzled,inflicts:blinded] save against your class DC; creatures with light blindness treat their result as one step worse.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 round.

Critical Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round, then dazzled for 1 round.

Range Sniper.name: Range Sniper
Range Sniper.description:
You've trained to engage your foes from afar and leverage your keen vision to improve your accuracy. You reduce the penalty for attacking beyond your first range increment by 1, to a minimum of 0. If you're in a vacuum, you instead reduce the penalty for attacking beyond your first range increment by 2, to a minimum of 0.

In addition, you gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.K2wMNyK4JGwgrjVL]{Line Up the Shot} action.

Rapid Mantel.name: Saliente rápido
Rapid Mantel.description: Te subes fácilmente a los salientes. Cuando te @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.3yoajuKjwHZ9ApUY]{Agarras a un saliente}, te puedes alzar hasta dicha superficie y ponerte de pie. Puedes utilizar Atletismo en lugar de una salvación de Reflejos para Agarrarte a un saliente. Si Trepas o @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Saltas} hasta 5 pies (1,5 m) bajo la parte superior de un saliente, puedes alzarte hasta la superficie y ponerte de pie como parte de dicha acción.

Ravenous Restoration.name: Ravenous Restoration
Ravenous Restoration.description: You have a colossal appetite for a creature your size, and you find that a good meal always hits the spot. Once per day, you can eat a snack or meal as a 10-minute activity. When you do, you regain a number of Hit Points equal to 1d6 plus your level (@Damage[(1d6 + @actor.level)[healing]]).

Reach Spell.name: Conjuro de alcance
Reach Spell.description: Puedes ampliar el alcance de tus conjuros. Si la siguiente acción que utilizas es Lanzar un conjuro que tiene alcance, incrementa dicho alcance en 30 pies (9 m). Como es habitual cuando se incrementan los alcances de conjuro, si éste tiene normalmente un alcance de toque, lo alargas a 30 pies (9 m).

Reactive Shapeshifting.name: Reactive Shapeshifting
Reactive Shapeshifting.description:
Trigger You roll initiative.

You can change at a moment's notice. You Change Shape and gain a +2 circumstance bonus on the triggering initiative roll if you used Deception to roll initiative.

Read Lips.name: Leer los labios
Read Lips.description: Puedes leer los labios de otras personas cercanas a quienes puedes ver claramente. El idioma leído debe ser uno que usted conozca. Cuando estés en tu tiempo libre, puedes hacerlo automáticamente. En el modo encuentro o cuando intentas una hazaña más difícil de leer los labios, eres @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Fascinado} y ​​@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Desprevenido} durante cada ronda en la que te concentras en los movimientos de los labios, y debes superar una prueba de Sociedad (CD determinada por el DJ) para leer con éxito. los labios de alguien.

Ready For Trouble.name: Ready For Trouble
Ready For Trouble.description: You learned your lesson after one-too-many encounters with deadly mechanisms and rigged ruins. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.FnAzJ4DIRPJJaGv7]{Danger Awareness} feat. You can use Delve Lore to disarm traps from alien or historically significant locations.

Ready Reload.name: Ready Reload
Ready Reload.description:
Requirements You're wielding a two-handed ranged weapon with a reload of 2 or more, and your last action was an attack that expended ammo from the weapon.

You know that reloading a weapon can be a delicate process, but you've mastered how to do so in the middle of combat, starting while still in the act of firing your weapon. You Interact to reload your weapon twice. Unlike most Interact actions, you don't need a free hand to reload your ranged weapon in this way.

Ready to Roll.name: Ready to Roll
Ready to Roll.description:
Trigger You roll initiative.

You instinctively react to trouble by directing your allies to act at the exact moment their intervention would matter most. Issue a 1-action directive.

Realized Epiphany.name: Realized Epiphany
Realized Epiphany.description:
Frequency once per minute

You've come to learn that your vitality network isn't just a manifestation of your magic, it's a metaphysical representation of your connection. If your next action is to cast an epiphany spell, you can expend 20 Hit Points from your vitality network to cast it, rather than spending a Focus Point.

Really Get Em!.name: Really Get Em!
Really Get Em!.description: You gain the Lead by Example benefit for your Get 'Em! directive, except you and your allies get a +2 status bonus to damage on both the initial and subsequent Strikes.

Recognize Spell.name: Reconocer conjuro
Recognize Spell.description:
Desencadenante Una criatura en tu línea visual lanza un conjuro que tú no has preparado o no está en tu repertorio, o bien una trampa u objeto similar lanza dicho conjuro. Tienes que ser consciente del lanzamiento.

Si tienes el rango entrenado en la habilidad apropiada para la tradición del conjuro y es un conjuro común de 2.º rango o menor, lo identificas automáticamente (sigues teniendo que tira para obtener un éxito crítico, pero no puedes obtener un resultado peor que éxito). El rango mayor de conjuro que identificas automáticamente se incrementa a 4 si tienes el rango experto, 6 si tienes el rango maestro y 10 si tienes el rango legendario. El DJ hace una prueba secreta de Arcanos, Naturaleza, Ocultismo o Religión, la correspondiente a la tradición del conjuro lanzado. Si no estas entrenado en la habilidad, no puedes obtener un resultado mejor que un fallo.

Éxito crítico Reconoces correctamente el conjuro y obtienes un bonificador +1 por circunstancia a tu tirada de salvación o a tu CA contra él.

Éxito Reconoces correctamente el conjuro.

Fallo No consigues reconocer el conjuro.

Fallo crítico Identificas incorrectamente el conjuro como si fuera otro, a elección del DJ.

prerequisites.value: rango entrenado en Arcanos, Naturaleza, Ocultismo o Religión

Red Eye.name: Red Eye
Red Eye.description: Your eyes burn with a red hue and glow like embers when in areas of darkness or shade. You gain darkvision.

Reflexive Hypotheses.name: Reflexive Hypotheses
Reflexive Hypotheses.description:
No matter how engrossed you are in other tasks, part of your mind can't help but stay curious about your surroundings.

You become trained in a Lore skill about a specific environment, planet, plane, or settlement. You can move at full Speed while using the Investigate activity.

Choose one of the following: Arcana, Nature, Occultism, Religion, or Society. While using any other exploration activity, you also Investigate your surroundings, though only to Recall Knowledge using the chosen skill and any Lore skills you have.

Relentless Aim.name: Relentless Aim
Relentless Aim.description: You take careful aim with your shots so that your bullets ricochet off solid surfaces. When determining if you have line of effect to a target you've aimed at, you can choose one solid surface within your weapon's first range increment to ricochet your shot to hit your target; determine line of effect from the chosen ricochet surface, rather than your location. If the creature is @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected}, the GM still rolls a flat check in secret to see if you missed, but the flat check becomes DC 5.

Relentless Endurance.name: Relentless Endurance
Relentless Endurance.description:
Frequency once per hour

Trigger You take damage.

You bounce back stronger after a hit, ready to continue the fight. You gain 1d8+4 temporary Hit Points that last for 1 minute. Increase this amount by 1d8+4 at 6th level and every 4 levels thereafter.

Reliable Grace.name: Reliable Grace
Reliable Grace.description: You have exceptional control over your body. You can use @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.GExi3NDWqhfICneX]{Natural Grace} once per hour, rather than once per day.

Religious Talisman.name: Religious Talisman
Religious Talisman.description: You can construct and bless a religious symbol of your deity in 10 minutes. While such talismans are traditionally scraps of paper with a religious symbol drawn on them, they can take many forms, including body art, a sticker, or even a virtual emoji. You can create a talisman only for yourself and for the deity you worship. As long as you continue to engage in activities that match your deity's edicts you gain a +1 status bonus to initiative rolls. If you violate your deity's anathema, the talisman is destroyed, and you take a –1 status penalty to initiative rolls and Perception checks until you complete an @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.7Fd4lxozd11MQ55N]{Atone} ritual.

Remix World's Rhythm.name: Remix World's Rhythm
Remix World's Rhythm.description: Whether through intense musical training, magical insight, or Meyel's divine blessing, you can feel the rhythm of the world around you and tug on time's chords to manipulate its melody and flow. You gain @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.o6YCGx4lycsYpww4]{Haste} and @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.WsUwpfmhKrKwoIe3]{Slow} as 3rd-rank primal innate spells. You can cast each of these spells once per day.

Remote Access.name: Remote Access
Remote Access.description: You know how to probe computer systems with your mind as easily as others might handle a hacking toolkit. You can communicate wirelessly with technological devices within 10 feet, allowing you to attempt Computers checks on these devices without a user interface or hacking toolkit. If you can already attempt Computers checks at range, you increase the distance that you can do so by an additional 10 feet.

Repair Module.name: Módulo de reparación
Repair Module.description:
Frecuencia una vez al día

Activas la programación de reparación de tu cuerpo, lo que hace que los nanocitos de tu cuerpo curen tus heridas. Obtienes una curación rápida equivalente a la mitad de tu nivel durante 1 minuto. Mientras el módulo de reparación está activo, no puedes usar otras habilidades que requieran el uso de tus nanitos.

Repeating Role.name: Repeating Role
Repeating Role.description: Just like giving an encore performance of one of your most iconic roles, you learn how to better use your training off the set. You can now use @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.oRZuA2FNSAcI9hO6]{Role Repertoire} once per hour instead of once per day.

Resonant Weapon.name: Resonant Weapon
Resonant Weapon.description: You release a pulse of spiritual energy into one weapon you're holding, making it resonate with immaterial soul stuff. Until the beginning of your next turn, your weapon gains the effects of the ghost killer weapon fusion. At 17th level, it deals an additional 1d6 spirit damage.

Restorative Shapeshifting.name: Restorative Shapeshifting
Restorative Shapeshifting.description:
Frequency once per minute

Trigger You use Change Shape.

You renew and reinforce your body with elements of your new form. You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level (minimum 1) that last until the end of your next turn.

Return to the River.name: Return to the River
Return to the River.description: You have a soul-deep connection to the River Between. When you're in mortal peril, the River Between beckons you home and into its embrace. When you would die, you don't. Instead, you are encased in a cocoon of golden solar energy and disappear, teleporting across the galaxy to the River Between. [[/gmr 2d6 #days]]{2d6 days} later, this chrysalis hatches, and you emerge fully healed in a random location along the River Between in the Diaspora.

Reunite.name: Reunite
Reunite.description:
Frequency once per hour

Requirements You and your bonded partner are on the same planet.

With a centering breath, you fill your mind with thoughts of your bonded partner and will yourself to their side. You teleport into an unoccupied space of your choice adjacent to your bonded partner. If there is no adjacent space available, you teleport into the closest unoccupied space.

Revitalized by the Drift.name: Revitalized by the Drift
Revitalized by the Drift.description:
The Drift revitalizes your spirit and restores your vitality, physically healing your wounds. If you rest for 10 minutes while within the Drift, you gain Hit Points equal to your @Damage[(@actor.level *@actor.system.abilities.con.mod)[healing]]{Constitution modifier × your level}. This is cumulative with any healing you receive from @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.1kGNdIIhuglAjIp9]{Treat Wounds}.

Once per hour, you can focus or meditate on your inherent connection to the Drift. This is a 10-minute activity that has the concentrate and exploration traits. When you do, you're treated as if you'd rested for 10 minutes while in the Drift, save that the number of Hit Points you regain from this feat is halved.

Revivification Protocol.name: Protocolo de revivificación
Revivification Protocol.description:
Frecuencia una vez al día

Activador Tienes la condición de muerte y estás a punto de intentar una prueba de recuperación.

Tus nanitos están programados para revivirte automáticamente. Recuperas 1 punto de vida, pierdes las condiciones de muerte e inconsciencia y puedes actuar normalmente en este turno. Obtienes o aumentas la condición de herido de forma normal cuando pierdes la condición de moribundo de esta manera.

Ride.name: Montar
Ride.description: Cuando @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.q9nbyIF0PEBqMtYe]{Comandas a un animal} en el que vas montado para que lleve a cabo una acción de movimiento (como por ejemplo, dar una Zancada), tienes éxito automáticamente en lugar de necesitar una prueba. Todo animal en el que vas montado actúa en tu turno, igual que un esbirro. Si @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.PM5jvValFkbFH3TV]{Montas} un animal en medio de un encuentro, pierde su siguiente turno y a continuación actúa en tu siguiente turno.

Ride the River Between.name: Ride the River Between
Ride the River Between.description: Reaching across space, you connect with the River Between and seize a fragment of its solar stream, inundating the battlefield in golden light and solar energy. This trickle of the River Between fills a @Template[type:line|distance:100] that is 10 feet in diameter, starts from your square, and remains for 1 minute. Once the river forms, you can move to any square within the river (this movement does not trigger reactions). The area is bright light and counts as a vacuum for the purposes of a sarcesian using their energy wings. Non-sarcesians in the area when you use Ride the River Between, or who later enter the area, must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|against:class-spell] save or become @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 round (1 minute on a critical failure). Creatures affected by this ability are temporarily immune for 24 hours. The DC of this save is equal to the higher of your spell DC or class DC.

Rip Current.name: Rip Current
Rip Current.description: You have a mystical connection to the powerful currents of Kalo-Mahoi and their interactions with the blooms, and you've learned to call upon them to wash powerful outsiders away through portals between planes. You gain @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.bay4AfSu2iIozNNW]{Banishment} as an 8th-rank primal innate spell that you can cast once per day. You can cast the spell targeting up to 10 willing creatures, who treat the results of their Will save as two degrees of success lower.

Rip, Tear.name: Rip, Tear
Rip, Tear.description: Your skull plates or teeth have grown sharper over time, or you have painstakingly carved them to do maximum damage when using them in combat. Your unarmed jaws attack now inflicts 1d6 persistent bleed damage on a successful hit (double on a critical hit). If your weapon damage ever increases, the number of dice for your bleed damage also increases by the same amount.

Robust Recovery.name: Recuperación robusta
Robust Recovery.description: Aprendiste medicina popular para que te ayudara a recuperarte de las enfermedades y los venenos, y un uso diligente de la misma te ha hecho especialmente resistente. Cuando Tratas una enfermedad o un veneno, o alguien más usa una de dichas acciones sobre ti, aumenta a +4 el bonificador por circunstancia concedido con un éxito y si el resultado de la tirada de salvación del paciente es un éxito, el paciente obtiene un éxito crítico.

Rocket Jump.name: Rocket Jump
Rocket Jump.description:
Requirements You're wielding an area (burst) weapon.

You fire your weapon as you jump, using the explosion to propel yourself to new heights or just out of a situation more dangerous than an explosion. You make an Area Fire and then @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap}, using your weapon to add a status bonus to the distance traveled equal to double the burst of your weapon. You must be somewhere within the area of the weapon's area attack, but you don't have to save against the effect of your attack.

Movement made as part of this action doesn't trigger reactions, though Area Fire still triggers them normally.

Role Repertoire.name: Role Repertoire
Role Repertoire.description:
Frequency once per day

You've played many roles and picked up a surprising amount of eclectic knowledge while preparing to play them. Roll any [[/act recall-knowledge skill=performance]] check using Performance instead of Lore.

Ruin Delver.name: Ruin Delver
Ruin Delver.description: You're fascinated by the ancient ruins scattered across Lajok's surface and orbit. Whether you're a scrapper harvesting materials for reuse, an innovator looking for a unique technological wonder, or a scholar hoping to glean secrets of the past, you enter these ancient sites, heedless of the danger. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to find hazards, to skill checks to disable hazards, to AC against attacks made by hazards, and to saves against hazards.

Run Hot.name: Run Hot
Run Hot.description:
Requirements You're wielding an area weapon.

You hold down the trigger and push your weapons to their absolute limits with a ceaseless barrage of firepower. @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.oc0ZKnk5zD0GXqZi]{Area Fire} twice with the required weapon, ignoring the unwieldy trait of your weapon. Creatures in the area of the second Area Fire attack gain a +2 circumstance bonus to their save.

After you use this action, your weapon must cool off and can't be used until after your next turn or until you take any amount of cold damage.

Run, Cowards!.name: Run, Cowards!
Run, Cowards!.description: You use your weapon to help corral panicked enemies. An enemy who critically fails a save against your Area Fire or Auto-Fire is @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing} for 1 round.

Running Shot.name: Running Shot
Running Shot.description:
Requirements You're wielding a gun.

You rush forward, firing a precisely aimed shot at your enemy while you're on the move. @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.sLikawnrJJzHMYeC]{Aim} and then Stride up to your Speed. At any point during this movement, you can make a ranged Strike with the gun you're wielding.

Sales Pitch.name: Sales Pitch
Sales Pitch.description: You've perfected the art of convincing others to see things your way. You can use [[/act make-an-impression skill=business-lore]]{Business Lore} or [[/act make-an-impression skill=corporate-lore]]{Corporate Lore} to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Make an Impression} and, on a success or critical success, you shift your target's attitude one step higher. Whether or not Make an Impression is successful, the target becomes temporarily immune to Sales Pitch for 24 hours.

Sanctuary Kin.name: Sanctuary Kin
Sanctuary Kin.description: Your magical spark wards your allies, protecting them from attacks. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.8xRzLhwGL7Dgy3EZ]{Sanctuary} as a 1st-rank divine innate spell once per day. You can cast the spell as a reaction triggered when your bonded partner is the target of an attack, as long as your partner is within 40 feet and you can perceive them and their attacker. If you do, the spell has a range of 40 feet and can target only your bonded partner.

Sarcesian Lore.name: Sarcesian Lore
Sarcesian Lore.description: You've taken the lessons of your people to heart. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Arcana and Piloting. If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.BocFD2KV0qgUC76x]{Additional Lore} general feat for Sarcesian Lore.

Sarcesian Weapon Familiarity.name: Sarcesian Weapon Familiarity
Sarcesian Weapon Familiarity.description:
You're accustomed to fighting from afar—really far! You gain access to weapons in the sniper group and all uncommon weapons with the sarcesian trait. You have familiarity with weapons in the sniper group and all weapons with the sarcesian trait—for the purposes of proficiency, you treat any of these that are martial weapons as simple weapons, and any that are advanced weapons as martial weapons.

At 5th level, whenever you get a critical hit with one of these weapons, you get its critical specialization effect.

Saw it Coming.name: Saw it Coming
Saw it Coming.description:
Trigger You're about to roll initiative.

You read the demeanor, body language, and instinctive tics of your foes as easily as you read a comm unit, allowing you to react a moment before those around you and gain an edge in the coming battle. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your initiative roll, and you can immediately do one of the following: Interact to draw a weapon, Step, or Stride.

Scare to Death.name: Susto mortal
Scare to Death.description:
You can frighten foes so much, they might die. Attempt an @Check[intimidation|defense:will] check against the Will DC of a living creature within 30 feet of you that you sense or observe and who can sense or observe you. If the target can't hear you or doesn't understand the language you are speaking, you take a –4 circumstance penalty. The creature is temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Critical Success The target must attempt a @Check[fortitude|against:intimidation] save against your Intimidation DC. On a critical failure, it dies. On any other result, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2} and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing} for 1 round. The critical failure effect has the death trait.

Success The target becomes frightened 2.

Failure The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Critical Failure The target is unaffected.

Scatter Thoughts.name: Scatter Thoughts
Scatter Thoughts.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger You're targeted by a mental effect.

You can shield your mind by using similar techniques that your ancestors once mastered to escape the Swarm. You block the intruding effect by scattering your thoughts, making you immune to the triggering mental effect for the next minute.

Scattering Fire.name: Scattering Fire
Scattering Fire.description: Your overwhelming onslaught scatters enemies like leaves in the wind. When you @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.fSqUeSAFhvBfq4sE]{Shoving Shot}, all creatures in the area attempt the Fortitude save to avoid forced movement, rather than just your primary target.

Schooled in Secrets.name: Instruido en secretos
Schooled in Secrets.description:
Te fijas en los signos y símbolos que los miembros de las sectas misteriosas y otras sociedades secretas utilizan para declarar su afiliación ante sus compañeros. Puedes utilizar Ocultismo en lugar de Diplomacia para @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.plBGdZhqq5JBl1D8]{Reunir información} sobre dichos grupos y en lugar de Engaño para [[/act impersonate skill=occultism]]{Imitar} a un miembro de los mismos.

Si perteneces a un culto secreto, logia, secta u organización similar, reconoces automáticamente a los miembros del grupo a menos que intenten específicamente ocultarte su presencia. También reconocen tu estatus en el grupo si no lo ocultas tú específicamente.

Scope Sight.name: Scope Sight
Scope Sight.description: Viewing your marks through a scope is as instinctive as opening your eyes. Whenever you @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.sLikawnrJJzHMYeC]{Aim}, you can Interact to Activate a sight weapon upgrade.

Scramble Tech.name: Scramble Tech
Scramble Tech.description: With a thought, you can infect a technological creature or device with a short-lived virus, causing the object to glitch and malfunction. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.rBh2PjtbDGAjbcu6]{Discharge} as a 3rd-rank divine innate spell twice per day.

Scrapper's Ingenuity.name: Scrapper's Ingenuity
Scrapper's Ingenuity.description:
You take great delight in breaking down objects to their component parts so they can be rebuilt into something new. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus on Thievery checks to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.cYdz2grcOcRt4jk6]{Disable Device} and @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.2EE4aF4SZpYf0R6H]{Pick Lock}. Whenever you successfully Disable Device, you harvest useful parts from the device for future use, gaining a +1 circumstance bonus on your next Crafting check to Craft or Repair. If the device you disabled was of a level higher than your own, this bonus increases to +2.

@UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feat-effects.Item.hcH7IdEjC2wUVfaK]{Effect: Scrapper's Ingenuity}

Scrub Psyche.name: Scrub Psyche
Scrub Psyche.description:
Trigger You or an ally fail a save against a mental effect while within your quantum field.

You scrub all traces of the triggering effect from the target's mind. The target rerolls their saving throw against the triggering effect and must use the second result, even if it's worse.

Scrupulous Stalker.name: Scrupulous Stalker
Scrupulous Stalker.description:
Frequency once per round

You quickly scan your surroundings for threats. You @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek}. If you use electromagnetic sense, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to this check.

Search High and Low!.name: Search High and Low!
Search High and Low!.description:
You alert your allies to look for enemies and @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} things in a stressful situation, coordinating their efforts so they can do so more efficiently. Until the beginning of your next turn, you and your allies gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek}. As your envoy level increases, increase the bonus to +3 at 7th level, +4 at 12th level, and +5 at 17th level.

@UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feat-effects.Item.E5oRUzuYh5rLlPzu]{Effect: Search High and Low!}

Lead by Example If you used two actions, Seek. Each of your allies within 100 feet who can sense you can also immediately Seek as a reaction.

Seasoned.name: Conocedor
Seasoned.description: Dominas la preparación de muchos tipos de comida y bebida. Obtienes un bonificador +1 por circunstancia a las pruebas de @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.rmwa3OyhTZ2i2AHl]{Elaborar} comida y bebida, incluyendo elixires si tienes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.is3Oz9wt11lNq62K]{Artesanía alquímica} y pociones si tienes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xWY5omyIcILNR7y1]{Artesanía mágica}. Si tienes el rango maestro en una de las habilidades prerrequisito, este bonificador se incrementa a +2.

prerequisites.value: rango entrenado en Saber (alcohol), Saber (cocina) o Artesanía

Secondary Directive.name: Secondary Directive
Secondary Directive.description:
Requirements Your last action this turn was issuing a 2-action directive.

You follow-up your issued directive with an understood order by attacking a notable foe. Make a Strike. If the Strike hits, the target is affected by a 1-action @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.cmCtfURzpbzkxWsy]{Get 'Em}.

Secrete Numbing Saliva.name: Secrete Numbing Saliva
Secrete Numbing Saliva.description:
Frequency once per hour

Requirements Your last action was a successful Strike with your stomach-mouth jaws unarmed attack.

Your stomach-mouth secretes numbing saliva into your target, exposing them to the poison.

Numbing Saliva (injury, poison)

Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|against:class-spell] (the higher of your class or spell DC)

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 clumsy 1 and @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.enA7BxAjBb7ns1iF]{Suppressed} (1 round)

Stage 3 @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} and suppressed (1 round)

Seedling Reincarnation.name: Seedling Reincarnation
Seedling Reincarnation.description: When you die, a seed sprouts from your body. The seedling is a copy of you lacking any of your memories, though it has vague memories of your relationships and might feel fond of your allies or distrustful of your enemies. Over 1d6 weeks, the seedling grows into a miniature version of you with the same attributes and abilities (but Small instead of Medium). Over 1d6 months, you grow to your original size. A new seedling germinates in you over 10 years; if you die again before then, the seedling dies too.

Seedpod Lure.name: Seedpod Lure
Seedpod Lure.description: You grow a floating secondary seedpod you can use to fool other creatures. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.GkmbTGfg8KcgynOA]{Create a Diversion} or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint}. Once every 10 minutes, you can deploy this lure as a move action. It remains deployed for 1 minute or until you Dismiss it. Any creature targeting you with an attack must attempt a @Check[flat|dc:5]; on a failure, the creature hits the seedpod lure instead of you, destroying it. A new one grows after 10 minutes of rest.

Seedpod Surveillance.name: Seedpod Surveillance
Seedpod Surveillance.description: Once per day, you can deploy your seedpod as a single action, which has the concentrate trait. When deployed this way, your seedpod can travel up to 200 feet away from you, with a fly Speed of 20 feet. Moving the seedpod is a free action, which you can take once per turn, and you can sense through it in all directions as if using your normal senses. After 1 minute, the seedpod returns directly to you at its normal Speed.

Sense Abnormalities.name: Sense Abnormalities
Sense Abnormalities.description: You possess an uncanny sixth sense for ambient magic. You can sense the presence of magic auras as though you were always using a 1st-rank @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.gpzpAAAJ1Lza2JVl]{Detect Magic} spell. This detects magic in your field of vision only. When you @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek}, you gain the benefits of a 3rd-rank detect magic spell on things you see (in addition to the normal benefits of Seeking). You can turn this sense off and on with a free action at the start or the end of your turn.

Sense Emotions.name: Sense Emotions
Sense Emotions.description: You can detect the emotions of others, though you lack the ability to sort out the complexities of these emotions. You gain emotion sense as an imprecise sense with a range of 30 feet. This means you can detect and determine the location of creatures that possess emotions. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks when using the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} action to find @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} or undetected creatures within the range of your emotion sense who's under an emotion effect, such as rage, the frightened condition, or any spell with the emotion trait.

Sense Life.name: Sense Life
Sense Life.description: You can detect the vital essence of creatures. You gain lifesense as an imprecise sense with a range of 30 feet. This means you can sense the vital essence of living and undead creatures within range. You can distinguish between the vitality energy animating living creatures and the void energy animating undead creatures, much as sight distinguishes colors.

Sensitive Antennae.name: Sensitive Antennae
Sensitive Antennae.description:
Your antennae are covered in fine hairs that make them more sensitive to psychic vibrations than most. You gain thoughtsense as a vague sense with a range of 30 feet. This means you can use your antennae to determine if a creature is within range. Your thoughtsense detects only thinking creatures, so a creature that's unthinking or otherwise immune to mental effects can't be perceived using your thoughtsense. This doesn't give you the ability to read or understand their thoughts.

At 9th level, this becomes an imprecise sense.

Septocular.name: Septocular
Septocular.description: You've learned to grow additional eyes all over your body, enhancing your visual processing and the range of your eyesight. When you use Change Shape, you can choose to gain all-around vision until you change forms again. During this time, you take a –3 circumstance penalty to Deception checks and Deception DCs to Impersonate a different ancestry, unless the ancestry you are Impersonating normally has seven or more eyes.

Sequester Form.name: Sequester Form
Sequester Form.description:
Frequency once per minute

Trigger You're targeted by a mental effect.

You can shield your consciousness by blocking one of your neural networks from the others, cutting yourself off from the identity until it's safe. You Change Shape and become immune to the triggering mental effect. You are no longer immune and the mental effect continues to affect you if you Change Shape into any form that shares an ancestry with that form before the duration of the mental effect expires.

Serum Crafting.name: Serum Crafting
Serum Crafting.description: You can Craft serums and medical items with the consumable trait, though some have other requirements. When you select this feat, you gain formulas for four common serums of 2nd level or lower.

Shambling Corpsefolk.name: Shambling Corpsefolk
Shambling Corpsefolk.description: Most creatures mistake you for a mindless, shambling zombie or even a lifeless corpse, and you've learned how to use your sepulchral appearance to your advantage. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.Q6vXNDmTwDom59GV]{Feign Death} feat, even if you don't meet the prerequisites. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus when using Deception to roll initiative if you are @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.AJstokjdG6iDjVjE]{Impersonating} a corpse when combat begins.

Share Quantum Aura.name: Share Quantum Aura
Share Quantum Aura.description:
Frequency once per 10 minutes

You temporarily share your quantum field with an ally. You cause your quantum field to emanate from an ally you can see instead of yourself. The ally gains all the benefits of your quantum field, and your warp spells originate from your ally instead of you until your quantum field deactivates. If you cast warp spells at other targets, you must still have line of sight to the target, but the spell originates from your ally for purposes of determining its range and line of effect.

Sharpshooter.name: Sharpshooter
Sharpshooter.description: Your ranged Strikes against the target of your Aim using the required ranged weapon deal an additional 1d4 precision damage until the end of your turn. This damage increases to 2d4 at 6th level.

Shattering Impact.name: Shattering Impact
Shattering Impact.description:
You pour all your effort into making a single attack with your solar weapon that's so powerful it shatters the weapon. Strike with your solar weapon. The Strike deals one additional weapon damage die. Your solar weapon shatters and must be manifested to continue using it.

Graviton-Attuned On a hit, the target takes a –10-foot status penalty to Speed until the start of your next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feat-effects.Item.Ll3uZdiSqaszP3fn]{Effect: Shattering Impact}

Photon-Attuned On a hit, you additionally deal persistent fire damage equal to half your level, rounded up.

Shed Skin.name: Shed Skin
Shed Skin.description:
Frequency once per hour

Trigger You attempt to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape}.

You rapidly shed a layer of your skin and slip away from a tight or sticky situation, living to fight (or flee) another day. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus on the triggering Escape, and on all attempts to Escape for 3 rounds. If the triggering Escape was successful, you can additionally Stand or Step (or Stride up to your Speed on a critical success).

Shell Shower.name: Shell Shower
Shell Shower.description:
Frequency once per round

Whether you got tired of getting hit in the face or slipping on bullet casings in the middle of a fight, you've learned how to redirect your weapon's spent ammunition or terrain warping vented energy while firing off a barrage. After you make an @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.oc0ZKnk5zD0GXqZi]{Area Fire} or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.6ctkxUnVwqooSvgg]{Auto-Fire} attack with a weapon, make any number of squares adjacent to you difficult terrain. If a square was already difficult terrain, it instead becomes greater difficult terrain. Any difficult or greater difficult terrain created by this action remains in place until cleared.

Sheltering Limbs.name: Sheltering Limbs
Sheltering Limbs.description: Your limbs and trunk grow strong and thick enough to shield your allies from danger. You can share your space with up to one willing ally. While an ally is sharing space with you or occupying an adjacent square, your ally gains the benefits of lesser cover. The ally can @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.ust1jJSCZQUhBZIz]{Take Cover} to increase the bonus to standard cover.

Shield Block.name: Bloqueo con el escudo
Shield Block.description:
Desencadenante Podrías sufrir daño debido a un ataque físico (contundente, perforante o cortante) debido a un ataque cuando tienes el escudo alzado.

Interpones tu escudo para protegerte de un Golpe. El escudo evita que sufras una cantidad de daño igual a la Dureza del mismo. Ambos os repartís el daño sobrante, lo que posiblemente puede romper o destruir el escudo.

Shifter's Eye.name: Shifter's Eye
Shifter's Eye.description: You are a master at spotting other people in disguise. When you come within 10 feet of a creature that is disguised, transformed, or Impersonating a specific creature, the GM rolls a secret Perception check for you to realize that the creature is disguised, even if you didn't spend an action to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} against that creature.

Shifter's Feint.name: Shifter's Feint
Shifter's Feint.description: You suddenly change your appearance to create an opening for your next attack. Change Shape and @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint}. You gain a circumstance bonus to your Deception check to Feint equal to the number of steps between your sizes when you Change Shape (+1 if you are one size smaller or larger, +2 if you are two sizes smaller or larger, and so on). Regardless of the results of your check, each creature who observes you Change Shape is temporarily immune to Shifter's Feint for 1 minute.

Shifter's Orientation.name: Shifter's Orientation
Shifter's Orientation.description: Your malleable body makes it easier for you to reposition and rebalance yourself. Once every 10 minutes, when you Change Shape, you can gain the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.t0oFlhMhNOHbb6rG]{Reorient} cantrip.

Shifter's Reach.name: Shifter's Reach
Shifter's Reach.description: You can stretch your body into long tentacular limbs to strike enemies from further away. For 1 minute, increase your reach when you're delivering touch range spells and making unarmed Strikes to 10 feet. This doesn't change the reach of your melee weapon attacks.

Shifter's Shove.name: Shifter's Shove
Shifter's Shove.description: You use the explosive momentum of shifting to help push a creature away from you. Change Shape into a larger size and @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove}. You gain a circumstance bonus to your Athletics check to Shove equal to the number of steps between your sizes when you Change Shape (+1 if you are one size larger, +2 if you are two sizes larger, and so on).

Shifter's Squeeze.name: Shifter's Squeeze
Shifter's Squeeze.description: You can easily contort and resize your limbs to squeeze into smaller spaces. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Acrobatics. If you are already trained in Acrobatics (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.3G8xUlgCjRmRJNfP]{Quick Squeeze} feat.

Shifting Smuggler.name: Shifting Smuggler
Shifting Smuggler.description: When you @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.34E7k2YRcsOU5uyl]{Change Shape}, you can @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.qVNVSmsgpKFGk9hV]{Conceal an Object} inside a cavity in your body or Interact to grab an object stored inside your body. You can store up to four items of light Bulk or less if you are Large, three items of light Bulk or less if you are Medium, or two items of light Bulk or less if you are Small. If you Change Shape into a smaller-sized body, the excess items fall to the ground in your square. None of these items can have a dimension longer than 1 foot.

Shirren Lore.name: Shirren Lore
Shirren Lore.description:
Your ability to adapt to various beliefs instills you with knowledge of many cultures. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Diplomacy and Society. If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice.

You also gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.BocFD2KV0qgUC76x]{Additional Lore} general feat for Shirren Lore.

Shobhad Ferocity.name: Shobhad Ferocity
Shobhad Ferocity.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger You would be reduced to 0 Hit Points, but not immediately killed.

Centuries of living on a brutal and unforgiving planet has endowed many shobhad with an implacable will to survive despite debilitating injuries. You avoid being knocked out and remain at 1 Hit Point, and your @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded} condition increases by 1.

Shobhad Lore.name: Shobhad Lore
Shobhad Lore.description:
You're well-versed in the stories of your people. You become trained in Nature and Survival. If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example) you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.BocFD2KV0qgUC76x]{Additional Lore} general feat for Shobhad Lore.

Special If you have the urban shobhad heritage, you also gain the Additional Lore general feat for Ysoki Lore.

Shobhad Special.name: Shobhad Special
Shobhad Special.description:
Requirements You have at least one hand free and are wielding a two-handed ranged weapon that doesn't have the area trait in your inactive hands.

Invented by a talented shobhad sniper over a thousand years ago, the so-called "shobhad special" is a devastating maneuver that is only possible by a creature with the shobhad-neh's unique combination of size, strength, extra limbs, and cultural sniping techniques. Much to your pride, you're one of the few who have mastered it. Attempt a fist Strike against a creature at least one size smaller than you. If the attack is successful, you deal no damage but the target is immediately thrown up to 30 feet in a direction of your choice. Then, Switch Hands and make a ranged Strike against the target with the required weapon; the target is @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} against this Strike. Regardless of whether this Strike is successful, the creature then falls @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} in whatever space is appropriate based on your throw.

Special If you have the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.KxaYlC50zzHysJj8]{Titan Wrestler} skill feat, you can use Shobhad Special against creatures up to your size, or up to one size larger than you if you're legendary in Athletics.

Shobhad Spirit-Blessed.name: Shobhad Spirit-Blessed
Shobhad Spirit-Blessed.description: You come from a line of shobhad spiritualists attuned to the whispers of the little spirits that encircle all things. Choose a 1st-rank divine or primal spell, either a common spell or another to which you have access. You can cast that spell once per day as an innate primal spell.

Shobhad Weapon Familiarity.name: Shobhad Weapon Familiarity
Shobhad Weapon Familiarity.description:
You gain access to all uncommon weapons with the shobhad trait. You have familiarity with weapons with the shobhad trait, plus the cryopike, fangblade, and hammer. For the purposes of proficiency, you treat any of these that are martial weapons as simple weapons and any that are advanced weapons as martial weapons.

At 5th level, whenever you get a critical hit with one of these weapons, you get its critical specialization effect.

Shot on the Run.name: Shot on the Run
Shot on the Run.description:
Requirements You're wielding an area or automatic weapon.

By preparing your weapon while on the move, you ready yourself to fire a salvo as soon as you're in position. Stride up to your Speed, and then @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.oc0ZKnk5zD0GXqZi]{Area Fire} or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.6ctkxUnVwqooSvgg]{Auto-Fire}.

Shoving Shot.name: Shoving Shot
Shoving Shot.description:
Requirements You're wielding an area or automatic weapon.

You use the blast of your weapon to push back your adversaries. You Area Fire or Auto-Fire. Your primary target must attempt a @Check[fortitude|against:soldier|options:forced-movement] save against your class DC.

Failure The target is pushed back 10 feet. If using an area (burst) weapon, the target is pushed away from the burst's center point.

Critical Failure As failure, but the target is pushed 15 feet.

Shroud of Shattered Spirits.name: Shroud of Shattered Spirits
Shroud of Shattered Spirits.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger An enemy's Strike or targeted effect would hit you, and you weren't already @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed}, @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden}, or undetected to that enemy.

Your mere presence attracts restless spirits, haunted objects, spiritually active substances, and fragmented souls, like a magnet attracts metal. You manifest these spirit shards in a chaotic whirlwind around you that you barely control with your thoughts. You become concealed until the beginning of your next turn, and the flat check for concealment applies to the triggering Strike or effect that would've hit you. If the flat check fails, the Strike or effect misses you.

Shy.name: Shy
Shy.description: Whether through magical training, a technomagical body rig, or superior escape and evasion training, you've managed to learn how to fade from plain sight. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]{Invisibility} as a 2nd-rank arcane innate spell twice per day, but the spell has a duration of only 5 minutes each time.

Sidestep.name: Paso lateral
Sidestep.description:
Desencadenante La tirada de ataque de un Golpe que te tiene a ti como objetivo falla o falla críticamente.

Te apartas hábilmente del camino de un ataque, dejando que el movimiento continúe. Rediriges el ataque hacia una criatura a tu elección, adyacente a ti y al alcance del ataque desencadenante. El atacante repite la tirada de ataque del Golpe contra el nuevo objetivo.

Sigiled Scales.name: Sigiled Scales
Sigiled Scales.description:
Your scales are marked with tiny sigils. When you select this feat, choose if you were blessed by a god or by an aberrant force. You can tap into the latent magic in your scales to cast a cantrip as an innate spell at will. A cantrip is heightened to a spell rank equal to half your level rounded up.

If you are blessed by a god, choose one cantrip from the divine spell list. You can cast this cantrip as a divine innate spell at will.

If you are blessed by an aberrant force, choose one cantrip from the occult spell list. You can cast this cantrip as an occult innate spell at will.

Whenever you cast an innate spell granted by your Sigiled Scales or a feat that lists Sigiled Scales as a prerequisite, the sigils on your scales glow with magical energy, shedding bright light in a 10-foot radius for a number of minutes equal to the spell's rank.

Sign Language.name: Lenguaje de signos
Sign Language.description:
Aprendes los lenguajes de signos asociados a los idiomas que conoces, lo que te permite hacer signos y entenderlos. Los lenguajes de signos suelen requerir ambas manos para transmitir conceptos más complejos y son más bien visuales que auditivos.

Un lenguaje de signos es difícil de entender durante el combate debido al nivel de atención que requiere, a diferencia de los gestos básicos como señalar a un enemigo para sugerir un objetivo. Este tipo de lenguajes es difícil de utilizar en áreas de baja visibilidad, de la misma forma que el habla es difícil en un entorno ruidoso.

Silent Tide.name: Silent Tide
Silent Tide.description: Stalking great finned beasts through the kelp forests of Kalo-Mahoi has taught you to move silently and smoothly through the cover of foliage. While sneaking, you ignore difficult terrain caused by foliage and underbrush and treat greater difficult terrain caused by foliage or underbrush as difficult terrain. In addition, you can move at your full swim Speed when you @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak} while swimming. If you have another ability that allows you to move at full speed while Sneaking, you also gain a +2 status bonus to checks to Sneak while Swimming.

Singularity.name: Singularity
Singularity.description:
Frequency once per hour

Requirements You're graviton-attuned.

You call upon a shred of the unstoppable cosmic force that eventually destroys all things. You concentrate and manifest the pinpoint center of a black hole within 60 feet. This occupies a single 5-foot space. Creatures within the singularity's space take @Damage[(max((2*floor(@actor.level / 2) - 4),10))d8[void]|options:area-damage] damage with a @Check[reflex|against:solarian|basic|options:area-effect] save against your class DC. Any creature dropped to 0 Hit Points by this effect is torn asunder and pulled into the singularity, leaving no remains. Until the end of your next turn, light can't pass through the singularity's space and all adjacent squares, shrouding it in darkness that even creatures with darkvision or greater darkvision can't see through. Any creature that starts its turn in the darkness must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|against:solarian|basic|options:area-effect,inflicts:slowed] save against your class DC or become @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for that turn.

Level (+2) Increase the damage by 2d8.

Siphon Solar Vitality.name: Siphon Solar Vitality
Siphon Solar Vitality.description: Your starburst markings store solar energy that you can tap into to revitalize your body and magically heal your wounds. You regain Hit Points equal to @Damage[(@actor.level+ 1d6)[healing]](1d6 plus your character level). If you're in an area of natural sunlight, you instead regain Hit Points equal to @Damage[((2*@actor.level)+1d6)[healing]] (1d6 plus twice your character level).
