Situational Awareness.name: Situational Awareness
Situational Awareness.description: You Ready a directive. If the trigger you designated occurs before the start of your next turn, you can use the 2-action version of the directive instead of the 1-action.

Size Up.name: Size Up
Size Up.description:
Frequency once per hour

You spend 1 minute observing a specific individual, 10 minutes researching a specific individual on the infosphere, or 1 hour networking and gathering information. This subject is your asset. If you assess your asset via observation, you don't need to know their identity, but if you assess your asset via research or networking, you must know their identity, which requires at least two relevant pieces of information about them. Examples of relevant information could include their name, their place of origin, their current residence, the name of their parent or significant other, their employer, or their organizational affiliation. The GM determines what constitutes relevant information for this purpose, based on the asset you've selected.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Deception, Diplomacy, Intimidation, and Perception checks against or in relation to your asset, and a +1 circumstance bonus to attempts to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge} about your asset.

You gain the benefits of the 2-action @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.cmCtfURzpbzkxWsy]{Get 'Em!} when using 1-action Get 'Em! on an asset.

You can maintain a number of assets equal to your Charisma modifier. If you Size Up other assets after that, your new asset replaces a previous one.

@UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feat-effects.Item.RBWwGxsrxPBKi3X7]{Effect: Size Up}

Size of the Ancients.name: Size of the Ancients
Size of the Ancients.description:
Frequency once per day

You undergo a rapid physical change, increasing in size to rival dragonkin of the ancient past. You grow to size Huge. Your equipment grows with you, but it returns to its natural size if removed or dropped. Your reach increases by 5 feet (or by 10 feet if you are a shipborn dragonkin), and you gain a +4 status bonus to melee damage. This transformation lasts for 10 minutes. You can end this transformation early as a single action that has the concentrate trait.

Skill Training.name: Entrenamiento en una habilidad
Skill Training.description:
Obtienes el rango entrenado en una habilidad a tu elección.

Especial Puedes seleccionar esta dote en múltiples ocasiones, eligiendo una habilidad diferente cada vez.

Skilled Bodyguard.name: Skilled Bodyguard
Skilled Bodyguard.description:
Your bulk and dexterous limbs are incredibly useful for ensuring that you keep your smaller allies out of harm's way. You move a number of willing, adjacent creatures that are smaller than you up to 5 feet each in a direction of your choice; the number of creatures you can move is equal to the number of unoccupied hands you currently have (including your inactive pair of hands). This counts as forced movement (meaning you cannot move a target into hazardous terrain or a space they cannot occupy).

Special If you have the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.KxaYlC50zzHysJj8]{Titan Wrestler} skill feat, you can use Skilled Bodyguard to move a creature of any size.

Skillful Encouragement.name: Skillful Encouragement
Skillful Encouragement.description:
You offer an ally advice and encouragement, granting them the inspiration they need to push themselves further in the face of a challenge. During a combat encounter, select an ally within 60 feet. That ally gains a +2 circumstance bonus to their skill checks until the beginning of your next turn. That ally then becomes temporarily immune to your Skillful Encouragement for 1 hour. If you said this advice verbally, Skillful Encouragement gains the auditory trait. If you signed this advice, Skillful Encouragement gains the visual trait.

@UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feat-effects.Item.TMarUs51Jg7v3g3f]{Effect: Skillful Encouragement}

Skirmish Strike.name: Golpe hostigador
Skirmish Strike.description: Tus pies y tu arma se mueven en tándem. Puedes, o bien dar un Paso y luego Golpear o bien Golpear y luego dar un Paso.

Skittermander Lore.name: Skittermander Lore
Skittermander Lore.description:
You're gregarious and friendly but also passionately interested in the history of your people, going out of your way to learn traditional stories and unearth lost secrets. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Diplomacy and Society. If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice.

You also gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.BocFD2KV0qgUC76x]{Additional Lore} general feat for Skittermander Lore, and you learn Morandomandranan, the original skittermander language that has long been suppressed by the Veskarium.

Skulking Strike.name: Skulking Strike
Skulking Strike.description:
Trigger An enemy occupying the same space as you uses a manipulate action or a move action, makes a ranged attack, or leaves a square during a move action it's using.

You launch a surprise attack from below. Make a melee Strike against the triggering creature. If your attack is a critical hit and the trigger was a manipulate action, you disrupt that action. This Strike doesn't count toward your multiple attack penalty, and your multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this Strike.

Skyguard.name: Skyguard
Skyguard.description: You earned your space legs in the Skyguard, Kalo-Mahoi's space navy. You become trained in Piloting, and you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Piloting checks to Navigate and Stunt. If you're already trained in Piloting, you become trained in another skill of your choice. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.VPFiluVQoj8F2Ho0]{Stunt Maneuver} skill feat, even if you don't meet the prerequisites of the feat.

Slip From Sight.name: Slip From Sight
Slip From Sight.description:
Frequency once per hour

Trigger You successfully use Stealth to Hide and become @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} from all your current foes, or use Stealth to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak} and become undetected to all your current foes.

Using clever technology, magical talent, a divine blessing, or uncanny luck, you slip from sight completely, becoming @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} for 1 minute, or until you take a hostile action, whichever comes first.

Slippery Secrets.name: Secretos escurridizos
Slippery Secrets.description: Esquivas y evades todo intento de descubrir tu auténtica naturaleza o intenciones. Cuando un conjuro o efecto mágico intenta leerte la mente, detectar si mientes o revelar tu identidad, puedes hacer una prueba de Engaño contra la CD del conjuro o del efecto. Si tienes éxito, no se revela nada.

Smooth Diversions.name: Smooth Diversions
Smooth Diversions.description:
You're practiced in the art of diverting attention quickly and subtly. When you succeed at an attempt to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.GkmbTGfg8KcgynOA]{Create a Diversion}, you can immediately @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak} or Step as a free action.

Additionally, creatures only become aware you were trying to trick them if you critically fail to Create a Diversion. Otherwise the creature assumes that your diversion was part of your regular bravado.

Smug Affirmation.name: Smug Affirmation
Smug Affirmation.description: Having overcome countless challenges in your rise to power, your self-confidence isn't just bluster and brains; it's supported by empirical evidence! Your Shielding Arrogance reaction can now also trigger whenever a foe within range of your thoughtsense critically fails an attack against you or critically fails a skill check attempted against you (such as an Intimidation check to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize} you or an Acrobatics check to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.21WIfSu7Xd7uKqV8]{Tumble} around you). Increase the number of temporary Hit Points you gain from @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.wI0g2nRfu2d0YFAd]{Shielding Arrogance} to [[/r 2d8]] plus your character level. Increase this by [[/r 1d8]] at 13th level and by an additional [[/r 1d8]] at 17th level.

Solar Barrage.name: Solar Barrage
Solar Barrage.description: You can fire off multiple shots with your solar flare in short succession. Make three solar flare Strikes against different targets, each with a –2 circumstance penalty. These attacks count toward your multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after you've made the attacks.

Solar Flare.name: Solar Flare
Solar Flare.description: You can create and maintain a solar flare, but do not add your Strength modifier to damage rolls with your solar flare or any additional benefits based on your attunement.

Solar Manifestation Expert.name: Solar Manifestation Expert
Solar Manifestation Expert.description: Your proficiency ranks for solar flare, solar weapon, and your solarian class DC increases to expert.

prerequisites.value: expert in any kind of weapon or unarmed attack

Solar Nimbus.name: Solar Nimbus
Solar Nimbus.description: You gain the Nimbus Surge reaction, but do not gain any additional benefits based on your attunement.

Solar Rampart.name: Solar Rampart
Solar Rampart.description: Your training has helped you adapt to bulkier armor. You're trained in heavy armor. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in medium armor, you also gain that proficiency in heavy armor. You treat armor you wear of 2 Bulk or higher as though it were 1 Bulk lighter (to a minimum of 1 Bulk).

Solar Shield.name: Solar Shield
Solar Shield.description:
You've developed a new solar manifestation—a small shield of stellar energy that orbits you. This energy shield has the attuned and solarian traits and doesn't require a hand to use. You can Raise a Shield, giving you a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn. You gain the Shield Block general feat.

@UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feat-effects.Item.q5W7fV1wXvqBFxt8]{Effect: Solar Shield}

While the shield is raised, you can use the Shield Block reaction with your shield. The shield has Hit Points equal to 5 plus twice your level and Hardness equal to half your level, rounded up. Your shield can't be broken, but if it's destroyed, you can't manifest a new shield for 10 minutes. If your shield vanishes due to you losing attunement, when you Attune to reform it, the shield returns with however many Hit Points it previously had. The shield regains all its lost Hit Points during your daily preparations and whenever you rest for at least 10 minutes, even if it's been destroyed.

Graviton-Attuned If your shield is destroyed, it releases a shock wave. Adjacent enemies must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|against:solarian] save against your class DC or be @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.enA7BxAjBb7ns1iF]{Suppressed} for 1 round (2 rounds on a critical failure).

Photon-Attuned If your shield is destroyed, it releases a flash of light. Adjacent enemies must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|against:solarian] save against your class DC or be @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 round (@UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round on a critical failure).

Solar Weapon Customization.name: Solar Weapon Customization
Solar Weapon Customization.description: You can select up to one trait for your solar weapon. When you reach level 6, you can choose a second trait, or the reach or two-hand 1d10 trait instead of two traits.

Solar Wind.name: Solar Wind
Solar Wind.description: You can partly discorporate your body, becoming a blur of stellar matter pushed by invisible solar winds. While photonattuned, you gain a +10-foot circumstance bonus to Speed and can move through the space of a single unwilling creature each time you Stride.

Solarian Dedication.name: Solarian Dedication
Solarian Dedication.description:
You gain the stellar attunement class feature, but you do not Attune as a free action when you roll initiative. You become trained in solar flare, solar weapon, and solarian class DC.

You can manifest a solar weapon. Your weapon has the attuned and solarian traits, but you can't select additional traits and it gains no benefits based on your attunement. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.uvtdqSfKD6oXNA29]{Re-Forge Solar Weapon} action.

Solarian's Resiliency.name: Solarian's Resiliency
Solarian's Resiliency.description: You gain 3 additional Hit Points for each solarian archetype class feat you have. As you continue selecting solarian archetype class feats, you continue to gain additional Hit Points in this way.

prerequisites.value: class granting no more Hit Points per level than 8 + your Constitution modifier

Soldier Dedication.name: Soldier Dedication
Soldier Dedication.description:
You become trained in Intimidation. If you were already trained in Intimidation, you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. Increase your maximum and encumbered Bulk limits by 2. You become trained in soldier class DC.

You become trained in light armor and medium armor. If you already were trained in light armor and medium armor, you gain training in heavy armor as well. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in any type of armor (but not unarmored defense), you also gain that proficiency in the armor types granted to you by this feat. If you have a class feature that grants you expert proficiency in unarmored defense and you're 13th level or higher, you also become an expert in the armor types granted to you by this feat.

Soldier's Resiliency.name: Soldier's Resiliency
Soldier's Resiliency.description: You gain 3 additional Hit Points for each soldier archetype class feat you have. As you continue selecting soldier archetype class feats, you continue to gain additional Hit Points in this way.

prerequisites.value: class granting no more Hit Points per level than 8 + your Constitution modifier

Soldier's Toughness.name: Soldier's Toughness
Soldier's Toughness.description: Your proficiency rank in Fortitude saves increases to master.

Soldier's Training.name: Soldier's Training
Soldier's Training.description:
Constant drills and combat experience leave you with reflexes capable of making snap decisions. Choose one soldier class feat you have that grants a reaction. At the start of your turn, you gain an additional reaction that you can only use for the selected class feat or an action granted by the selected class feat.

You can change the reaction selected for this feat when you make your daily preparations as long as the new feat meets the requirements.

Song of My People.name: Song of My People
Song of My People.description: You perform a mournful dirge tinged with supernatural grief that compels the soul of a lost comrade to return to its body. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Hnc7eGi7vyZenAIm]{Breath of Life} once per day as a 7th-rank primal innate spell. It gains the auditory trait.

Soothing Anchor.name: Soothing Anchor
Soothing Anchor.description:
Frequency once every 10 minutes

Requirements Your last action was to Sustain your quantum field or had the anchoring trait.

You concentrate more deeply on your anchor to soothe yourself. You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your character level that last for 1 round.

Soul Furnace.name: Soul Furnace
Soul Furnace.description:
Frequency once per affliction every 24 hours

Your soul becomes fuel, burning away your life force to purge an affliction. Choose a disease or poison you're afflicted by. Lose a number of Hit Points equal to the level of the affliction. Attempt a new saving throw against the affliction, as though you were at the end of its listed interval. If you fail or critically fail this save, don't increase the affliction's stage.

Soul Sustenance.name: Soul Sustenance
Soul Sustenance.description: Your soul is radiant and can sustain your living body indefinitely, without the need for outside nourishment. You don't need to eat or drink, and you count your Constitution modifier as one higher while determining how much you heal from resting.

Soul-Soother.name: Soul-Soother
Soul-Soother.description: You have a deep understanding of emotions and mental health. You become trained in one of the following skills of your choice: Diplomacy or Medicine. If you would automatically become trained in both of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. In addition, if you roll a critical failure on a Will save against an emotion effect, you get a failure instead.

Space Pirate Dedication.name: Space Pirate Dedication
Space Pirate Dedication.description:
As a plunder-seeking spacefarer, you become trained in Piloting, or become an expert in it if you were already trained. You have familiarity with all cutlasses, flails, rapiers, and weapons with the razing trait. For the purposes of proficiency, treat any of these that are martial weapons as simple weapons and any that are advanced weapons as martial weapons. If you are at least expert, you gain that weapon's critical specialization effect.

Additionally, you gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.8zWFGKRXg1SxIwFH]{Holo-Roger} action.

Specialized Operative.name: Specialized Operative
Specialized Operative.description: Choose a specialization. You become trained in one skill determined by your specialization; if you were already trained in that skill, you instead become trained in another skill of your choice. You gain a skill feat associated with that skill. You don't gain any other benefits from your specialization.

Specialty Crafting.name: Especialidad artesana
Specialty Crafting.description:
Tu entrenamiento está enfocado en la Artesanía de un tipo de objeto en particular. Selecciona una de las especialidades que se indican más abajo; obtienes un bonificador +1 por circunstancia a las pruebas de Artesanía para Elaborar objetos de ese tipo. Si tienes el rango maestro en Artesanía, este bonificador se incrementa a +2. Si no queda claro si una especialidad es aplicable o no, quien decide es el DJ. Algunas especialidades podrían aplicarse tan sólo parcialmente. Por ejemplo, si estuvieras construyendo un mangual y estuvieras especializado en carpintería, el DJ podría concederte la mitad del bonificador puesto que el objeto requiere tanto herrería como carpintería.

Especialidad Objetos aplicables
Alquimia* Sustancias alquímicas, como por ejemplo elixires
Arte Bellas artes, incluyendo joyaría
Herrería Objetos duraderos de metal, incluyendo armadura metálica
Librería Libros y papel
Vidrería Vidrio, incluidos vajillas y ventanas
Curtiduría Objetos de cuero, incluyendo armadura de cuero
Cerámica Objetos de cerámina
Construcción naval Navíos y botes
Cantería Objetos y estructuras de piedra
Sastrería Ropa
Tejido Textiles, cestos y alfombras
Carpintería Objetos y estructuras de madera

* Requiere @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.is3Oz9wt11lNq62K]{Artesanía alquimica} para elaborarlas.

Spectra Ascendant.name: Spectra Ascendant
Spectra Ascendant.description: Whether through a quirk of your bloodline, the interference of powerful spectra, or Triune's blessing, your body has been flooded by the essence of the Drift, transforming you into a spectra. You cease aging. You gain darkvision, the cosmic trait, and a fly Speed equal to your land Speed. While you're in the Drift, your fly Speed is equal to double your land Speed. Additionally, you gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.VQH9rEQuNb06NQ4b]{Cosmic Blast} action.

Spectra Transmission.name: Spectra Transmission
Spectra Transmission.description:
Frequency once per hour

You can project your speech through wireless transmission, rather than speaking aloud, causing your words to emit from unsecured technological devices as either audio, text, or both. For example, your voice could emit audibly from an intercom or appear as text on a vidscreen or holosign. Select an unsecured technological device within 100 feet. For 1 minute, you can choose to transmit anything you say through that output device, rather than say it aloud. You can change which device you use as an output as a single action. Doing so doesn't extend the duration.

Spectrasoul.name: Spectrasoul
Spectrasoul.description: You became a prismeni after a close encounter with one or more spectra. You can communicate mentally with spectra and with intelligent constructs with the tech trait within 30 feet. You don't need to share a language to communicate with such creatures in this way. This doesn't give you any special access to their thoughts and communicates no more information than normal speech would.

Speed of Thought.name: Speed of Thought
Speed of Thought.description: You have honed your telekinetic maneuverability, enabling greater bursts of speed. Increase your fly Speed by 5 feet. In addition, you gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.r1bUsyDwcwuN3MUG]{Telekinetic Sprint} action.

Spellsurge Ammo.name: Spellsurge Ammo
Spellsurge Ammo.description:
Frequency once per turn

Trigger You cast a non-cantrip spell.

You siphon spell energy into one weapon or grenade you're wielding. Until the end of your turn, the weapon or grenade deals extra force damage equal to the rank of the spell and gains the magical trait if it didn't have it already. If the spell deals damage, the extra damage becomes the same type as the triggering spell.

Spirit's Protection.name: Spirit's Protection
Spirit's Protection.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger You fail a saving throw.

In times of great stress, you can still feel the flickers of your deceased partner's heartbeat pounding in time with yours, steering you to safety or girding your mind from assault. Their spirit still protects you from beyond the grave. You can reroll the triggering saving throw and use the better result.

Spirit-Blessed Protections.name: Spirit-Blessed Protections
Spirit-Blessed Protections.description: The spirits of the planet Akiton protect you from being harmed by the forces of the natural world. You gain a +1 status bonus to saves against primal spells.

Spiritual Wards.name: Spiritual Wards
Spiritual Wards.description: Your spiritual guardians ward you against all but the most potent of magics. You have resistance 20 against spirit damage and damage from primal spells.

Spot Healing.name: Spot Healing
Spot Healing.description:
Trigger An adjacent bonded ally takes damage.

You quickly expend energy from your vitality network toward a bonded ally. @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.UeMHbnnaXDa3sGfG]{Transfer Vitality} to the triggering ally.

Spread the Love.name: Spread the Love
Spread the Love.description:
Requirements You're wielding an area or automatic weapon.

You skillfully line up your attack to harry two targets within your blast zone with equal lethality. You Area Fire or Auto-Fire, selecting two different primary targets, rather than one.

Sprint.name: Sprint
Sprint.description: You sprint at top speed to chase down a foe or flee a dangerous situation. Stride up to four times. You can increase the number of actions this activity takes to 3 to Stride up to six times.

Squirt Blood.name: Squirt Blood
Squirt Blood.description:
You squirt blood from one of your eyes at a creature within 30 feet. The target must attempt a @Check[fortitude|against:class-spell] save against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher, with the following results.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is disgusted by the display, becoming @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}.

Failure The target is struck in the face, becoming @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 round, or until they Interact once to clean the blood away.

Critical Failure The target is struck in the face, becoming dazzled for 2 rounds, or until they Interact twice to clean the blood away.

Stand Aside.name: Stand Aside
Stand Aside.description: You use your large size and extra limbs to quickly aid your smaller allies in making room for you. Stride up to your Speed. If you end your movement in a position where one or more of your spaces are occupied by an ally, each such ally can immediately Step as a free action so that they are no longer occupying the same space as you. If this isn't possible, you must end your movement so that you aren't sharing a space with an ally, as normal.

Star Brand.name: Star Brand
Star Brand.description:
Requirements Your last action was a successful solar flare or solar weapon Strike against a creature.

You brand the creature with potent solar energy that keeps it visible and attracts your solar flare. When targeting the branded creature, increase the range increment of your solar flare by 60 feet. If the branded creature is @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}, or later becomes invisible, it's @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} instead. If the branded creature was already concealed for any other reason, it's no longer concealed.

The brand lasts 10 minutes but ends immediately if the branded creature is slain or you Star Brand a different creature.

Starfinder Field Agent Dedication.name: Starfinder Field Agent Dedication
Starfinder Field Agent Dedication.description:
You are a trained agent of the Starfinder Society. You become an expert in Society. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.BocFD2KV0qgUC76x]{Additional Lore} feat for Starfinder Lore; if you were already trained in Starfinder Lore, you also become trained in a Lore skill of your choice.

Special You can take this feat if you have the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.i5OwninARF668ud8]{Xenoarchaeologist Archetype Dedication} feat even if you haven't taken two additional xenoarchaeologist feats. Xenoarchaeologist archetype feats count as Starfinder field agent feats, and vice-versa, for purposes of completing the archetypes.

Starfinder Provisions.name: Starfinder Provisions
Starfinder Provisions.description: The Starfinder Society provides you with provisions to aid you on your adventures. Each day during your daily preparations while you're in a settlement, a Starfinder Society delivery drone delivers two consumable items with an item level no higher than half your level. The drone might not be able to arrive if you're in a remote location or based on GM's discretion. If you receive a subsequent delivery and have items remaining from the prior delivery, you must return any unused consumables to the drone before receiving new stock.

Statistical Anomaly.name: Statistical Anomaly
Statistical Anomaly.description:
Frequency once per hour

Trigger You critically fail a saving throw or skill check.

It's unclear whether your luck is very good or very bad; more research may be necessary. Reroll the triggering check or save and use the second result. If the triggering skill check is for Delve Lore or the triggering saving throw is to avoid a trap's effects, the frequency for this effect becomes once per 10 minutes.

Steady Balance.name: Equilibrio firme
Steady Balance.description: Puedes mantener fácilmente el equilibrio, incluso en condiciones adversas. Siempre que obtienes un éxito utilizando la acción @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.M76ycLAqHoAgbcej]{Mantener el equilibrio}, en su lugar obtienes un éxito crítico. No estás @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Desprevenido} mientras Mantienes el equilibrio en superficies estrechas y terreno desigual. Gracias a tu increíble equilibrio, puedes hacer una prueba de Acrobacias en lugar de una salvación de Reflejos para @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.3yoajuKjwHZ9ApUY]{Agarrarte a un saliente}.

Stellar Rush.name: Stellar Rush
Stellar Rush.description:
You rush forward with a blast of stellar energy, getting into the thick of combat with ease. Stride twice. You gain a +10-foot circumstance bonus to your Speed during these moves.

Graviton-Attuned When you finish your Strides, enemies within 15 feet of you must attempt a @Check[fortitude|against:solarian|options:area-effect,forced-movement] save against your class DC. On a failure, they're pulled directly toward you, ending in an adjacent square if possible. You select the order these enemies are moved.

Photon-Attuned When you finish your Strides, you create a photon field in a @Template[type:burst|distance:15] centered on you. Until the start of your next turn, creatures outside the photon field are @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} to creatures inside the field.

Stellar Shield Collapse.name: Stellar Shield Collapse
Stellar Shield Collapse.description:
Trigger Your Solar Shield is destroyed while you have it raised.

Requirements You haven't used Black Hole or Supernova within the last 10 minutes.

Your solar shield collapses in on itself.

Graviton-Attuned Immediately use @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.51dFA09erqAeMt39]{Black Hole} as a free action (if you have the Black Hole feat).

Photon-Attuned Immediately use @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.71DtcZirJ9bbKMTY]{Supernova} as a free action (if you have the Supernova feat).

prerequisites.value: Solar Shield plus either Black Hole or Supernova

Stop Them in Their Tracks.name: Stop Them in Their Tracks
Stop Them in Their Tracks.description:
Requirements You've @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.sLikawnrJJzHMYeC]{Aimed} at a target.

With a deadly authority, you order your target to halt in their tracks, drop their weapons, and surrender. You attempt to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize} your mark. This check doesn't take the –4 circumstance penalty if the target doesn't share a language with you. On a critical success, your mark is also @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} for 1 round.

Streetwise.name: Callejeo
Streetwise.description:
Dominas la vida en las calles y notas el pulso del asentamiento en el que estás. Puedes utilizar tu modificador por Sociedad en lugar de tu modificador por Diplomacia para [[/act gather-information skill=society]]{Reunir información}. En cualquier asentamiento que frecuentes regularmente, podrás utilizar la acción de Recordar conocimiento con Sociedad para averiguar el mismo tipo de información que podrías descubrir con Diplomacia para Reunir información. La CD suele ser significativamente mayor, pero conoces la información sin tener que invertir tiempo en reunirla. Si no consigues recordar la información, puedes hacer intentos subsiguientes de Reunir información de la forma habitual.

Conoces la vida en las calles y sientes el pulso de tu asentamiento local. Puedes usar tu modificador de Sociedad en lugar de tu modificador de Diplomacia para Recopilar Información. En cualquier asentamiento que frecuenta con regularidad, puede utilizar la acción Recuperar conocimiento con la sociedad para conocer el mismo tipo de información que podría descubrir con Diplomacia para recopilar información. La CD suele ser significativamente más alta, pero usted conoce la información sin perder tiempo reuniéndola. Si no lo hacesrecuperar la información, aún puede intentar recopilar información normalmente.

Stubborn Corpse.name: Stubborn Corpse
Stubborn Corpse.description: You're willful and stubborn, and you refuse to accept your own failure—traits that have served you well in life and after death. When you critically fail a saving throw against a mental effect, you get a failure instead. Additionally, you gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.SdPRiTobzR8adtXq]{Deny Failure} reaction.

Stubborn Persistence.name: Persistencia tozuda
Stubborn Persistence.description: Los humanos son famosos por su capacidad de persistir a través de las pruebas más agotadoras que dejarían a otros listos para caer. Cuando te conviertas en @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigado} , intenta un @Check[type:flat|dc:17] . Si tienes éxito, no estás fatigado. Si la condición de fatiga tiene una causa subyacente que no abordas, como la falta de descanso, debes intentar la prueba nuevamente en un intervalo determinado por el DJ hasta que falles la prueba plana o soluciones la causa subyacente.

Student of the Canon.name: Alumno del canon
Student of the Canon.description: Has investigado lo suficiente sobre muchas fes para reconocer que algunas nociones acerca de las mismas es poco probable que sean ciertas. Si sufres un fallo crítico en una prueba de Religión para descifrar escritura de naturaleza religiosa o para Recordar conocimiento acerca de los dogmas de las fes, en su lugar sufres un fallo. Cuando pruebas a Recordar conocimiento acerca de los dogmas de tu propia fe, si sufres un fallo, en su lugar obtienes un éxito, y si obtienes un éxito, en su lugar obtienes un éxito critico.

Student of the Unseen.name: Student of the Unseen
Student of the Unseen.description: You study the subtle, intangible forces that can be found in every particle and mote of magic in the universe around you. During your daily preparations, you can meditate on these spiritual and celestial mysteries and gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.BocFD2KV0qgUC76x]{Additional Lore} skill feat in any Lore skill subcategory of your choice. This feat (and your proficiency in the Lore skill granted by it) lasts until you make your daily preparations again. Since both the feat and proficiency are temporary, you can't use them to satisfy a prerequisite for a skill increase or permanent character option (like a feat).

Stunt Double.name: Stunt Double
Stunt Double.description:
You've trained hard to tackle physical challenges of all types as part of your entertainment career. You gain a climb Speed or a swim Speed equal to your land Speed.

Special You can select this feat more than once.

Stunt Maneuver.name: Stunt Maneuver
Stunt Maneuver.description: Whether you're a natural ace or a veteran pilot, you can push a vehicle to perform incredible stunts. Remove the reckless trait when you attempt a Stunt with a –1 penalty. If you're a master in Piloting, remove the reckless trait when you attempt a Stunt with a –2 penalty or lower. If you're legendary in Piloting, remove the reckless trait from any Stunt you attempt.

Stunt Work.name: Stunt Work
Stunt Work.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger You're about to roll a saving throw.

You've performed countless risky stunts and flashy tricks for an audience, and your uncanny luck always seems to keep you safe. For the triggering saving throw, you can roll twice and take the better result.

Sturdy Vine.name: Sturdy Vine
Sturdy Vine.description: You've grown a stout vine that you can use to bludgeon enemies. You gain a vine unarmed attack, which is in the brawling weapon group, deals 1d6 bludgeoning damage, and has the khizar, sweep, trip, and unarmed traits.

Subtle Theft.name: Sustracción sutil
Subtle Theft.description: Cuando @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.RDXXE7wMrSPCLv5k]{Sustraes} algo con éxito, los observadores (toda criatura distinta a aquella a quien sustraes el objeto) sufren un penalizador -2 por circunstancia a sus CD de Percepción para detectar el robo. Además, si primero @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.GkmbTGfg8KcgynOA]{Creas una distracción} utilizando Engaño, utilizar una sola acción de @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ijZ0DDFpMkWqaShd]{Escamotear objeto} o de Sustraer no acaba con tu estado de @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{no detectado}.

Suction Cups.name: Suction Cups
Suction Cups.description: You @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.34E7k2YRcsOU5uyl]{Change Shape} to sprout hundreds of suction cups across your limbs. You gain a 15-foot climb Speed as long as you're wearing light armor or no armor.

Supernatural Soothing.name: Supernatural Soothing
Supernatural Soothing.description: When words fail and tempers flare, you center your emotions and then release your peaceful thoughts in a soothing, psychic calm. Once per day, you can cast either @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.b515AZlB0sridKSq]{Calm} or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.EfFMLVbmkBWmzoLF]{Clear Mind} as an occult innate spell, heightened to half your level rounded up.

Supernova.name: Supernova
Supernova.description:
Frequency once per 10 minutes

Requirements You're photon-attuned.

You unleash your pent-up energy, causing it to erupt like the stellar events that birth and end stars. You can choose to affect creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{15-foot} or @Template[type:emanation|distance:30]. Each affected creature takes @Damage[(@actor.level)d8[fire]|options:area-damage] damage and must attempt a @Check[reflex|against:solarian|options:area-effect,damaging-effect] save against your class DC. If you choose the 30-foot option, you instead deal @Damage[(@actor.level)d6[fire]|options:area-damage] damage.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage and is @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 round.

Failure The creature takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and is blinded for 1 minute.

Level (+1) Increase the damage by 1d8 (or 1d6 for the 30-foot option).

Supersonic Speed.name: Supersonic Speed
Supersonic Speed.description: You move incredibly fast, becoming a colorful blur of erratic motion. When you Stride while @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} from Zoomies, you gain concealment until the start of your next turn. As usual for concealment involving an obvious visual manifestation, you can't use this concealment to Hide.

Suppressing Fire.name: Suppressing Fire
Suppressing Fire.description: You gain the suppressing fire class feature.

Surface Strider.name: Surface Strider
Surface Strider.description: Through diligent training, you've learned to stretch your ability to remain out of the water for extended periods. You gain the amphibious trait.

Surprising Escape.name: Surprising Escape
Surprising Escape.description:
Trigger You become @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}, @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized}, or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained}.

Your extreme flexibility and deceptively compact frame make it easy for you to escape a variety of confines, and your quick reaction time means you can do so in a flash! You attempt to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape}.

Survey Wildlife.name: Supervisor de la fauna
Survey Wildlife.description: Puedes estudiar detalles de las tierras vírgenes para determinar la presencia de criaturas cercanas. Puedes invertir 10 minutos estudiando la zona que te rodea para averiguar qué criaturas hay cerca, basándote en los nidos, los excrementos y las marcas que hay en la vegetación. Haz una prueba de Supervivencia contra una CD determinada por el DJ basándose en lo obvios que son los signos. Con un éxito, puedes hacer una prueba de Recordar conocimiento con un penalizador -2 para averiguar más cosas acerca de las criaturas tan sólo a partir de dichos signos. Si tienes el rango maestro en Supervivencia, no sufres dicho penalizador.

Survivor's Instincts.name: Survivor's Instincts
Survivor's Instincts.description:
Trigger You are about to roll a Reflex save against a hazard

You've learned to react to Akiton's dangers at a moment's notice, and you trust your instincts to see you through. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to the triggering saving throw.

Swap Upgrades.name: Swap Upgrades
Swap Upgrades.description:
Frequency once per day

Requirements You are holding a repair kit, or you are wearing it and have a hand free.

You've meticulously prepared your gear to allow for quick adjustments in the field without damaging any delicate components. You draw and Install an Upgrade into a wielded weapon or worn armor. You can uninstall and stow an upgrade as part of this activity. If you have master proficiency in Crafting, you can Install two upgrades.

Swarm Evolution.name: Swarm Evolution
Swarm Evolution.description: Whether gradual or in an instant burst of glorious evolution, you've metamorphosed into a powerful Swarm-like creature. You gain a +2 status bonus to saves against fear, and you gain acid resistance equal to half your level. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.O6VQC1Bs4aSYDa6R]{Mask of Terror} as a 7th-rank primal innate spell once per day.

Sway the Heart, Stoke the Spirit.name: Sway the Heart, Stoke the Spirit
Sway the Heart, Stoke the Spirit.description:
You orate an inspiring speech that rallies your allies, cleansing their body and mind of harmful conditions and stoking their spirit for the ongoing battle. If you say this speech, Sway the Heart, Stoke the Spirit gains the auditory trait. If you sign this speech, Sway the Heart, Stoke the Spirit gains the visual trait. You and all allies in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:60] benefit from a 4th-rank @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.EfFMLVbmkBWmzoLF]{Clear Mind} and a 4th-rank @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Et8RSCLx8w7uOLvo]{Sound Body} spell. Additionally, your allies gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Will saves for 1 minute.

@UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feat-effects.Item.XmdJvu33YRjQbLsz]{Effect: Sway the Heart, Stoke the Spirit}

Swerveshift.name: Swerveshift
Swerveshift.description:
Trigger A creature targets you with an attack.

Requirements You are aware of the attack and are not @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} to the triggering attack.

You quickly Change Shape into a smaller size to avoid getting hit. You gain a circumstance bonus to AC, Fortitude DC, and Reflex DC against the triggering attack equal to the number of steps between your sizes when you Change Shape (+1 if you are one size smaller, +2 if you are two sizes smaller, and so on).

Swift Reposition.name: Swift Reposition
Swift Reposition.description:
Trigger You're about to roll a Reflex saving throw, but you haven't rolled yet.

Sensing danger, you can leap and twist your body away from the threat. You Step or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap} and gain a +2 circumstance bonus on your Reflex save. You must still roll the Reflex save even if this ability moves you out of range of the triggering effect.

Swift Sneak.name: Movimiento furtivo rápido
Swift Sneak.description: Te puedes mover a Velocidad completa cuando @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Mueves furtivamente}. Puedes utilizar Movimiento furtivo rápido mientras Excavas, Trepas, Vuelas o Nadas en lugar de dar Zancadas, si dispones del correspondiente tipo de movimiento.

Switch Target.name: Switch Target
Switch Target.description:
Trigger The creature you've currently @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.sLikawnrJJzHMYeC]{Aimed} at gains the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying} or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} condition.

Requirements You're wielding a gun.

As your target falls, you immediately home in on the next. You Aim at a different creature.

Synchronized Initiative.name: Synchronized Initiative
Synchronized Initiative.description:
Trigger You and your bonded partner roll the same skill for initiative, but get different results.

You and your bonded partner act in utter synchronicity with one another, reacting to danger and entering battle as one. You and your bonded partner use the higher result between your initiative rolls, but use the lower Perception or skill modifier.

Syncretic Epiphany.name: Syncretic Epiphany
Syncretic Epiphany.description: Plumbing the depths of your own connection, you understand how your piece of reality interconnects with another. You learn the advanced epiphany spell of the connection that grants training in the prerequisite connection skill.

prerequisites.value:
master in a connection skill for a connection that 
you've learned the initial epiphany for and that isn't your 
chosen connection

Synthetic Speech.name: Synthetic Speech
Synthetic Speech.description: You can cast speak with computers once per day as a 4th-rank arcane innate spell.

prerequisites.value: artificial scion android or networked android heritage

Tactical Advance.name: Tactical Advance
Tactical Advance.description:
Requirements You aren't @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.D5mg6Tc7Jzrj6ro7]{Encumbered}.

You dodge, roll, and weave out of danger, leaving no openings for attack as you move across the battlefield. Stride up to your Speed. This movement doesn't trigger reactions.

Tactical Bond.name: Tactical Bond
Tactical Bond.description: You and your bonded partner have learned to physically shield one another from harm. If you would grant lesser cover to your bonded partner (including when your partner is using you as a mount), or your bonded partner would grant lesser cover to you, standard cover is granted instead.

Tactical Bully.name: Tactical Bully
Tactical Bully.description:
Requirements Your last action was a successful @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove}.

You use your size and strength to push and position your enemies around the battlefield. You attempt to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} the creature you successfully Shoved, even if the target is no longer in your reach. If you have a tail attack, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your Trip attempt.

Tactical Swap.name: Tactical Swap
Tactical Swap.description:
Frequency once per round

Requirements Your last ranged Strike this turn missed or hit and failed to damage the target.

You swap weapons with a practiced motion. You Switch Hands or Interact to swap your current weapon for another. Make a Strike against the required target with your newly drawn weapon.

Tag Team.name: Etiqueta de equipo
Tag Team.description:
Desencadenante Tú o tu observador fallan con un Golpe contra una criatura, y la criatura está dentro del alcance cuerpo a cuerpo del otro o del primer incremento de alcance.

Su hábil trabajo en equipo con su observador les permite a ambos ayudarse mutuamente cuando fallan, utilizando los fallos de cada uno como oportunidades para atacar. Si usaste Tag Team después de que tu observador falló el ataque activador, realiza un ataque a distancia contra el mismo objetivo con un-2 penalización. Si usaste esta reacción después de fallar el Golpe desencadenante, tu observador puede usar su reacción para realizar un Golpe cuerpo a cuerpo o a distancia contra el mismo objetivo. Los golpes otorgados por esta dote no cuentan para tu penalización de ataque múltiple o la de tu observador y la penalización de ataque múltiple tuya o de tu observador no se aplica al Golpe otorgado.

Take 'Em Alive!.name: Take 'Em Alive!
Take 'Em Alive!.description:
You urge your allies to take down your enemies without incurring any loss of life. Until the beginning of your next turn, you and your allies can add the nonlethal trait to your attacks with weapons (without taking the normal penalty), and to your spells that deal damage and don't have the death or void trait.

Lead by Example If you used two actions, Strike a target with a nonlethal attack. On a success, you gain a status bonus to damage equal to your Charisma modifier. On a critical success, an ally within 30 feet can Strike the target as a reaction using a nonlethal attack.

@UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feat-effects.Item.fa4T1oR8S0lF5888]{Effect: Take 'Em Alive}

Take the Wheel.name: Tomar el volante
Take the Wheel.description:
Requirements You are adjacent to a vehicle's point of entry.

Diving into a moving vehicle and seizing the controls is nothing new for you. You Board and Take Control of the adjacent vehicle.

Tale Spinner.name: Tale Spinner
Tale Spinner.description: You keep your people's stories alive with magic. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.0zU8CPejjQFnhZFI]{Figment} and @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Qw3fnUlaUbnn7ipC]{Prestidigitation} as occult innate spells at will. A cantrip is heightened to a spell rank equal to half your level rounded up.

Talented Tracker.name: Talented Tracker
Talented Tracker.description: Your keen nose makes you an excellent tracker. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Survival. If you would automatically become trained in Survival (from your background of class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Survival checks to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{Track}. This bonus increases to +2 when tracking by scent. You also gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.urQZwmzg2kS53vd5]{Experienced Tracker} skill feat.

Talon Transporter.name: Talon Transporter
Talon Transporter.description: You've learned to carry additional supplies using your talons. You gain the Hefty Hauler skill feat. If you already have this feat, instead increase your maximum and encumbered Bulk limits by 2. While floating or flying you may use your feet as an additional pair of hands, but only to carry up to 4 Bulk of creatures or items beyond your maximum encumbrance.

Tech Caster.name: Tech Caster
Tech Caster.description: Your ability to control and empower technological devices has improved. You gain @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.yXD9uU8w8uFD2OBQ]{Delete} and @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.SbBqa1HStMrV47fb]{Supercharge Weapon} as 1st-rank divine innate spells. You can cast each of these divine innate spells once per day.

Tech Crafting.name: Tech Crafting
Tech Crafting.description: You can Craft level 1 or higher tech items, though some have other requirements. When you select this feat, you gain formulas for four common tech items of 2nd level or lower.

Tech Familiarity.name: Tech Familiarity
Tech Familiarity.description: You have an intuitive understanding of computers, machines, and other technological devices. You become trained in Computers and Crafting. If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice.

Telekinetic Titan.name: Telekinetic Titan
Telekinetic Titan.description: Straining every neuron, you briefly supercharge your telekinetic abilities. Choose Charisma, Intelligence, or Wisdom when you activate this ability. For 1 minute, you can carry Bulk equal to 7 + the chosen attribute modifier before becoming encumbered, and you can hold and carry a total Bulk of 12 + the chosen attribute modifier. Your telekinetic hands can hold and wield objects heavier than 1 Bulk, and you ignore the effects of your atrophied ability. Finally, you gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.gNUrQ8jimAvAA0xg]{Telekinetic Lift} action. When the duration ends, you become @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} for 1 minute, and your telekinetic hands drop any objects they can no longer hold.

Telepathic Conduit.name: Telepathic Conduit
Telepathic Conduit.description:
Lashunta When you use limited telepathy to communicate with another creature, you act as a conduit for their thoughts, allowing them to respond to you for a few scant moments—if they wish. The creature can give you a brief response as a reaction, or as a free action at the beginning of their next turn as long as they remain within range of your telepathy.

Shirren When you use limited telepathy to communicate with another creature, the creature can give you a brief response as a reaction, or as a free action at the beginning of their next turn.

Telepredict.name: Telepredict
Telepredict.description:
You read the subtle cues of a target's brainwaves to anticipate the mental state of a single creature within range of your limited telepathy that you can detect with thoughtsense. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Deception checks and Intimidation checks targeting the creature, to saves against the target's effects that have the fear trait, and to your Will DC against the target's Intimidation skill actions, such as @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize}. If you deal mental damage to the target, increase this bonus to +2.

You can Telepredict the actions of only one creature at a time. Telepredict ends if you use it on a different creature or the creature leaves the range of your limited telepathy.

3.label: Dealt Mental Damage to target of Telepredict

Tentacle Whip.name: Tentacle Whip
Tentacle Whip.description: You grow a tentacle that can lash out like a whip. You gain a tentacle unarmed attack that deals 1d6 bludgeoning damage. Your tentacle is in the brawling weapon group and has the barathu, finesse, reach, and unarmed traits.

Terrain Expertise.name: Experiencia en un terreno
Terrain Expertise.description:
Tu experiencia en navegar por determinado tipo de terreno hace que tengas una confianza suprema cuando lo haces. Obtienes un bonificador +1 por circunstancia a las pruebas de Supervivencia en uno de los siguientes tipos de terreno, elegido cuando eliges esta dote: acuático, ártico, bosque, cielo, desierto, llanuras, montaña, pantano o subterráneo

Especial Puedes seleccionar esta dote más de una vez, eligiendo un tipo diferente de terreno cada vez.

Terrain Stalker.name: Acechador del terreno
Terrain Stalker.description:
Selecciona un tipo de terreno difícil de la siguiente lista: escombros, matorral o nieve. Si no has sido @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{detectado} por ningún no aliado en dicho tipo de terreno, puedes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Moverte furtivamente} sin hacer una prueba de Sigilo si no te mueves más de 5 pies (1,5 m) y no pasas a 10 pies (3 m) o menos de un enemigo durante tu movimiento.

Durante la exploración, esto te permite también acercarte automáticamente a 15 pies (4,5 m) de otras criaturas mientras @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.IE2nThCmoyhQA0Jn]{Evitas ser detectado}, si no están @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.TiNDYUGlMmxzxBYU]{Buscando} activamente o en guardia.

Especial Puedes seleccionar esta dote en múltiples ocasiones. Cada vez, elige un tipo de terreno diferente.

Terrified Retreat.name: Retirada aterrada
Terrified Retreat.description: Cuando tienes un éxito crítico en la acción @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize}, si el nivel del objetivo es inferior al tuyo, el objetivo es @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Huyendo} durante 1 ronda.

Terrifying Bravado.name: Terrifying Bravado
Terrifying Bravado.description:
Trigger You critically succeed on a save against a fear effect whose source was a creature, or a creature fails or critically fails an Intimidation check to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize} you.

You laugh at your enemy's failed attempts to bully you, turning the tables on your foe with a display of terrifying bravado. You attempt an Intimidation check to Demoralize the triggering creature.

Terror-Forming.name: Terror-Forming
Terror-Forming.description:
Requirements You're wielding an area or automatic weapon.

Your weapon blasts apart the battlefield and leaves it a ruinous waste. You Area Fire or Auto-Fire. You don't designate a primary target, but instead make each square in the area of your attack difficult terrain. If a square was already difficult terrain, it becomes greater difficult terrain. Any difficult or greater difficult terrain created by this action remains in place and can't be changed without extensive engineering or magic.

That'll Show 'Em.name: That'll Show 'Em
That'll Show 'Em.description: When you warn an ally of an attack, you follow up with a shot at your enemy. The first time each round you use your @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.60BRmtuNHT6mpJOH]{Watch Out} reaction, you can make a melee or ranged Strike against the triggering creature. This Strike doesn't count toward your multiple attack penalty, and your multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this Strike. If you hit, your target is @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.enA7BxAjBb7ns1iF]{Suppressed} until the start of its next turn.

The Science of Motion.name: The Science of Motion
The Science of Motion.description: Your extensive scientific knowledge of astronomy, astrophysics, and stellar phenomenon have given you insight into the underpinnings of the universe—particularly motion. You can use this knowledge to more easily move your foes across the battlefield. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.lOE4yjUnETTdaf2T]{Reposition}, @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip}. If you critically fail an Athletics check to Reposition, Shove or Trip, you get a failure instead.

prerequisites.value: one space-related Lore (such as Astronomy Lore, Physical Science Lore, or Sun Lore)

Thermal Conversion.name: Thermal Conversion
Thermal Conversion.description:
Frequency once per hour

Requirements You are in an area of severe, extreme, or incredible heat, or you were dealt fire damage within the last round.

Your body has adapted to convert ambient thermal energy into kinetic energy to boost your speed. You Stride up to double your Speed. In addition, you become @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} until the end of your next turn. You can only use the extra action from quickened to Stride.

Thick Skins.name: Thick Skins
Thick Skins.description:
Each of your forms has unusually thick skin. Your DC on flat checks to end persistent bleed damage is reduced from 15 to 10, or from 10 to 5 after receiving especially appropriate assistance.

Special You can use the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.7yIxWfNZ7yEKs0Fd]{Restorative Shapeshifting} feat to attempt an additional flat check to end persistent bleed damage, but this is not considered especially appropriate assistance.

Thoughtful Insight.name: Thoughtful Insight
Thoughtful Insight.description: You know that it's more important to act wisely than it is to act quickly. When you take the time to consider a problem from all angles, you come up with an insightful revelation. You gain @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.pkcOby5prOausy1k]{Read Omens} as a 4th-rank occult innate spell. You can cast this spell once per day.

Timber!.name: Timber!
Timber!.description:
Trigger You become @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}, dying, or dead while standing.

You fall like a mighty tree, dealing @Damage[7d6[bludgeoning]|options:area-damage] damage to each creature in a @Template[type:line|distance:10] originating from your square with a @Check[reflex|against:class|basic] save against your class DC; on a critical failure, a medium or smaller creature falls @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} and is @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} until your body is removed.

Titan Wrestler.name: Luchador titánico
Titan Wrestler.description: Puedes hacer pruebas de @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Desarmar}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Agarrar}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.lOE4yjUnETTdaf2T]{Reposicionar}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Empujar} o @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Derribar} a criaturas de hasta 2 tamaños superiores al tuyo, o hasta 3 tamaños superiores al tuyo si tienes el rango legendario en Atletismo.

Too Stubborn to Die.name: Too Stubborn to Die
Too Stubborn to Die.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger You would die.

You return from the brink of death, hauling yourself back to consciousness through exhaustion and pain. If you have the dying or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} conditions, you lose the dying and unconscious conditions. If you're at 0 Hit Points, you have 1 Hit Point. Increase the value of your wounded and doomed conditions by 1. You can use this reaction while unconscious.

Toppling Shot.name: Toppling Shot
Toppling Shot.description:
Requirements You're wielding a gun.

You aim your shots to unbalance your foe, pushing them back or knocking them over. You @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.sLikawnrJJzHMYeC]{Aim} and then make a ranged Strike against your mark. If the Strike hits, the target is knocked back 5 feet. If this forced movement would cause them to collide with a creature or object, both the target and the creature (if any) take bludgeoning damage equal to your Aim damage. On a critical hit, the target is also knocked @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Touch The Sky.name: Touch The Sky
Touch The Sky.description: There's nothing you love more than soaring through the air. When you fly, you don't count moving upward (straight up or diagonally) as moving through difficult terrain. This does not apply to flying with equipment or vehicles, such as jet packs and hover boards.

Toughness.name: Dureza
Toughness.description: Tu cuerpo puede resistir más castigo que la mayoría antes de sucumbir. Incrementa tus Puntos de Golpe máximos en una cantidad igual a tu nivel. Reduces en 1 la CD de las pruebas de recuperación.

Toxic Transference.name: Toxic Transference
Toxic Transference.description: You use your body's built-up toxins to enhance your natural attacks, making them poisonous. Whenever you deal damage with an unarmed Strike you gained from @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.iac0qVH4SDzCXOyc]{Compact Predator}, you deal an additional 1 poison damage per weapon damage die of the attack. Whenever you @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.6fsMvO0jXtK8gYkH]{Puff Up} or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.32W1Pnex4xbhx5Bj]{Squirt Blood}, you additionally deal poison damage equal to half your level.

prerequisites.value: Compact Predator, Puff Up, or Squirt Blood

Train Animal.name: Adiestrar animal
Train Animal.description:
Inviertes tiempo en enseñar a un animal a llevar a cabo determinada acción. Puedes, o bien seleccionar una acción básica que el animal ya sabe hacer (típicamente las indicadas en la acción @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.q9nbyIF0PEBqMtYe]{Comandar a un animal}) o enseñar al animal una nueva acción. El DJ es quien determina la CD de cualquier prueba requerida y la cantidad de tiempo necesario para el entrenamiento (en general, por lo menos 1 semana). Suele ser imposible enseñar a un animal un truco que requiere pensamiento crítico. Si tienes el rango experto, maestro o legendario en Naturaleza, podrías entrenar criaturas menos usuales, a discreción del DJ.

Éxito El animal aprende la acción. Si era una acción que el animal ya conocía, puedes Comandar animal para que la lleve a cabo sin necesitar una prueba de Naturaleza. Si era una nueva acción básica, añade dicha acción a las que puede llevar a cabo el animal cuando se le Comanda, pero en ese caso tienes que hacer la prueba.

Fallo El animal no aprende el truco.

Transcended Existence.name: Transcended Existence
Transcended Existence.description: Your understanding of your connection transcends the limits of other mortals, granting you access to the most powerful spells. You gain an additional 10th-rank spell slot.

Transforming Huddle.name: Transforming Huddle
Transforming Huddle.description: You can adjust your body's size and shape to take advantage of obstacles on the battlefield. Change Shape into a Small-sized form and @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.ust1jJSCZQUhBZIz]{Take Cover}; you can Take Cover to gain standard cover if you would have lesser cover from a creature after you Change Shape; if you would have standard cover from a creature, you gain greater cover instead.

Travel-Tongue.name: Travel-Tongue
Travel-Tongue.description: Somewhere along your travels, picking up new languages became as easy as breathing—some of your colleagues even suspect you might be blessed by the god Weydan! You can speak, read, and understand any language.

Trek the Frigid Wastes.name: Trek the Frigid Wastes
Trek the Frigid Wastes.description: You've spent many long years traversing Lajok's surface, moving from city to city or hunting for food and resources. You're accustomed to moving across slippery ice sheets and plowing through deep snow. When moving over ice or snow in arctic terrain, you always gain the benefits of the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.SB7cMECVtE06kByk]{Cover Tracks} action without needing to use the activity or having to move half your Speed. You don't treat icy terrain as uneven ground (though it's still difficult terrain for you), and you ignore difficult terrain caused by snow.

Trick Magic Item.name: Trucar objeto mágico
Trick Magic Item.description:
Examinas un objeto mágico que normalmente no podrías utilizar, en un esfuerzo por trucarlo y activarlo temporalmente. Por ejemplo, esto podría permitir a un guerrero lanzar un conjuro desde una varita o a un mago lanzar un conjuro que no está en la lista arcana utilizando un pergamino. Tienes que saber qué sucede cuando se activa el objeto o no puedes intentar trucarlo.

Haz una prueba utilizando la habilidad correspondiente a la tradición mágica del objeto o la que encaja con una tradición que tiene el conjuro en su lista, si tratas de lanzarlo desde el propio objeto. Las habilidades relevantes son Arcanos para la magia arcana, Naturaleza para la primigenia, Ocultismo para las ciencias ocultas, Religión para los divinos o cualquiera de las cuatro para un objeto que tiene el rasgo mágico y carece de rasgo de tradición. El DJ es quien determina la CD basándose en el nivel del objeto (posiblemente ajustada dependiendo del objeto o de la situación).

Si activas un objeto mágico que requiere un modificador al ataque de conjuro o una CD de conjuro y no tienes la aptitud de lanzar conjuros de la tradición relevante, utiliza tu nivel como tu bonificador por competencia y el mayor de los modificadores de entre Inteligencia, Sabiduría o Carisma. Si tienes el rango maestro en la habilidad apropiada para la tradición del objeto, en su lugar utilizas el bonificador por competencia entrenado; si tienes el rango legendario, en su lugar utilizas el bonificador por competencia experto.

Éxito Durante el resto del turno actual, puedes invertir acciones para activar el objeto como si pudieras usarlo normalmente.

Fallo No puedes usar el objeto ni intentar trucarlo de nuevo este turno, pero puedes intentarlo de nuevo en turnos subsiguientes.

Fallo crítico No puedes usar el objeto y no puedes intentar trucarlo de nuevo hasta tus siguientes preparativos diarios.

prerequisites.value: rango entrenado en Arcanos, Naturaleza, Ocultismo o Religión

Tripartite Mind.name: Tripartite Mind
Tripartite Mind.description:
Trigger You would gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused}, @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{Controlled}, @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing}, @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened}, or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied} condition.

You create duplicates of your consciousness capable of fending off mental intrusion. Attempt to counteract an effect of your choice imposing one of the triggering conditions, using half your level rounded up as your counteract rank and your spell attack modifier as the counteract modifier.

Triune's Chosen.name: Triune's Chosen
Triune's Chosen.description: Triune chose you specifically to become a prismeni. You hold the All-Code close in your heart and cherish the data it's imparted upon you. You become trained in Religion and Triune Lore. You have familiarity with the pulse gauntlet, and for the purpose of determining your proficiency, the pulse gauntlet is a simple weapon. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in simple weapons, you also gain that proficiency in the pulse gauntlet.

True Leader.name: True Leader
True Leader.description: You've worked with a team for so long that you've learned to convey orders with a glance, a single word, or the tiniest flick of your hand (or suitable appendage, depending on ancestry). Once per turn, you can issue a 1-action envoy directive as a free action. This directive doesn't count toward your total number of directives issued this turn.

Twin Draw.name: Twin Draw
Twin Draw.description:
Requirements You have two free hands.

You've practiced smoothly drawing and taking aim with two weapons. Draw up to two one-handed weapons and @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.sLikawnrJJzHMYeC]{Aim}.

Twin Guard.name: Twin Guard
Twin Guard.description:
Trigger A creature within your reach critically hits you with a melee Strike, and you're wielding two solar weapons.

You raise one of your weapons to intercept a particularly deadly attack. You gain resistance equal to your level against the triggering attack. One of your solar weapons shatters and is no longer manifested.

Twin Shooter.name: Twin Shooter
Twin Shooter.description: You're especially dangerous while brandishing twin guns. As long as you're wielding two simple guns, both guns gain the agile trait.

Twin Weapons.name: Twin Weapons
Twin Weapons.description:
You have a second solar weapon. When you take this feat or Re-Forge Solar Weapon, choose its traits separately from your first weapon. You can select a different damage type, traits, and weapon group for this second solar weapon. Add the agile and twin traits to the list of weapon traits you can apply to your solar weapons.

@UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feat-effects.Item.gABm4VTVRcfbv5sG]{Effect: Solar Weapon (Twin Weapons)}

Twisted Dark Zone.name: Twisted Dark Zone
Twisted Dark Zone.description: You expose this reality to a realm of pure darkness filled with gibbering voices and otherworldly entities. The area of your quantum field functions as though it were an area of 2nd-rank @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.4GE2ZdODgIQtg51c]{Darkness}. Creatures that begin their turn in the area must succeed at a @Check[will|against:class] save against your class DC or become @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} for 1 round (this is an incapacitation effect). The creature then becomes immune for 24 hours. If this darkness is successfully counteracted, the quantum field's other effects remain.

Twitching Muscles.name: Twitching Muscles
Twitching Muscles.description: When you died, your muscles and sinew knotted themselves together more tightly than when you were alive, allowing for more tightly controlled and rapid movements. You gain a +5-foot status bonus to your land Speed.

Two Minds, One Soul.name: Two Minds, One Soul
Two Minds, One Soul.description:
Trigger You, your bonded partner, or both you and your bonded partner would roll a Will saving throw against a spell or effect that could impose the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} or controlled condition.

Requirements You and your bonded partner are within 60 feet of one another, and are willing.

You and your bonded partner are two halves of the same spirit, entwined together in different bodies. Both you and your bonded partner roll the triggering Will saving throw. The triggering creature (or creatures) uses the higher result. Both you and your bonded partner are affected by the triggering spell or effect, even if it would normally only affect one of you.

Ultimate Spacefarer.name: Ultimate Spacefarer
Ultimate Spacefarer.description: You're capable of surviving in the void of space indefinitely. While you maintain suspended respiration, you are immune to inhaled threats. Additionally, as long as you use suspended respiration, you don't need to eat or drink. Once per day as a free action, you can suspend respiration in atmosphere with these benefits for 1 minute.

Uncanny Awareness.name: Conciencia asombrosa
Uncanny Awareness.description: Tienes un agudo sentido del movimiento a tu alrededor. Obtienes sentido de movimiento como un sentido impreciso hasta 30 pies. El sensor de movimiento le permite detectar movimientos cercanos a través de la vibración y el movimiento del aire.

Uncanny Comprehension.name: Uncanny Comprehension
Uncanny Comprehension.description: You take in your surroundings, instantly opening your mind up to the answers hidden all around you and the clues their presence has left behind. You instantly use up to three Recall Knowledge actions. If you have any special abilities or free actions that would normally be triggered when you Recall Knowledge, you can't use them for these actions. The first time one of these attempts to Recall Knowledge uses a Lore skill you selected with Additional Lore, you roll the associated Recall Knowledge check twice and use the higher result. That Recall Knowledge check gains the fortune trait.

Uncontrollable.name: Uncontrollable
Uncontrollable.description: You refuse to let anyone control you. Whenever you attempt a Will save against a spell or effect that would give you the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{Controlled} condition, roll twice and use the higher result. If you would start your turn confused or controlled, you can immediately attempt a @Check[flat|dc:5]. On a success, you fight that mental control, becoming @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} until the end of your turn rather than acting against your will. If you roll a 20 on this check, you immediately end the confused or controlled condition.

Unconventional Expertise.name: Experiencia Poco Convencional
Unconventional Expertise.description: Has continuado avanzando tus poderes con el uso de tu arma poco convencional. Cada vez que obtienes un rasgo de clase que te concede una competencia a nivel experto o superior en determinadas armas, también obtienes dicho nivel en el arma que has elegido para @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.49mBVNF4SK6iYdJm]{Armas poco convencionales} .

Unconventional Weaponry.name: Armas poco convencionales
Unconventional Weaponry.description:
Te has familiarizado con una arma en particular, potencialmente de otra ascendencia o cultura. Elige una arma poco común sencilla o marcial con un rasgo correspondiente a una ascendencia (como por ejemplo enano, goblin u orco) o que es común en otra cultura. Obtienes acceso a dicha arma y a efectos de competencia, la tratas como si fuera una arma sencilla.

Si estás entrenado en todas las armas marciales, en su lugar puedes elegir una arma poco común avanzada con un rasgo de ascendencia o que es común en otra cultura. Obtienes acceso a dicha arma y obtienes familiaridad con la misma. A efectos de competencia, la tratas como una arma marcial.

Undead Empathy.name: Empatía no-muerta
Undead Empathy.description: Tu relación con los no-muertos te da un vínculo más fuerte con otros no-muertos. Puedes usar la Diplomacia para @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Make an Impression} sobre muertos vivientes sin sentido o hacerles peticiones simples. Mientras no haya seres vivos cerca, normalmente te dejan hablar. Si la criatura no-muerta actualmente está esclavizada por una criatura cuyo nivel es superior al tuyo, normalmente necesitarás un éxito crítico en tu prueba de habilidad de Diplomacia.

Undead Scholar.name: Undead Scholar
Undead Scholar.description: Your people's long history of clashing with Eox has made you wary. You become trained in Religion. If you were already trained in Religion, you become trained in another skill of your choice. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to checks to Recall Knowledge about undead creatures.

Undead Senses.name: Undead Senses
Undead Senses.description: Your senses changed and improved after you died. Now you can feel the vitality energy radiating from living creatures and the void surrounding other undead entities like you. You gain lifesense as an imprecise sense with a range of 10 feet, allowing you to pinpoint the locations of (and distinguish between) living and undead creatures, but not other unliving beings such as constructs.

Undead Slayer.name: Asesino de muertos vivientes
Undead Slayer.description: Tu conocimiento de tu propia anatomía no del todo viva, combinado con tu experiencia en combate, te ayuda a derrotar a enemigos no-muertos con facilidad. Contra criaturas no muertas, obtienes una bonificación de circunstancia al daño con armas y ataques sin armas igual a la cantidad de dados de daño con arma para el Golpe. Esta bonificación aumenta hasta duplicar la cantidad de dados de daño del arma si tu objetivo tiene el rasgo de vampiro.

1.text: When you succeed or critically succeed at a check to Recall Knowledge against an undead creature that you can see, you identify a weak spot in their defenses—for 1 minute, you gain access to the critical specialization effects of all weapons and unarmed attacks for attacks you make against that specific creature.

Underfoot.name: Underfoot
Underfoot.description: You use your size against larger foes, quickly moving around them to avoid notice or stay out of reach. As long as you're Small, you can end a successful @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.21WIfSu7Xd7uKqV8]{Tumble Through} action in a Medium or larger enemy's space. The enemy must have appropriate limbs or otherwise leave you enough room for this maneuver, as determined by the GM. You couldn't, for example, occupy the space of an ooze that matches the full dimensions of the square. While you occupy an enemy's space, that enemy is @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} to you.

prerequisites.value: shipborn ysoki or tunnel ysoki heritage

Underwater Combatant.name: Underwater Combatant
Underwater Combatant.description: You've learned how to wield nearly any weapon effectively while underwater. You don't take the –2 penalty for making melee slashing or bludgeoning Strikes while underwater. Your ranged attacks aren't affected by being underwater. You can use weapons that deal fire damage underwater.

Undying.name: Undying
Undying.description:
Frequency once per hour

Trigger You have the dying condition and are about to attempt a recovery check.

You have died once before and have no intention of dying ever again; your soul stubbornly resuscitates your body when you would otherwise perish. You are restored to 1 Hit Point, lose the dying and @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} conditions, and can act normally on this turn. You increase your wounded condition as normal.

Undying Defiance.name: Undying Defiance
Undying Defiance.description: You laugh at holy symbols and delight in the sound of faltering prayers. You are more in tune with your existence as an undead than many other corpsefolk are, and you can now leverage that to hold off those who would wield religious energies to try and unmake you. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to all saving throws against divine effects and spells.

Unhindered Advance.name: Unhindered Advance
Unhindered Advance.description: When you use @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.c0TkeJ8LytJ5A6A1]{Tactical Advance}, you ignore difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain.

Universal Telepath.name: Universal Telepath
Universal Telepath.description:
Frequency once per day
