Communication via mere words is a limitation of lesser minds. Your thoughts weave meaning from words, feelings, mental imagery, and ineffable stimuli for 10 minutes, during which you can communicate using your limited telepathy without sharing a language.

At 17th level, you can activate this feat at will.

Universal Translator.name: Universal Translator
Universal Translator.description: By activating your arcane sensory organ and analyzing ancestral memories and arcane lore, you can communicate with all kinds of people, animals, and even plants. You gain @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.BBvV7qoXGdw09q1C]{Speak with Animals}, @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.qvwIwJ9QBihy8R0t]{Speak with Plants}, and @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.vTQvfYu2llKQedmY]{Translate} as 3rd-rank arcane innate spells. You can cast each spell once per day.

Unleash Hell!.name: Unleash Hell!
Unleash Hell!.description:
Frequency once per day

Requirements wearing armor customized with Hellknight regalia.

Your armor unleashes a gout of hellfire in a @Template[type:cone|distance:30], dealing @Damage[(@actor.level)d6[@actor.flags.sf2e.hellknight.order-damage]|options:area-damage] damage per level of a type determined by your chosen Hellknight order (@Check[reflex|against:class-spell|basic|options:area-effect]); a creature takes @Damage[(@actor.level)d6[spirit]|options:area-damage]{spirit damage} instead if that would be more detrimental (as determined by the GM).

Unleash Pneuma.name: Unleash Pneuma
Unleash Pneuma.description:
You unleash a portion of your spiritual essence—either the vitality of your living body or the void of your undead soul—in a violent burst around you. You deal @Damage[5d6[untyped]] damage of your selected type (see below) to all adjacent creatures (basic Reflex save using your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher). At 11th level and every 2 levels thereafter, this damage increases by 1d6.

When you take this feat, choose either vitality or void. Once chosen, this selection can't be changed. Unleash Pneuma deals the chosen damage type and gains the chosen trait.

Special You can take this feat twice, but you must select a different damage type each time. If you do, Unleash Pneuma's frequency becomes once per day per damage type, rather than once per day.

Unleash Sota's Flame.name: Unleash Sota's Flame
Unleash Sota's Flame.description:
Channeling the heat of Sota's rekindled sun, you unleash a blast of plasma across the battlefield. You deal @Damage[10d8[fire]] damage in a @Template[line|distance:120]. For 1 minute afterward, your body is awash with solar energy. Creatures that Grab you or that hit you with an unarmed Strike or a non-reach melee weapon take @Damage[1d6[fire]] damage. Creatures in the area must attempt a @Check[reflex|against:class-spell] save using your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage, plus @Damage[1d6[electricity]] damage, and is @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 round.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage, plus @Damage[1d6[persistent,electricity]] damage, and is @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round. For 1 minute afterward, your body is awash with solar energy. Creatures that Grab you or that hit you with an unarmed Strike or a non-reach melee weapon take @Damage[1d6[fire]] damage.

Unliving Memories.name: Unliving Memories
Unliving Memories.description: Some element of your borai nature gives you flashes from the beyond: visions from the afterlife you were intended for or might still one day obtain. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Religion. If you're already trained in Religion, you instead become trained in another skill of your choice. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.BocFD2KV0qgUC76x]{Additional Lore} feat for a Lore subcategory about a specific plane tied to your afterlife (such as Heaven, Hell, Nirvana, or Outer Rifts Lore).

Unmistakable Lore.name: Saber inconfundible
Unmistakable Lore.description: Nunca te equivocas con la información relativa a tus áreas de experiencia. Cuando Recuerdas conocimiento utilizando cualquier subcategoría de Saber en la que estás entrenado, si sufres un fallo crítico, en su lugar sufres un fallo. Si tienes el rango maestro en una subcategoría de Saber, con un éxito crítico obtienes aún más información o contexto de lo usual.

0.text: Cuando Recuerdas conocimiento utilizando cualquier subcategoría de Saber en la que estás entrenado, si sufres un fallo crítico, en su lugar sufres un fallo. Si tienes el rango maestro en una subcategoría de Saber, con un éxito crítico obtienes aún más información o contexto de lo usual.

Unquenchable Breath.name: Unquenchable Breath
Unquenchable Breath.description: When you use Dragonkin Breath, a creature who fails or critically fails its saving throw takes @Damage[2d6[persistent,@actor.flags.sf2e.dragonkinBreath.damageType]] damage of the same type. On a critical failure, the flat check to remove persistent damage increases to DC 20 (or DC 15, if the flat check would be reduced because the creature has an appropriate type of help). If you apply a critical weapon specialization effect that also deals persistent damage of the same type, apply this persistent damage in addition to the base persistent damage.

Unseen Tides.name: Unseen Tides
Unseen Tides.description: The surge of Kalo-Mahoi's ever-present tides courses in your blood, and you can feel their pull wherever you go. You gain @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.aqRYNoSvxsVfqglH]{Unfettered Movement} as a 4th-rank primal innate spell that you can cast once per day.

Unsettling Display.name: Unsettling Display
Unsettling Display.description: You can @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize} those around you by shifting your muscular and skeletal systems around. When you do, Demoralize loses the auditory trait and gains the visual trait, and you don't take a penalty if the creature doesn't understand your language.

Unstable Flare.name: Unstable Flare
Unstable Flare.description:
You supercharge your solar flare and unleash multiple simultaneous blasts at all foes in an area. Make a solar flare Strike with a –2 circumstance penalty against each enemy in a @Template[type:burst|distance:15] centered on any point within your solar flare's first range increment. Each attack counts toward your multiple attack penalty, but you don't increase your penalty until you've made all your attacks.

Graviton-Attuned You can Stride up to half your speed once as a free action immediately before or after making your attacks.

Photon-Attuned You're @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} to each target of this attack until the start of your next turn.

Unstoppable Directives.name: Unstoppable Directives
Unstoppable Directives.description:
Your confidence is a battery that keeps your allies going. When you use a directive that grants temporary Hit Points, increase the temporary Hit Points by your level. When you use a directive that doesn't grant temporary Hit Points, you can grant one ally affected by that directive temporary Hit Points equal to half your level. These temporary Hit Points last for 1 minute.

@UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feat-effects.Item.HB8lDFxU86aAl50M]{Effect: Unstoppable Directives}

Untrained Improvisation.name: Improvisación no entrenada
Untrained Improvisation.description: Has aprendido a manejar las situaciones cuando te encuentras fuera de lugar. Tu bonificador por competencia para las pruebas de habilidades no entrenadas es igual a la mitad de tu nivel -2. Esto mejora a tu nivel menos uno a 5.º nivel y a tu nivel completo a 7.º nivel. Sin embargo, esto no te permite utilizar las acciones entrenadas de la habilidad.

Unusual Treatment.name: Tratamiento inusual
Unusual Treatment.description:
Tu entrenamiento médico se extiende a estados menos obvios. Cuando tienes éxito contra una CD 20 en una prueba para @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1kGNdIIhuglAjIp9]{Tratar heridas}, también puedes reducir en 1 el valor de uno de los siguientes estados: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Anonadado}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Debilitado} o @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Torpe}. Si eres capaz de tratar a más de una criatura a la vez, elige tan solo una para obtener este beneficio. Una criatura se puede beneficiar de Tratamiento inusual sólo una vez al día.

Si el estado es consecuencia de una aflicción, ésta no se cura (aunque el estado se reduce mientras la aflicción permanece en dicho estado).

Si tienes el rango maestro en Medicina, añade el estado @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drenado} a la lista de estados que puedes quitar si tienes éxito en una prueba a CD 30. Si tienes el rango legendario en Medicina, reduces en 2 en lugar de 1 el estado elegido

Urban Survivalist.name: Urban Survivalist
Urban Survivalist.description: You can use [[/act subsist skill=survival]]{Survival} in place of Society to Subsist in cities, space stations, and other settlements. You can also use @Check[survival] instead of Perception to notice hazards in these environments; if you find a hazard in this way, you can also use Survival instead of Thievery to [[/act disable-device skill=survival]]{Disable the Device}.

Urchin.name: Urchin
Urchin.description:
Frequency once every 10 minutes

Trigger A creature Grabs you or successfully Strikes you with an unarmed melee strike or a non-reach melee weapon.

You flex the spines running down the back of your head and neck as a defensive response. The attacking creature takes @Damage[(floor((@actor.level + 1) / 3 + 1))d6[piercing]] damage, with a @Check[reflex|against:class-spell|basic] save against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher. On a critical failure, the target also takes @Damage[(floor((@actor.level + 1) / 3 + 1))[persistent,bleed]] damage. At 8th level and every 3 levels thereafter, the damage increases by 1d6, and the persistent bleed damage increases by 1.

Use the Scenery.name: Use the Scenery
Use the Scenery.description: Performing for an audience has made you aware of your surroundings. You're always looking for ways to use the scenery to your advantage, setting yourself up to show your best angle to the world—or hide it! You always gain an additional +1 status bonus when you @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.ust1jJSCZQUhBZIz]{Take Cover}.

Vector Reflector.name: Vector Reflector
Vector Reflector.description:
Trigger A @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.enA7BxAjBb7ns1iF]{Suppressed} creature damages you with a Strike.

Your armor absorbs some of the kinetic energy of your opponent's attack. You gain resistance equal to half your level against the triggering damage (or equal to your level if you have the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.class-features.Item.T78VQC8oaD1Odz1k]{Armor Storm} fighting style). If the triggering creature is within reach, attempt an Athletics check to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} it.

Vent Gas.name: Vent Gas
Vent Gas.description:
Frequency once per hour

You vent gas to propel yourself forward. All squares in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:5] become filled with gas. All creatures in the gas become @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed}, and all creatures outside the gas become concealed to creatures within it. This gas disperses at the beginning of your next turn.

You gain a +10-foot circumstance bonus to all your Speeds until the start of your next turn. Then you Stride.

Versatile Outfit.name: Versatile Outfit
Versatile Outfit.description: You are known for your astounding custom outfits and pride yourself on designing versatile and reconfigurable garments, allowing you to create nearly any look in a matter of moments. You can use the Crafting skill rather than Deception to Impersonate another person, and can do so in 1 minute rather than the usual 10 minutes. You don't need a disguise kit to Impersonate a specific person when using Crafting to do so, and a maker's toolkit grants a +1 item bonus to the check.

Vesk Weapon Familiarity.name: Vesk Weapon Familiarity
Vesk Weapon Familiarity.description:
You're trained with all doshkos. In addition, you gain access to all uncommon weapons with the vesk trait. For the purposes of proficiency, you treat any of these that are martial weapons as simple weapons and any that are advanced weapons as martial weapons.

At 5th level, whenever you get a critical hit with one of these weapons, you get its critical specialization effect.

Veteran Trap Finder.name: Veteran Trap Finder
Veteran Trap Finder.description: You can use [[/act disable-device skill=mission-lore]]{Mission Lore} instead of Computers or Thievery to disable traps in locations you researched using Mission Briefing. You can disable traps that require a proficiency rank of master in Computers or Thievery. If you have master proficiency in Computers or Thievery, you can disable traps that require a proficiency rank of legendary in that skill instead, and increase the circumstance bonus you gain from Danger Awareness to +2.

Vicious Breath.name: Vicious Breath
Vicious Breath.description: The intensity of your draconic breath lays waste to the environment and your foes. When you use Dragonkin Breath, the area of your breath becomes difficult terrain for 1 minute. Any creature that enters the area of your dragonkin breath or is occupying your breath's area at the end of its turn takes @Damage[4d6[@actor.flags.sf2e.dragonkinBreath.damageType]] damage of the same type (@Check[reflex|against:class-spell|basic] save against the same DC as your dragonkin breath).

Vicious Takedown.name: Vicious Takedown
Vicious Takedown.description:
Requirements Your most recent action was a success on a melee Strike against a creature who is at least one size larger than you.

You know that being small only means you need to be more vicious to survive and have learned to use your size to your advantage against larger foes. Attempt an Athletics check to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} the target, ignoring the size requirements. If you roll a critical failure, you get a failure instead.

Virtuosic Performer.name: Intérprete virtuoso
Virtuosic Performer.description:
Tienes un talento excepcional en un tipo de interpretación. Obtienes un bonificador +1 por circunstancia cuando llevas a cabo un determinado tipo de interpretación. Si tienes el rango maestro en Interpretación, este bonificador se incrementa a +2. Selecciona una de las siguientes especialidades y aplica el bonificador al hacer pruebas de Interpretación de ese tipo. Si no queda claro si una especialidad es aplicable o no, quien decide es el DJ.

Especialidad Ejemplos
Actuación Drama, mimo, marionetas
Comedia Payasadas, contar chistes, poemas graciosos
Danza Ballet, huara, jiga, macru
Teclados Clave, órgano, piano
Recitado Épica, oda, poesía, narración
Percusión Carillón, tambor, gong, xilófono
Canto Balada, cántico, melodía, rima
Cuerda Violín, arpa, laúd, viola
Viento Gaita, flauta, flauta dulce, trompeta

Vital Sap.name: Vital Sap
Vital Sap.description: The sticky sap produced by your vined body has healing properties. You produce 1d4 vials of sap each day when you are exposed to natural sunlight for at least 4 hours. A creature that drinks a vial of the sap as an Interact action restores 2d8 Hit Points. This effect has the healing and vitality traits.

Vitality Network.name: Vitality Network
Vitality Network.description: You gain a @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.class-features.Item.hNnIAyBxfQ2Howp2]{Vitality Network} with 10 Hit Points and can use @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.UeMHbnnaXDa3sGfG]{Transfer Vitality} to transfer up to 10 HP. Increase the maximum capacity of your vitality network by 10 at 10th, 15th, and 20th-level. Increase the amount you can transfer by 5 at 5th, 10th, 15th, and 20th-level.

Vitality Web.name: Vitality Web
Vitality Web.description: You can manifest your bond as a web of vital energy between your allies. You learn the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.6HMiN0oQzeoYR3it]{Vitality Web} epiphany spell.

Vlaka Lore.name: Vlaka Lore
Vlaka Lore.description:
You strive to keep the traditions and stories of your people alive, even as you build new communities and forge new alliances. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Diplomacy and Society. If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice.

You also gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.BocFD2KV0qgUC76x]{Additional Lore} general feat for Vlaka Lore.

Void Blood.name: Void Blood
Void Blood.description: The ichor pulsing through your veins is infused with void energy, and it protects your body and soul from the same sinister power. You have void resistance equal to half your level.

Void Sight.name: Void Sight
Void Sight.description: You're accustomed to living or working in utter darkness, and your eyes have adjusted to the gloom. You gain greater darkvision.

Voidstrong.name: Voidstrong
Voidstrong.description:
Your unbelievable resilience allows you to survive even in the vacuum of space—at least for a while. You can hold your breath for 10 minutes. You have cold resistance equal to half your level.

Special If you have the glacierborn shobhad heritage, your cold resistance is instead equal to your level. If you have the offworld shobhad heritage, you additionally gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.aJUXbe9HJVvv0Mxa]{Breath Control} general feat.

Wall Jump.name: Saltar paredes
Wall Jump.description:
Puedes utilizar el impulso procedente de un salto para propulsarte a lo largo de una pared. Si estás adyacente a una pared al final de un salto (ya sea @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Sin carrerilla}, de @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{Altura} o de @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Longitud}), no te caes si tu siguiente acción es otro salto. El anterior te proporciona impulso, por lo que puedes utilizar Salto de altura o Salto de longitud como una sola acción, pero no puedes dar una Zancada como parte de la actividad.

Tan sólo puedes utilizar Saltar paredes una vez en un turno, si no tienes el rango legendario en Atletismo, en cuyo caso puedes utilizarlo tantas veces como puedes utilizar acciones de salto consecutivas en dicho turno.

Ward Medic.name: Médico de sala
Ward Medic.description: Has estudiado en grandes salas médicas, tratando varios pacientes a la vez y atendiendo a todas sus necesidades. Cuando utilizas @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.TC7OcDa7JlWbqMaN]{Tratar enfermedad} o @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1kGNdIIhuglAjIp9]{Tratar heridas}, puedes tratar hasta a dos objetivos. Si tienes el rango maestro en Medicina, puedes tratar hasta a cuatro objetivos y si tienes el rango legendario puedes tratar hasta a ocho objetivos.

Warp Wounds.name: Warp Wounds
Warp Wounds.description:
Trigger An enemy damages you.

Requirements An enemy or willing ally is in your quantum field.

Your reality shifts to partly overlap with another in which someone else was injured in your stead. You gain resistance to all damage against the triggering attack equal to half your level, and one enemy or willing ally in your quantum field takes damage of the same type equal to the amount of damage prevented this way, with a @Check[fortitude|against:witchwarper|basic] save against your class DC.

Wary Disarmament.name: Desactivación cautelosa
Wary Disarmament.description: Si desencadenas un artilugio o disparas una trampa cuando la estás desactivando, obtienes un bonificador +2 por circunstancia a tu CA o a tu tirada de salvación contra el artilugio o trampa. Esto sólo se aplica a ataques o efectos desencadenados por tu intento fallido, no a los ataques adicionales de una trampa compleja.

Waste Not.name: Waste Not
Waste Not.description:
With careful focus, you guarantee vital energy lost from a target is caught by your vitality network. If the next action you use is to Cast a Spell that deals void damage to a living creature, your vitality network gains Hit Points equal to twice the spell's rank.

Special You can Waste Not without the spellshape trait. If you do and your next action is to Strike with a weapon that deals void damage, your vitality network gains 2 Hit Points per weapon damage die.

Watch Out.name: Watch Out
Watch Out.description:
Trigger A creature targets an ally within 60 feet with an attack, and you can see both the attacker and your ally.

You signal a warning to your ally, granting them a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

@UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feat-effects.Item.8eqdNadBEcXMvjng]{Effect: Watch Out}

Weakening Shot.name: Weakening Shot
Weakening Shot.description:
Requirements You're wielding a gun.

You target a creature's limbs or load-bearing appendages to weaken them. You Aim and then make a ranged Strike against your mark. If the Strike hits, the creature becomes your choice of @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} until the end of your next turn (@UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} on a critical hit).

Weapon Proficiency.name: Competencia con armas
Weapon Proficiency.description:
Obtienes el rango entrenado en todas las armas marciales. Si ya estabas entrenado en todas las armas marciales, obtienes el rango entrenado en una arma avanzada a tu elección. Si eres por lo menos de 11.º nivel, obtienes también el rango experto en dichas armas.

Especial Puedes seleccionar esta dote más de una vez. Cada vez que lo haces, obtienes el rango entrenado en una arma avanzada.

Well of Vitality.name: Well of Vitality
Well of Vitality.description: Your flowering is a reservoir of incredible vitality energy. Once per day, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Hnc7eGi7vyZenAIm]{Breath of Life} as a primal innate spell.

Whirling Swipe.name: Whirling Swipe
Whirling Swipe.description:
Requirements You're wielding a two-handed melee weapon.

You swipe your weapon in a wide swing to create a deadly arc. Your weapon gains the area (burst 5 feet) and unwieldy traits until the end of the turn. If your weapon has reach, the burst radius becomes the reach of your weapon. @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.oc0ZKnk5zD0GXqZi]{Area Fire} with the required weapon, centering the burst on a corner of a square you occupy. You're excluded from the burst. If you're using a weapon with the backswing or sweep trait, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to the save DC of the attack. If you have the primary target class feature, the primary target Strike you make is a melee Strike, rather than a ranged Strike.

Widen Area.name: Widen Area
Widen Area.description:
Requirements You're wielding an area or automatic weapon.

You set up your area weapon to affect more targets. If the next action you use is to Area Fire or Auto-Fire in a burst, cone, or line, or if you use @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.xND8wnEdnGSq84kn]{Whirling Swipe}, you increase the area of that attack. Add 5 feet to the radius of a burst that normally has a radius of at least 10 feet (a burst with a smaller radius isn't affected). Add 5 feet to the length of a cone or line that's normally 15 feet or smaller, and add 10 feet to the length of a larger cone or line.

Widen Spell.name: Extender conjuro
Widen Spell.description: Manipulas la energía de tu conjuro, haciendo que se extienda y afecte a una area mayor. Si la siguiente acción que utilizas es Lanzar un conjuro que tiene una área de efecto de explosión o línea y carece de duración, incrementa el área del mismo. Añade 5 pies (1,5 m) al radio de una explosión que normalmente tiene un radio de por lo menos 10 pies (3 m); una explosión con un radio menor no resulta afectada. Añade 5 pies (1,5 m) a la longitud de un cono o una línea que normalmente es de 15 pies (4,5 m) o menor y añade 10 pies (3 m) a la longitud de un cono o una línea mayor.

Wild Bond.name: Wild Bond
Wild Bond.description: Understanding that all living things are part of the same tapestry of life, you can tap into the universal code to radically alter the genes of creatures in your bond. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.ssOpTABjuHAqNTPu]{Wild Bond} epiphany spell.

Willful Defiance.name: Willful Defiance
Willful Defiance.description: You loudly proclaim your opposition to a single creature you're aware of within 60 feet. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Armor Class and saving throws against the selected creature's attacks, spells, and other effects for 1 minute. During that time, if you would fail or critically fail a saving throw against the selected creature, you can choose to reroll the failed save. If you do, after rerolling, Willful Defiance ends.

Witchwarper Dedication.name: Witchwarper Dedication
Witchwarper Dedication.description:
Choose a paradox. You become trained in the paradox's skill or, if you were already trained, you become trained in a skill of your choice. You gain the Warp Reality action, but your quantum field is a @Template[type:burst|distance:10].

You cast spells like a witchwarper. You gain access to the Cast a Spell activity. You gain a spell repertoire with two common cantrips from the spell list associated with your paradox, from the spells granted by your paradox, or any other cantrips of that tradition you learn or discover. You're trained in the spell attack modifier and spell DC statistics. Your key spellcasting attribute for witchwarper archetype spells is Intelligence, and they are witchwarper spells of your paradox's tradition. You don't gain any other abilities from your choice of paradox.

Without a Trace.name: Without a Trace
Without a Trace.description: You're an expert at destroying or removing incriminating evidence from a crime scene. When using the Cover Tracks exploration activity, an yone tracking you must succeed at a Perception check against your @Check[perception|against:deception]{Deception}, @Check[perception|against:stealth]{Stealth}, or @Check[perception|against:underworld-lore]{Underworld Lore} DC (whichever is highest). If you spent 10 minutes cleaning up a crime scene, anyone investigating the scene must succeed at a Perception check against your Deception, Stealth, or Underworld Lore DC (whichever is highest) to uncover any @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} evidence.

prerequisites.value: trained in Deception, Stealth, or Underworld Lore

Work's Never Done.name: Work's Never Done
Work's Never Done.description: Your experience as a brood-minder has hardened you, and you can function fully with little to no rest. You require only two hours of sleep to get a full night's rest, rather than eight. You can use exploration activities when @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued}.

Working Artist.name: Working Artist
Working Artist.description: People have noticed the originality and quality of your artistic creations, and you've started moonlighting as a professional artist. You become trained in Crafting or a Lore skill related to art (such as Art Lore or Sculpture Lore). When you succeed or critically succeed on a check to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.QyzlsLrqM0EEwd7j]{Earn Income} using Crafting or a Lore skill related to art, calculate the amount you earn as if you'd attempted a check one level higher.

Wormhole.name: Wormhole
Wormhole.description:
Frequency once per hour

You force a rip in space that acts as a tunnel to a nearby location. Create two wormholes in unoccupied squares in line of effect that are within 100 feet, visible to you, and at least 15 feet apart. When a creature enters a wormhole's space, they emerge in an unoccupied space of their choice adjacent to the other wormhole. A creature that isn't flying treats all spaces lacking solid ground as occupied. If there's no valid space for the creature to enter, then both wormholes collapse and the creature remains in the space where it entered the first wormhole. The wormholes last for 1 round before collapsing, but you can Sustain the wormholes for up to 1 minute. Use your attunement when you take the Wormhole action to determine its attuned effects.

Graviton-Attuned A creature beginning its turn adjacent to a wormhole must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|against:solarian|options:forced-movement] save against your class DC or be pulled into the wormhole.

Photon-Attuned A creature entering the wormhole becomes @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} until the start of its next turn.

Wriggling Contortionist.name: Wriggling Contortionist
Wriggling Contortionist.description: You can wriggle your way around tight spaces without much difficulty, making it hard for others to pin you down. You can ignore difficult terrain caused by moving through tight spaces that aren't tight enough to force you to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.kMcV8e5EZUxa6evt]{Squeeze}. If you roll a success to Squeeze, you get a critical success instead. Ignore any penalties to Speeds conferred by the suppressed condition.

Xenoarchaeologist Dedication.name: Xenoarchaeologist Dedication
Xenoarchaeologist Dedication.description:
You become an expert in Society and Thievery and gain a +1 circumstance bonus to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge} checks and Delve Lore checks when using Investigate as your exploration activity.

You gain the@UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.BocFD2KV0qgUC76x]{ Additional Lore} general feat in Delve Lore, which you can use to Recall Knowledge about sites of archaeological significance, and about ancient history, relics, languages, and peoples. Upon gaining this skill, choose either Intelligence or Wisdom as the key attribute for your Delve Lore checks. This choice is permanent and can't be changed later.

prerequisites.value: trained in Society, Thievery, and your choice of Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion

Xenodruid Bond.name: Xenodruid Bond
Xenodruid Bond.description:
You join a primal order of xenodruids with ties to nature and the biodiversity of the Universe, such as the Xenowardens. Choose one of the following xenodruid orders.

Order Animal; Skill Animal Lore; Spells 1st: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.gfPjmG6Fe6D3MFjl]{Pest Form}; 2nd: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.wp09USMB3GIW1qbp]{Animal Form}; 5th: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.n5a3t5Qnx5AU8auy]{Carcinization}

Order Plant; Skill Plant Lore; Spells 1st: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.jSRAyd57kd4WZ4yE]{Summon Plant or Fungus}; 2nd: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.hk2mTLH9DIvNqDuS]{Verdant Code}; 5th: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.zCcfPS4y5SrZzU2x]{Plant Form}

Order Viral; Skill Genealogy Lore; Spells 1st: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.QqxwHeYEVylkYjsO]{Detect Poison}; 2nd: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.mnoTqz0gjRmuc4oR]{Instant Virus}; 5th: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.MlpbeZ61Euhl0d60]{Toxic Cloud}

You become trained in the listed skill associated with the order and add the listed spells to your spell list and spell repertoire as signature spells. If you were already trained in the listed skill, you instead become trained in another skill of your choice.

Xenodruid Dedication.name: Xenodruid Dedication
Xenodruid Dedication.description:
You can form a bond with the collective spirit of a world's ecosystems. This is a 10-minute activity that involves communing with nature and meditation. The planet must have an active biosphere. You can only bond with one planet at a time. This counts toward your maximum number of bonds. Planets don't count as creatures nor allies for the purposes of spells, prerequisites, or other abilities, including your vitality network.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Recall Knowledge about your planet's life and natural occurrences. You also gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Survival checks to subsist in its wilds and a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against environmental hazards and effects naturally found on your bonded planet. When off-world, you always know the general direction your planet lies in relation to you (but not distance), which grants a +1 circumstance bonus to Piloting checks to navigate.

In addition, you can assess the health of your planet once per day and attempt to locate any major disturbances to its ecosystems. Attempt a @Check[nature|dc:20] check while in contact with your planet.

Critical Success You diagnose the planet's health through its various ecospheres. In addition, you can detect specific ongoing disturbances to the natural world—such as industrial mining or a fire in a particular valley. You can sense the distance and direction of the disturbance and gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against hazards created by this disturbance.

Success As a critical success, but you can only sense disturbances happening on a massive scale (such as hurricanes, volcanic eruptions, or planetwide pollution) and the direction to it.

Failure You diagnose the planet's health but don't identify any disturbances.

Special You can take this feat if you have the mystic multiclass archetype dedication feat even if you haven't taken two additional mystic feats. Mystic archetype feats count as xenodruid feats, and vice-versa, for purposes of completing the archetypes.

prerequisites.value: spellcaster class feature that chooses spells from the primal spell list

You Can Do It.name: You Can Do It
You Can Do It.description:
Requirements Your last action was a 1-action directive.

You motivate an ally within 60 feet to lead by example. As a free action, that ally can immediately perform the lead by example actions of your last action, gaining any benefits and using any abilities that would normally be used as if you used two-actions to issue the direction. Use your Charisma modifier instead of your ally's when determining any relevant benefits, such as the status bonus to damage for Get 'Em!

You'll Have to Go Through Me!.name: You'll Have to Go Through Me!
You'll Have to Go Through Me!.description: You brace yourself as you prepare to defend your allies behind you. You @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.oc0ZKnk5zD0GXqZi]{Area Fire} or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.6ctkxUnVwqooSvgg]{Auto-Fire}. Until the start of your next turn or until you use a move action, whichever happens first, you gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.lNcZ7j1T2YmMwXF7]{Living Shield} reaction and, if you would be moved by a forced movement effect, you move 10 feet less.
You'll Have to Go Through Me!.selfEffect: Effect: You'll Have to Go Through Me!

Zone Overlap.name: Zone Overlap
Zone Overlap.description:
Requirements Your quantum field is active with one zone affecting it.

You cause a second zone to overlap your quantum field. You can choose to apply another zone you're able to create, or apply the existing zone again, improving its effects as follows: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.ryCmTz9Z62qbtmQM]{Danger Zone} deals 1 extra damage, @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.sW7AbeYfKc8OH7nG]{Debris Zone} becomes greater difficult terrain, and @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.rTebGqlQpa420YQy]{Twisted Dark Zone} ignores the temporary immunity of creatures that previously critically succeeded at the save for 1 round.

Zoomies.name: Zoomies
Zoomies.description:
Frequency once per day

You unleash your pent up energy in a flurry of unpredictable motion. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} condition for 4 rounds. You can use the extra action each round only to Stride.
